h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^T2.0001^ea^ ^a^V1.0001^ea^ ^a^P2.0001^ea^ ^a^M1.0307^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa vajjiisu viharati bha.n.dagaame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``catunna.m, bhikkhave, dhammaana.m ananubodhaa appa.tivedhaa evamida.m diighamaddhaana.m sandhaavita.m sa.msarita.m ^a^V1.0002^ea^ mama~nceva tumhaaka~nca. katamesa.m catunna.m? ariyassa, bhikkhave, siilassa ananubodhaa appa.tivedhaa evamida.m diighamaddhaana.m sandhaavita.m sa.msarita.m mama~nceva tumhaaka~nca. ariyassa, bhikkhave, samaadhissa ananubodhaa appa.tivedhaa evamida.m diighamaddhaana.m sandhaavita.m sa.msarita.m mama~nceva tumhaaka~nca. ariyaaya, bhikkhave, pa~n~naaya ananubodhaa appa.tivedhaa evamida.m diighamaddhaana.m sandhaavita.m sa.msarita.m mama~nceva tumhaaka~nca ^a^T2.0002^ea^. ariyaaya, bhikkhave, vimuttiyaa ananubodhaa appa.tivedhaa evamida.m diighamaddhaana.m sandhaavita.m sa.msarita.m mama~nceva tumhaaka~nca. tayida.m, bhikkhave, ariya.m siila.m anubuddha.m pa.tividdha.m, ariyo samaadhi anubuddho pa.tividdho, ariyaa pa~n~naa anubuddhaa pa.tividdhaa, ariyaa vimutti anubuddhaa pa.tividdhaa, ucchinnaa bhavata.nhaa, khii.naa bhavanetti, natthi daani punabbhavo''ti.
[03] idamavoca ^a^M1.0308^ea^ bhagavaa. ida.m vatvaana sugato athaapara.m etadavoca satthaa --
[21] ``siila.m ^a^P2.0002^ea^ samaadhi pa~n~naa ca, vimutti ca anuttaraa.
[22] anubuddhaa ime dhammaa, gotamena yasassinaa..
[21] ``iti buddho abhi~n~naaya, dhammamakkhaasi bhikkhuna.m.
[22] dukkhassantakaro satthaa, cakkhumaa parinibbuto''ti.. pa.thama.m.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ ``catuuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi asamannaagato `imasmaa dhammavinayaa papatito'ti vuccati. katamehi catuuhi? ariyena, bhikkhave, siilena asamannaagato `imasmaa dhammavinayaa papatito'ti vuccati. ariyena, bhikkhave, samaadhinaa asamannaagato `imasmaa dhammavinayaa papatito'ti vuccati. ariyaaya, bhikkhave, pa~n~naaya asamannaagato `imasmaa dhammavinayaa papatito'ti vuccati. ariyaaya, bhikkhave, vimuttiyaa asamannaagato `imasmaa dhammavinayaa papatito'ti vuccati. imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuuhi dhammehi asamannaagato `imasmaa dhammavinayaa papatito'ti vuccati.

[03] ``catuuhi ^a^V1.0003^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato `imasmaa dhammavinayaa apapatito'ti {appapatitoti (ka0)} vuccati. katamehi catuuhi? ariyena, bhikkhave, siilena samannaagato `imasmaa dhammavinayaa apapatito'ti vuccati. ariyena, bhikkhave, samaadhinaa samannaagato ^a^T2.0003^ea^ `imasmaa dhammavinayaa apapatito'ti vuccati. ariyaaya, bhikkhave, pa~n~naaya samannaagato `imasmaa dhammavinayaa apapatito'ti vuccati. ariyaaya, bhikkhave, vimuttiyaa samannaagato `imasmaa dhammavinayaa apapatito'ti vuccati. imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuuhi dhammehi samannaagato `imasmaa dhammavinayaa apapatito'ti vuccatii''ti.
[21] ``cutaa patanti patitaa, giddhaa ca punaraagataa.
[22] kata.m kicca.m rata.m ramma.m, sukhenaanvaagata.m sukha''ntntti.. dutiya.m.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ ``catuuhi ^a^M1.0309^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato baalo abyatto {avyatto (sii0 pii0)} asappuriso khata.m upahata.m attaana.m pariharati, saavajjo ca ^a^P2.0003^ea^ hoti saanuvajjo ca vi~n~nuuna.m, bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavati. katamehi catuuhi? ananuvicca apariyogaahetvaa ava.n.naarahassa va.n.na.m bhaasati, ananuvicca apariyogaahetvaa va.n.naarahassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati, ananuvicca apariyogaahetvaa appasaadaniiye .thaane pasaada.m upada.mseti, ananuvicca apariyogaahetvaa pasaadaniiye .thaane appasaada.m upada.mseti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuuhi dhammehi samannaagato baalo abyatto asappuriso khata.m upahata.m attaana.m pariharati, saavajjo ca hoti saanuvajjo ca vi~n~nuuna.m, bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavati.

[03] ``catuuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato pa.n.dito viyatto {vyatto (sii0 pii0), byatto (syaa0 ka.m0)} sappuriso akkhata.m anupahata.m attaana.m pariharati, anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo ca vi~n~nuuna.m, bahu~nca pu~n~na.m pasavati. katamehi catuuhi? anuvicca pariyogaahetvaa ava.n.naarahassa ava.n.na.m bhaasati ^a^T2.0004^ea^, anuvicca pariyogaahetvaa va.n.naarahassa va.n.na.m bhaasati, anuvicca pariyogaahetvaa appasaadaniiye .thaane appasaada.m upada.mseti, anuvicca pariyogaahetvaa pasaadaniiye .thaane pasaada.m upada.mseti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuuhi dhammehi samannaagato pa.n.dito viyatto sappuriso akkhata.m anupahata.m ^a^V1.0004^ea^ attaana.m pariharati, anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo ca vi~n~nuuna.m, bahu~nca pu~n~na.m pasavatii''ti.
[21] {su0 ni0 663; sa.m0 ni0 1.180} ``yo nindiya.m pasa.msati,
[27] ta.m vaa nindati yo pasa.msiyo.
[26] vicinaati mukhena so kali.m,
[22] kalinaa tena sukha.m na vindati..
[21] {su0 ni0 663; sa.m0 ni0 1.180} ``appamatto aya.m kali,
[27] yo akkhesu dhanaparaajayo.
[26] sabbassaapi sahaapi attanaa,
[27] ayameva mahantataro kali.
[22] yo sugatesu mana.m padosaye..
[21] ``sata.m ^a^M1.0310^ea^ sahassaana.m nirabbudaana.m,
[27] chatti.msatii pa~nca ca abbudaani.
[26] yamariyagarahii ^a^P2.0004^ea^ {yamariya.m garahiiya (syaa0 ka.m0)} niraya.m upeti,
[22] vaaca.m mana~nca pa.nidhaaya paapaka''nti.. tatiya.m.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ ``catuusu, bhikkhave, micchaa pa.tipajjamaano baalo abyatto asappuriso khata.m upahata.m attaana.m pariharati saavajjo ca hoti saanuvajjo ca vi~n~nuuna.m, bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavati. katamesu catuusu? maatari, bhikkhave, micchaa pa.tipajjamaano baalo abyatto asappuriso khata.m upahata.m attaana.m pariharati, saavajjo ca hoti saanuvajjo ca vi~n~nuuna.m, bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavati. pitari, bhikkhave, micchaa pa.tipajjamaano...pe0... tathaagate ^a^T2.0005^ea^, bhikkhave, micchaa pa.tipajjamaano...pe0... tathaagatasaavake, bhikkhave, micchaa pa.tipajjamaano baalo abyatto asappuriso khata.m upahata.m attaana.m pariharati, saavajjo ca hoti saanuvajjo ca ^a^V1.0005^ea^ vi~n~nuuna.m, bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavati. imesu kho, bhikkhave, catuusu micchaa pa.tipajjamaano baalo abyatto asappuriso khata.m upahata.m attaana.m pariharati, saavajjo ca hoti saanuvajjo ca vi~n~nuuna.m, bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavati.

[03] ``catuusu, bhikkhave, sammaa pa.tipajjamaano pa.n.dito viyatto sappuriso akkhata.m anupahata.m attaana.m pariharati, anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo ca vi~n~nuuna.m, bahu~nca pu~n~na.m pasavati. katamesu catuusu? maatari, bhikkhave, sammaa pa.tipajjamaano pa.n.dito viyatto sappuriso akkhata.m anupahata.m attaana.m pariharati, anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo ca vi~n~nuuna.m, bahu~nca pu~n~na.m pasavati. pitari, bhikkhave, sammaa pa.tipajjamaano...pe0... tathaagate, bhikkhave, sammaa pa.tipajjamaano...pe0... tathaagatasaavake, bhikkhave, sammaa pa.tipajjamaano pa.n.dito viyatto sappuriso akkhata.m anupahata.m attaana.m pariharati, anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo ca vi~n~nuuna.m, bahu~nca pu~n~na.m pasavati. imesu kho, bhikkhave, catuusu sammaa pa.tipajjamaano pa.n.dito viyatto sappuriso akkhata.m anupahata.m attaana.m pariharati, anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo ca vi~n~nuuna.m, bahu~nca pu~n~na.m pasavatii''ti.
[21] ``maatari ^a^M1.0311^ea^ pitari caapi, yo micchaa pa.tipajjati.
[27] tathaagate vaa sambuddhe, atha vaa tassa saavake.
[22] bahu~nca ^a^T2.0006^ea^ ^a^P2.0005^ea^ so pasavati, apu~n~na.m taadiso naro..
[21] ``taaya na.m adhammacariyaaya {taaya adhammacariyaaya (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, maataapituusu pa.n.ditaa.
[22] idheva na.m garahanti, peccaapaaya~nca gacchati..
[21] ``maatari pitari caapi, yo sammaa pa.tipajjati.
[27] tathaagate vaa sambuddhe, atha vaa tassa saavake.
[22] bahu~nca so pasavati, pu~n~na.m etaadiso {pu~n~nampi taadiso (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} naro..
[21] ``taaya na.m dhammacariyaaya, maataapituusu pa.n.ditaa.
[22] idheva {idha ceva (sii0)} na.m pasa.msanti, pecca sagge pamodatii''ti {sagge ca modatiiti (sii0)}.. catuttha.m.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome ^a^V1.0006^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro? anusotagaamii puggalo, pa.tisotagaamii puggalo, .thitatto puggalo, ti.n.no paara"ngato {paaragato (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} thale ti.t.thati braahma.no. katamo ca, bhikkhave, anusotagaamii puggalo? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo kaame ca pa.tisevati, paapa~nca kamma.m karoti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, anusotagaamii puggalo.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, pa.tisotagaamii puggalo? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo kaame ca nappa.tisevati, paapa~nca kamma.m na karoti, sahaapi dukkhena sahaapi domanassena assumukhopi rudamaano paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m carati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, pa.tisotagaamii puggalo.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, .thitatto puggalo? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa ^a^T2.0007^ea^ opapaatiko hoti, tattha parinibbaayii, anaavattidhammo tasmaa lokaa. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, .thitatto puggalo.

[03] ``katamo ^a^M1.0312^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, puggalo ti.n.no paara"ngato thale ti.t.thati braahma.no? idha ^a^P2.0006^ea^, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, puggalo ti.n.no paara"ngato thale ti.t.thati braahma.no. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti.
[21] ``ye keci kaamesu asa~n~nataa janaa,
[27] aviitaraagaa idha kaamabhogino.
[26] punappuna.m jaatijaruupagaami te {jaatijaruupagaahino (sii0), jaatijaruupagaa hi te (syaa0 ka.m0)},
[22] ta.nhaadhipannaa anusotagaamino..
[21] ``tasmaa ^a^V1.0007^ea^ hi dhiiro idhupa.t.thitassatii,
[27] kaame ca paape ca asevamaano.
[26] sahaapi dukkhena jaheyya kaame,
[22] pa.tisotagaamiiti tamaahu puggala.m..
[21] ``yo ve kilesaani pahaaya pa~nca,
[27] paripu.n.nasekho aparihaanadhammo.
[26] cetovasippatto samaahitindriyo,
[22] sa ve .thitattoti naro pavuccati..
[21] ``paroparaa ^a^T2.0008^ea^ yassa samecca dhammaa,
[27] vidhuupitaa atthagataa na santi.
[26] sa ve muni {sa vedaguu (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vusitabrahmacariyo,
[22] lokantaguu paaragatoti vuccatii''ti.. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro? appassuto sutena anupapanno, appassuto sutena upapanno, bahussuto sutena anupapanno, bahussuto sutena upapanno. katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo appassuto hoti sutena anupapanno ^a^M1.0313^ea^? idha ^a^P2.0007^ea^, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa appaka.m suta.m hoti -- sutta.m geyya.m veyyaakara.na.m gaathaa udaana.m itivuttaka.m jaataka.m abbhutadhamma.m vedalla.m. so tassa appakassa sutassa na atthama~n~naaya dhammama~n~naaya {na dhammama~n~naaya (pii0 ka0)} dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno hoti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo appassuto hoti sutena anupapanno.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo appassuto hoti sutena upapanno? idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa appaka.m suta.m hoti -- sutta.m geyya.m veyyaakara.na.m gaathaa udaana.m itivuttaka.m jaataka.m ^a^V1.0008^ea^ abbhutadhamma.m vedalla.m. so tassa appakassa sutassa atthama~n~naaya dhammama~n~naaya dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno hoti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo appassuto hoti sutena upapanno.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo bahussuto hoti sutena anupapanno? idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa bahuka.m suta.m hoti -- sutta.m geyya.m veyyaakara.na.m gaathaa udaana.m itivuttaka.m jaataka.m abbhutadhamma.m vedalla.m. so tassa bahukassa sutassa na atthama~n~naaya dhammama~n~naaya ^a^T2.0009^ea^ {na dhammama~n~naaya (pii0)} dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno hoti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo bahussuto hoti sutena anupapanno.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo bahussuto hoti sutena upapanno? idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa bahuka.m suta.m hoti -- sutta.m geyya.m veyyaakara.na.m gaathaa udaana.m itivuttaka.m jaataka.m abbhutadhamma.m vedalla.m. so tassa bahukassa sutassa atthama~n~naaya dhammama~n~naaya dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno hoti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo bahussuto hoti sutena upapanno. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti.
[21] ``appassutopi ce hoti, siilesu asamaahito.
[22] ubhayena na.m garahanti, siilato ca sutena ca..
[21] ``appassutopi ce hoti, siilesu susamaahito.
[22] siilato na.m pasa.msanti, tassa sampajjate suta.m..
[21] ``bahussutopi ^a^M1.0314^ea^ ce hoti, siilesu asamaahito.
[22] siilato na.m garahanti, naassa sampajjate suta.m..
[21] ``bahussutopi ^a^P2.0008^ea^ ce hoti, siilesu susamaahito.
[22] ubhayena na.m pasa.msanti, siilato ca sutena ca..
[21] ``bahussuta.m ^a^V1.0009^ea^ dhammadhara.m, sappa~n~na.m buddhasaavaka.m.
[27] nekkha.m jambonadasseva, ko ta.m ninditumarahati.
[22] devaapi na.m pasa.msanti, brahmunaapi pasa.msito''ti.. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, viyattaa viniitaa visaaradaa bahussutaa dhammadharaa ^a^T2.0010^ea^ dhammaanudhammappa.tipannaa sa"ngha.m sobhenti. katame cattaaro? bhikkhu, bhikkhave, viyatto viniito visaarado bahussuto dhammadharo dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno sa"ngha.m sobheti. bhikkhunii, bhikkhave, viyattaa viniitaa visaaradaa bahussutaa dhammadharaa dhammaanudhammappa.tipannaa sa"ngha.m sobheti. upaasako, bhikkhave, viyatto viniito visaarado bahussuto dhammadharo dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno sa"ngha.m sobheti. upaasikaa, bhikkhave, viyattaa viniitaa visaaradaa bahussutaa dhammadharaa dhammaanudhammappa.tipannaa sa"ngha.m sobheti. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro viyattaa viniitaa visaaradaa bahussutaa dhammadharaa dhammaanudhammappa.tipannaa sa"ngha.m sobhentii''ti.
[21] ``yo hoti viyatto {vyatto (sii0 pii0), byatto (syaa0 ka.m0)} ca visaarado ca,
[27] bahussuto dhammadharo ca hoti.
[26] dhammassa hoti anudhammacaarii,
[22] sa taadiso vuccati sa"nghasobhano {sa.mghasobha.no (ka0)}..
[21] ``bhikkhu ca siilasampanno, bhikkhunii ca bahussutaa.
[27] upaasako ca yo saddho, yaa ca saddhaa upaasikaa.
[22] ete kho sa"ngha.m sobhenti, ete hi sa"nghasobhanaa''ti.. sattama.m.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarimaani ^a^M1.0315^ea^, bhikkhave, tathaagatassa vesaarajjaani, yehi vesaarajjehi samannaagato tathaagato aasabha.m .thaana.m pa.tijaanaati ^a^P2.0009^ea^, parisaasu siihanaada.m nadati, brahmacakka.m pavatteti. katamaani ^a^V1.0010^ea^ cattaari? `sammaasambuddhassa te pa.tijaanato ime dhammaa anabhisambuddhaa'ti tatra vata ma.m sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa devo vaa maaro vaa brahmaa vaa koci vaa lokasmi.m sahadhammena pa.ticodessatiiti nimittameta.m, bhikkhave, na samanupassaami ^a^T2.0011^ea^. etamaha.m {etampaha.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, bhikkhave, nimitta.m asamanupassanto khemappatto abhayappatto vesaarajjappatto viharaami.

[03] ```khii.naasavassa te pa.tijaanato ime aasavaa aparikkhii.naa'ti tatra vata ma.m sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa devo vaa maaro vaa brahmaa vaa koci vaa lokasmi.m sahadhammena pa.ticodessatiiti nimittameta.m, bhikkhave, na samanupassaami. etamaha.m, bhikkhave, nimitta.m asamanupassanto khemappatto abhayappatto vesaarajjappatto viharaami.

[03] ```ye kho pana te antaraayikaa dhammaa vuttaa te pa.tisevato naala.m antaraayaayaa'ti tatra vata ma.m sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa devo vaa maaro vaa brahmaa vaa koci vaa lokasmi.m sahadhammena pa.ticodessatiiti nimittameta.m, bhikkhave, na samanupassaami. etamaha.m, bhikkhave, nimitta.m asamanupassanto khemappatto abhayappatto vesaarajjappatto viharaami.

[03] ```yassa kho pana te atthaaya dhammo desito so na niyyaati takkarassa sammaa dukkhakkhayaayaa'ti tatra vata ma.m sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa devo vaa maaro vaa brahmaa vaa koci vaa lokasmi.m sahadhammena pa.ticodessatiiti nimittameta.m, bhikkhave, na samanupassaami. etamaha.m, bhikkhave, nimitta.m asamanupassanto khemappatto abhayappatto vesaarajjappatto viharaami. imaani kho, bhikkhave, cattaari tathaagatassa vesaarajjaani, yehi vesaarajjehi samannaagato tathaagato aasabha.m .thaana.m pa.tijaanaati, parisaasu siihanaada.m nadati, brahmacakka.m pavattetii''ti.
[21] ``ye ^a^M1.0316^ea^ kecime vaadapathaa puthussitaa,
[27] ya.m ^a^T2.0012^ea^ nissitaa sama.nabraahma.naa ca.
[26] tathaagata.m patvaa na te bhavanti,
[22] visaarada.m vaadapathaativatta.m {vaadapathaabhivattina.m (sii0), vaadapathaati vutta.m (pii0 ka0)}..
[21] ``yo dhammacakka.m abhibhuyya kevalii {kevala.m (syaa0), kevalo (ka0)},
[27] pavattayii sabbabhuutaanukampii.
[26] ta.m ^a^V1.0011^ea^ taadisa.m devamanussase.t.tha.m,
[22] sattaa namassanti bhavassa paaragu''nti.. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome ^a^P2.0010^ea^, bhikkhave, ta.nhuppaadaa yattha bhikkhuno ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati. katame cattaaro? ciivarahetu vaa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati; pi.n.dapaatahetu vaa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati; senaasanahetu vaa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati; itibhavaabhavahetu vaa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro ta.nhuppaadaa yattha bhikkhuno ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjatii''ti.
[21] ``ta.nhaa dutiyo puriso, diighamaddhaana sa.msara.m.
[22] itthabhaava~n~nathaabhaava.m, sa.msaara.m naativattati..
[21] ``evamaadiinava.m ~natvaa, ta.nha.m dukkhassa sambhava.m.
[22] viitata.nho anaadaano, sato bhikkhu paribbaje''ti {itivu0 15, 105}.. navama.m.

[03] ``di.t.thiyogo ca katha.m hoti? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco di.t.thiina.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. tassa di.t.thiina.m samudaya~nca attha"ngama~nca assaada~nca aadiinava~nca nissara.na~nca yathaabhuuta.m appajaanato yo ^a^P2.0011^ea^ di.t.thiisu di.t.thiraago di.t.thinandii di.t.thisneho di.t.thimucchaa di.t.thipipaasaa di.t.thipari.laaho di.t.thijjhosaana.m {di.t.thiajjhosaana.m (sii0 pii0)} di.t.thita.nhaa saanuseti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, di.t.thiyogo. iti kaamayogo bhavayogo di.t.thiyogo.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarimaani ^a^P2.0016^ea^, bhikkhave, padhaanaani. katamaani cattaari? sa.mvarappadhaana.m, pahaanappadhaana.m, bhaavanaappadhaana.m, anurakkha.naappadhaana.m. katama~nca, bhikkhave, sa.mvarappadhaana.m? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa na nimittaggaahii hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m cakkhundriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m ^a^V1.0019^ea^, tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati, rakkhati cakkhundriya.m, cakkhundriye sa.mvara.m aapajjati. sotena sadda.m sutvaa... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya ^a^T2.0021^ea^ na nimittaggaahii hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii, yatvaadhikara.namena.m manindriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati, rakkhati manindriya.m, manindriye sa.mvara.m aapajjati. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sa.mvarappadhaana.m.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarimaani, bhikkhave, sokhummaani. katamaani cattaari? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ruupasokhummena samannaagato hoti paramena; tena ca ruupasokhummena ^a^M1.0325^ea^ a~n~na.m ruupasokhumma.m uttaritara.m vaa pa.niitatara.m vaa na samanupassati; tena ca ruupasokhummena a~n~na.m ruupasokhumma.m uttaritara.m vaa pa.niitatara.m vaa na pattheti. vedanaasokhummena ^a^P2.0018^ea^ samannaagato hoti paramena; tena ca vedanaasokhummena a~n~na.m vedanaasokhumma.m uttaritara.m vaa pa.niitatara.m vaa na samanupassati; tena ca vedanaasokhummena a~n~na.m vedanaasokhumma.m uttaritara.m vaa pa.niitatara.m vaa na pattheti. sa~n~naasokhummena samannaagato hoti paramena; tena ca sa~n~naasokhummena a~n~na.m sa~n~naasokhumma.m uttaritara.m vaa pa.niitatara.m vaa na samanupassati; tena ca sa~n~naasokhummena a~n~na.m sa~n~naasokhumma.m uttaritara.m vaa pa.niitatara.m vaa na pattheti. sa"nkhaarasokhummena samannaagato hoti paramena; tena ca sa"nkhaarasokhummena a~n~na.m sa"nkhaarasokhumma.m uttaritara.m vaa ^a^T2.0023^ea^ pa.niitatara.m vaa na samanupassati; tena ca sa"nkhaarasokhummena a~n~na.m sa"nkhaarasokhumma.m uttaritara.m vaa pa.niitatara.m vaa na pattheti. imaani kho, bhikkhave, cattaari sokhummaanii''ti.
[21] ``ruupasokhummata.m ^a^V1.0021^ea^ ~natvaa, vedanaana~nca sambhava.m.

[22] dhaareti antima.m deha.m, jetvaa maara.m savaahini''nti.. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarimaani, bhikkhave, agatigamanaani. katamaani cattaari? chandaagati.m gacchati, dosaagati.m gacchati, mohaagati.m gacchati, bhayaagati.m gacchati -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, cattaari agatigamanaanii''ti.

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ ``catuuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhattuddesako yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye. katamehi catuuhi? chandaagati.m gacchati, dosaagati.m gacchati, mohaagati.m gacchati, bhayaagati.m gacchati -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuuhi dhammehi samannaagato bhattuddesako yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye.

[03] ``catuuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhattuddesako yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m sagge. katamehi catuuhi? na chandaagati.m gacchati, na dosaagati.m ^a^M1.0327^ea^ gacchati, na mohaagati.m gacchati, na bhayaagati.m gacchati -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuuhi dhammehi samannaagato bhattuddesako yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m sagge''ti.
[21] ``ye keci kaamesu asa~n~nataa janaa,
[27] adhammikaa honti adhammagaaravaa.

[22] parisaakasa.to ^a^T2.0025^ea^ {parisakkasaavo (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} ca panesa vuccati..

[26] ``parisaaya ma.n.do ca panesa vuccati,
[22] eva~nhi vutta.m sama.nena jaanataa''ti.. dasama.m.
[06] caravaggo dutiyo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] cara.m siila.m padhaanaani, sa.mvara.m pa~n~natti pa~ncama.m.
[22] sokhumma.m tayo agatii, bhattuddesena te dasaati..

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^V1.0024^ea^ ^a^P2.0020^ea^ me suta.m {sa.m0 ni0 1.173 aagata.m} -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``ekamidaaha.m ^a^M1.0328^ea^, bhikkhave, samaya.m uruvelaaya.m viharaami najjaa nera~njaraaya tiire ajapaalanigrodhe pa.thamaabhisambuddho. tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, rahogatassa pa.tisalliinassa eva.m cetaso parivitakko udapaadi -- `dukkha.m kho agaaravo viharati appatisso. ki.m nu kho aha.m sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa sakkatvaa garu.m ^a^T2.0026^ea^ katvaa {garukatvaa (sii0 pii0)} upanissaaya vihareyya'''nti?

[03] ``tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- aparipuurassa kho aha.m siilakkhandhassa paaripuuriyaa a~n~na.m sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya vihareyya.m. na kho panaaha.m passaami sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya a~n~na.m sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa attanaa siilasampannatara.m, yamaha.m sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya vihareyya.m.

[03] ``aparipuurassa kho aha.m samaadhikkhandhassa paaripuuriyaa a~n~na.m sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya vihareyya.m. na kho panaaha.m passaami sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya a~n~na.m sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa attanaa samaadhisampannatara.m, yamaha.m sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya vihareyya.m.

[03] ``aparipuurassa kho aha.m pa~n~naakkhandhassa paaripuuriyaa a~n~na.m sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya vihareyya.m. na kho panaaha.m passaami sadevake loke samaarake ^a^V1.0025^ea^ sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya a~n~na.m sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa attanaa pa~n~naasampannatara.m, yamaha.m sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya vihareyya.m.

[03] ``aparipuurassa kho aha.m vimuttikkhandhassa paaripuuriyaa a~n~na.m sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya vihareyya.m. na kho panaaha.m passaami sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya a~n~na.m sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa attanaa vimuttisampannatara.m, yamaha.m sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya vihareyya''nti.

[03] ``tassa ^a^M1.0329^ea^ mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `ya.mnuunaaha.m yvaaya.m {yopaaya.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} dhammo mayaa abhisambuddho tameva dhamma.m sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya vihareyya'''nti.

[03] ``atha kho, bhikkhave, brahmaa sahampati mama cetasaa cetoparivitakkama~n~naaya ^a^P2.0021^ea^ -- seyyathaapi naama balavaa puriso sami~njita.m {sammi~njita.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vaa baaha.m pasaareyya, pasaarita.m vaa baaha.m sami~njeyya, evameva.m -- brahmaloke antarahito mama purato paaturahosi. atha kho, bhikkhave, brahmaa sahampati eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa dakkhi.na.m jaa.numa.n.dala.m pathaviya.m nihantvaa yenaaha.m tena~njali.m pa.naametvaa ^a^T2.0027^ea^ ma.m etadavoca -- `evameta.m bhagavaa, evameta.m sugata! yepi te, bhante, ahesu.m atiitamaddhaana.m arahanto sammaasambuddhaa tepi bhagavanto dhamma.myeva sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya vihari.msu; yepi te, bhante, bhavissanti anaagatamaddhaana.m arahanto sammaasambuddhaa tepi bhagavanto dhamma.myeva sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya viharissanti; bhagavaapi, bhante, etarahi araha.m sammaasambuddho dhamma.myeva sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya viharatuu'''ti. idamavoca brahmaa sahampati. ida.m vatvaa athaapara.m etadavoca --
[21] ``ye ca atiitaa {ye cabbhatiitaa (sii0 pii0 ka0)} sambuddhaa, ye ca buddhaa anaagataa.
[22] yo cetarahi sambuddho, bahuuna.m {bahunna.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0) sa.m0 ni0 1.173} sokanaasano..
[21] ``sabbe saddhammagaruno, viha.msu {vihari.msu (syaa0 ka.m0)} viharanti ca.
[22] athopi viharissanti, esaa buddhaana dhammataa..
[21] ``tasmaa ^a^V1.0026^ea^ hi attakaamena {atthakaamena (sii0 ka0)}, mahattamabhika"nkhataa.
[22] saddhammo garukaatabbo, sara.m buddhaana saasana''nti..

[03] ``idamavoca, bhikkhave, brahmaa sahampati. ida.m vatvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa tatthevantaradhaayi. atha khvaaha.m, bhikkhave, brahmuno ca ajjhesana.m viditvaa attano ca patiruupa.m yvaaya.m {yopaaya.m (sabbattha)} dhammo mayaa abhisambuddho tameva dhamma.m sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa upanissaaya vihaasi.m. yato ^a^M1.0330^ea^ ca kho, bhikkhave, sa"nghopi mahattena samannaagato, atha me ^a^T2.0028^ea^ sa"nghepi gaaravo''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ ``ekamidaaha.m ^a^P2.0022^ea^, bhikkhave, samaya.m uruvelaaya.m viharaami najjaa nera~njaraaya tiire ajapaalanigrodhe pa.thamaabhisambuddho. atha kho, bhikkhave, sambahulaa braahma.naa ji.n.naa vuddhaa mahallakaa addhagataa vayoanuppattaa yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa mayaa saddhi.m sammodi.msu. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho, bhikkhave, te braahma.naa ma.m etadavocu.m -- `suta.m neta.m {meta.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}, bho gotama -- na sama.no gotamo braahma.ne ji.n.ne vuddhe mahallake addhagate vayoanuppatte abhivaadeti vaa paccu.t.theti vaa aasanena vaa nimantetiiti. tayida.m, bho gotama, tatheva. na hi bhava.m gotamo braahma.ne ji.n.ne vuddhe mahallake addhagate vayoanuppatte abhivaadeti vaa paccu.t.theti vaa aasanena vaa nimanteti. tayida.m, bho gotama, na sampannamevaa'''ti.

[03] ``tassa mayha.m, bhikkhave, etadahosi -- `nayime {na vata me (sii0 pii0), na cayime (syaa0 ka.m0), na vatime (?)} aayasmanto jaananti thera.m vaa therakara.ne vaa dhamme'ti. vuddho cepi, bhikkhave, hoti aasiitiko vaa naavutiko vaa vassasatiko vaa jaatiyaa. so ca hoti akaalavaadii abhuutavaadii anatthavaadii adhammavaadii avinayavaadii, anidhaanavati.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa akaalena anapadesa.m apariyantavati.m anatthasa.mhita.m. atha kho so `baalo thero'tveva {teva (sii0 pii0)} sa"nkha.m gacchati.

[03] ``daharo cepi, bhikkhave, hoti yuvaa susukaa.lakeso bhadrena yobbanena samannaagato pa.thamena vayasaa ^a^T2.0029^ea^. so ca hoti kaalavaadii bhuutavaadii atthavaadii dhammavaadii vinayavaadii nidhaanavati.m ^a^V1.0027^ea^ vaaca.m bhaasitaa kaalena saapadesa.m pariyantavati.m atthasa.mhita.m. atha kho so `pa.n.dito thero'tveva sa"nkha.m gacchati.

[03] ``cattaarome ^a^M1.0331^ea^, bhikkhave, therakara.naa dhammaa. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti, paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati aacaaragocarasampanno a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu, bahussuto hoti ^a^P2.0023^ea^ sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhammaa aadikalyaa.naa majjhekalyaa.naa pariyosaanakalyaa.naa saattha.m sabya~njana.m {saatthaa sabya~njanaa (sii0 pii0)} kevalaparipu.n.na.m {kevalaparipu.n.naa (sii0)} parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m abhivadanti, tathaaruupaassa dhammaa bahussutaa honti dhaataa {dhataa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vacasaa paricitaa manasaanupekkhitaa, di.t.thiyaa suppa.tividdhaa, catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii, aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro therakara.naa dhammaa''ti.
[21] ``yo uddhatena cittena, sampha~nca bahu bhaasati.
[27] asamaahitasa"nkappo, asaddhammarato mago.
[22] aaraa so thaavareyyamhaa, paapadi.t.thi anaadaro..
[21] ``yo ca siilena sampanno, sutavaa pa.tibhaanavaa.
[22] sa~n~nato dhiiro dhammesu {sa~n~nato dhiiradhammesu (sii0), sa.myutto thiradhammesu (syaa0 ka.m0)}, pa~n~naayattha.m vipassati..
[21] ``paaraguu ^a^T2.0030^ea^ sabbadhammaana.m, akhilo pa.tibhaanavaa.
[22] pahiinajaatimara.no, brahmacariyassa kevalii..
[21] ``tamaha.m vadaami theroti, yassa no santi aasavaa.
[22] aasavaana.m khayaa bhikkhu, so theroti pavuccatii''ti.. dutiya.m.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ ``loko ^a^V1.0028^ea^, bhikkhave, tathaagatena abhisambuddho. lokasmaa tathaagato visa.myutto. lokasamudayo, bhikkhave, tathaagatena abhisambuddho. lokasamudayo tathaagatassa pahiino. lokanirodho, bhikkhave, tathaagatena abhisambuddho. lokanirodho tathaagatassa ^a^M1.0332^ea^ sacchikato. lokanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa, bhikkhave, tathaagatena abhisambuddhaa. lokanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa tathaagatassa bhaavitaa.

[03] ``ya~nca, bhikkhave, ratti.m tathaagato anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambujjhati ya~nca ratti.m anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbaayati, ya.m etasmi.m antare bhaasati lapati niddisati sabba.m ta.m tatheva hoti, no a~n~nathaa. tasmaa `tathaagato'ti vuccati.
[03] ``yathaavaadii, bhikkhave, tathaagato tathaakaarii, yathaakaarii tathaavaadii. iti yathaavaadii tathaakaarii, yathaakaarii tathaavaadii. tasmaa `tathaagato'ti vuccati.

[03] ``sadevake, bhikkhave, loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya ^a^T2.0031^ea^ tathaagato abhibhuu anabhibhuuto a~n~nadatthu daso vasavattii. tasmaa `tathaagato'ti vuccati''.
[21] ``sabba.m loka.m abhi~n~naaya, sabba.m loke yathaatatha.m.
[22] sabba.m loka.m {sabbaloka (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} visa.myutto, sabbaloke anuupayo..
[21] ``sa ve sabbaabhibhuu dhiiro, sabbaganthappamocano.
[22] phu.t.tha'ssa paramaa santi, nibbaana.m akutobhaya.m..
[21] ``esa ^a^V1.0029^ea^ khii.naasavo buddho, aniigho chinnasa.msayo.
[22] sabbakammakkhaya.m patto, vimutto upadhisa"nkhaye..
[21] ``esa so bhagavaa buddho, esa siiho anuttaro.
[22] sadevakassa lokassa, brahmacakka.m pavattayii..
[21] ``iti devaa manussaa ca, ye buddha.m sara.na.m gataa.
[22] sa"ngamma ta.m namassanti, mahanta.m viitasaarada.m..
[21] ``danto ^a^M1.0333^ea^ damayata.m se.t.tho, santo samayata.m isi.
[22] mutto mocayata.m aggo, ti.n.no taarayata.m varo..
[21] ``iti heta.m namassanti, mahanta.m viitasaarada.m.
[22] sadevakasmi.m lokasmi.m, natthi te {natthi te (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} pa.tipuggalo''ti.. tatiya.m.

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saakete viharati kaa.lakaaraame {ko.likaaraame (ka0)}. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``ya.m ^a^P2.0025^ea^, bhikkhave, sadevakassa lokassa ^a^T2.0032^ea^ samaarakassa sabrahmakassa sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya di.t.tha.m suta.m muta.m vi~n~naata.m patta.m pariyesita.m anuvicarita.m manasaa, tamaha.m jaanaami.

[03] ``ya.m, bhikkhave, sadevakassa lokassa samaarakassa sabrahmakassa sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya di.t.tha.m suta.m muta.m vi~n~naata.m patta.m pariyesita.m anuvicarita.m manasaa, tamaha.m abbha~n~naasi.m. ta.m tathaagatassa vidita.m, ta.m tathaagato na upa.t.thaasi.

[03] ``ya.m ^a^V1.0030^ea^, bhikkhave, sadevakassa lokassa samaarakassa sabrahmakassa sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya di.t.tha.m suta.m muta.m vi~n~naata.m patta.m pariyesita.m anuvicarita.m manasaa, tamaha.m na jaanaamiiti vadeyya.m, ta.m mamassa musaa.
[03] ``ya.m, bhikkhave...pe0... tamaha.m jaanaami ca na ca jaanaamiiti vadeyya.m, ta.mpassa {ta.m pissa (syaa0 ka.m0), ta.m mamassa (ka0)} taadisameva.
[03] ``ya.m, bhikkhave...pe0... tamaha.m neva jaanaami na na jaanaamiiti vadeyya.m, ta.m mamassa kali.

[03] ``iti kho, bhikkhave, tathaagato da.t.thaa da.t.thabba.m, di.t.tha.m na ma~n~nati, adi.t.tha.m na ma~n~nati, da.t.thabba.m na ma~n~nati, da.t.thaara.m na ma~n~nati; sutvaa sotabba.m, suta.m na ^a^M1.0334^ea^ ma~n~nati, asuta.m na ma~n~nati, sotabba.m na ma~n~nati, sotaara.m na ma~n~nati; mutvaa motabba.m, muta.m na ma~n~nati, amuta.m na ma~n~nati, motabba.m na ma~n~nati, motaara.m na ma~n~nati; vi~n~natvaa vi~n~naatabba.m, vi~n~naata.m na ma~n~nati, avi~n~naata.m na ma~n~nati, vi~n~naatabba.m na ma~n~nati, vi~n~naataara.m na ma~n~nati. iti kho, bhikkhave, tathaagato di.t.thasutamutavi~n~naatabbesu dhammesu taadiiyeva taadii {taadisova taadii (syaa0 ka.m0), taadise yeva taadii (pii0), taadiiyeva taadiiyevekaa (ka0)}. tamhaa ca pana taadimhaa {taaditamhaa (sii0 pii0)} a~n~no taadii uttaritaro vaa pa.niitataro vaa natthiiti vadaamii''ti.
[21] ``ya.m ^a^T2.0033^ea^ ki~nci di.t.tha.mva suta.m muta.m vaa,
[27] ajjhosita.m saccamuta.m paresa.m.
[26] na tesu taadii sayasa.mvutesu,
[22] sacca.m musaa vaapi para.m daheyya..
[21] ``eta~nca salla.m pa.tikacca {pa.tigacca (sii0 pii0)} disvaa,
[27] ajjhositaa yattha pajaa visattaa.
[26] jaanaami ^a^P2.0026^ea^ passaami tatheva eta.m,
[22] ajjhosita.m natthi tathaagataana''ntntti.. catuttha.m.

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ ``nayida.m ^a^V1.0031^ea^, bhikkhave, brahmacariya.m vussati janakuhanattha.m, na janalapanattha.m, na laabhasakkaarasilokaanisa.msattha.m, na itivaadappamokkhaanisa.msattha.m, na `iti ma.m jano jaanaatuu'ti. atha kho ida.m, bhikkhave, brahmacariya.m vussati sa.mvarattha.m pahaanattha.m viraagattha.m nirodhattha''nti.
[21] ``sa.mvarattha.m pahaanattha.m, brahmacariya.m aniitiha.m.
[27] adesayi so bhagavaa, nibbaanogadhagaamina.m.
[22] esa maggo mahantehi {mahattebhi (ka0) itivu0 35}, anuyaato mahesibhi..
[21] ``ye ca ta.m pa.tipajjanti, yathaa buddhena desita.m.
[22] dukkhassanta.m karissanti, satthusaasanakaarino''ti.. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ {itivu0 108 itivuttakepi} ``ye ^a^M1.0335^ea^ te, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu kuhaa thaddhaa lapaa si"ngii unna.laa asamaahitaa, na me te, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu maamakaa. apagataa ca te, bhikkhave ^a^T2.0034^ea^, bhikkhuu imasmaa dhammavinayaa, na ca te imasmi.m dhammavinaye vuddhi.m viru.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjanti. ye ca kho te, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu nikkuhaa nillapaa dhiiraa atthaddhaa susamaahitaa, te kho me, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu maamakaa. anapagataa ca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu imasmaa dhammavinayaa. te ca imasmi.m dhammavinaye vuddhi.m viru.lhi.m vepulla.m aapajjantii''ti.

[22] te ve dhamme viruuhanti, sammaasambuddhadesite''ti.. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarimaani ^a^V1.0032^ea^, bhikkhave, appaani ca {ceva (ka0)} sulabhaani ca, taani ca anavajjaani. katamaani cattaari? pa.msukuula.m, bhikkhave, ciivaraana.m appa~nca sulabha~nca ^a^P2.0027^ea^, ta~nca anavajja.m. pi.n.diyaalopo, bhikkhave, bhojanaana.m appa~nca sulabha~nca, ta~nca anavajja.m. rukkhamuula.m, bhikkhave, senaasanaana.m appa~nca sulabha~nca, ta~nca anavajja.m. puutimutta.m, bhikkhave, bhesajjaana.m appa~nca sulabha~nca, ta~nca anavajja.m. imaani kho, bhikkhave, cattaari appaani ca sulabhaani ca, taani ca anavajjaani. yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu appena ca tu.t.tho hoti sulabhena ca, idamassaaha.m a~n~natara.m saama~n~na"nganti {saama~n~nanti (ka0)} vadaamii''ti.
[21] ``anavajjena tu.t.thassa, appena sulabhena ca.
[27] na ^a^T2.0035^ea^ senaasanamaarabbha, ciivara.m paanabhojana.m.
[22] vighaato hoti cittassa, disaa nappa.tiha~n~nati..
[21] ``ye cassa dhammaa akkhaataa, saama~n~nassaanulomikaa.
[22] adhiggahitaa tu.t.thassa, appamattassa sikkhato''ti.. sattama.m.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome ^a^M1.0336^ea^, bhikkhave, ariyava.msaa agga~n~naa ratta~n~naa va.msa~n~naa poraa.naa asa.mki.n.naa asa.mki.n.napubbaa, na sa.mkiiyanti na sa.mkiiyissanti, appa.tiku.t.thaa sama.nehi braahma.nehi vi~n~nuuhi. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu santu.t.tho hoti itariitarena ciivarena, itariitaraciivarasantu.t.thiyaa ca va.n.navaadii, na ca ciivarahetu anesana.m appatiruupa.m aapajjati, aladdhaa ca ciivara.m na paritassati, laddhaa ca ciivara.m agadhito {agathito (sii0 pii0)} amucchito anajjhosanno aadiinavadassaavii nissara.napa~n~no paribhu~njati; taaya ca pana itariitaraciivarasantu.t.thiyaa nevattaanukka.mseti, no {na (dii0 ni0 3.309)} para.m vambheti. yo hi tattha dakkho analaso sampajaano patissato, aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu poraa.ne agga~n~ne ariyava.mse .thito.

[03] ``puna ^a^V1.0033^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu santu.t.tho hoti itariitarena pi.n.dapaatena, itariitarapi.n.dapaatasantu.t.thiyaa ca va.n.navaadii, na ca pi.n.dapaatahetu anesana.m appatiruupa.m aapajjati, aladdhaa ca pi.n.dapaata.m na paritassati, laddhaa ca pi.n.dapaata.m agadhito amucchito anajjhosanno aadiinavadassaavii nissara.napa~n~no ^a^P2.0028^ea^ paribhu~njati; taaya ca pana itariitarapi.n.dapaatasantu.t.thiyaa nevattaanukka.mseti ^a^T2.0036^ea^, no para.m vambheti. yo hi tattha dakkho analaso sampajaano patissato, aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu poraa.ne agga~n~ne ariyava.mse .thito.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu santu.t.tho hoti itariitarena senaasanena, itariitarasenaasanasantu.t.thiyaa ca va.n.navaadii, na ca senaasanahetu anesana.m appatiruupa.m aapajjati, aladdhaa ca senaasana.m na paritassati, laddhaa ca senaasana.m agadhito amucchito anajjhosanno aadiinavadassaavii nissara.napa~n~no paribhu~njati; taaya ca pana itariitarasenaasanasantu.t.thiyaa nevattaanukka.mseti, no para.m vambheti. yo hi tattha dakkho analaso sampajaano patissato, aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu poraa.ne agga~n~ne ariyava.mse .thito.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhaavanaaraamo hoti bhaavanaarato, pahaanaaraamo hoti pahaanarato; taaya ca pana bhaavanaaraamataaya bhaavanaaratiyaa ^a^M1.0337^ea^ pahaanaaraamataaya pahaanaratiyaa nevattaanukka.mseti, no para.m vambheti. yo hi tattha dakkho analaso sampajaano patissato, aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu poraa.ne agga~n~ne ariyava.mse .thito. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro ariyava.msaa agga~n~naa ratta~n~naa va.msa~n~naa poraa.naa asa.mki.n.naa asa.mki.n.napubbaa, na sa.mkiiyanti na sa.mkiiyissanti, appa.tiku.t.thaa sama.nehi braahma.nehi vi~n~nuuhi.

[03] ``imehi ca pana, bhikkhave, catuuhi ariyava.msehi samannaagato bhikkhu puratthimaaya cepi disaaya viharati sveva arati.m sahati, na ta.m arati sahati; pacchimaaya cepi disaaya viharati ^a^T2.0037^ea^ sveva arati.m sahati, na ta.m arati sahati; uttaraaya cepi disaaya viharati sveva arati.m sahati, na ta.m arati sahati; dakkhi.naaya cepi disaaya viharati sveva arati.m sahati, na ta.m arati sahati. ta.m kissa hetu? aratiratisaho hi, bhikkhave, dhiiro''ti.
[21] ``naarati ^a^V1.0034^ea^ sahati dhiira.m {viira.m (sii0)}, naarati dhiira.m sahati.
[22] dhiirova arati.m sahati, dhiiro hi aratissaho..
[21] ``sabbakammavihaayiina.m ^a^P2.0029^ea^, panu.n.na.m {pa.nunna.m (?)} ko nivaaraye.
[27] nekkha.m jambonadasseva, ko ta.m ninditumarahati.
[22] devaapi na.m pasa.msanti, brahmunaapi pasa.msito''ti.. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarimaani, bhikkhave, dhammapadaani agga~n~naani ratta~n~naani va.msa~n~naani poraa.naani asa.mki.n.naani asa.mki.n.napubbaani, na sa.mkiiyanti na sa.mkiiyissanti, appa.tiku.t.thaani sama.nehi braahma.nehi vi~n~nuuhi. katamaani cattaari? anabhijjhaa, bhikkhave, dhammapada.m agga~n~na.m ratta~n~na.m va.msa~n~na.m poraa.na.m asa.mki.n.na.m asa.mki.n.napubba.m, na sa.mkiiyati na sa.mkiiyissati, appa.tiku.t.tha.m sama.nehi braahma.nehi vi~n~nuuhi.

[03] ``abyaapaado, bhikkhave, dhammapada.m agga~n~na.m ratta~n~na.m va.msa~n~na.m poraa.na.m asa.mki.n.na.m asa.mki.n.napubba.m, na sa.mkiiyati na sa.mkiiyissati, appa.tiku.t.tha.m sama.nehi braahma.nehi vi~n~nuuhi.

[03] ``sammaasati ^a^M1.0338^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammapada.m agga~n~na.m ratta~n~na.m va.msa~n~na.m poraa.na.m asa.mki.n.na.m asa.mki.n.napubba.m, na sa.mkiiyati na sa.mkiiyissati, appa.tiku.t.tha.m sama.nehi braahma.nehi vi~n~nuuhi.

[03] ``sammaasamaadhi, bhikkhave, dhammapada.m agga~n~na.m ratta~n~na.m va.msa~n~na.m poraa.na.m asa.mki.n.na.m asa.mki.n.napubba.m, na sa.mkiiyati na sa.mkiiyissati, appa.tiku.t.tha.m sama.nehi braahma.nehi vi~n~nuuhi. imaani kho, bhikkhave, cattaari dhammapadaani agga~n~naani ratta~n~naani va.msa~n~naani poraa.naani asa.mki.n.naani asa.mki.n.napubbaani, na sa.mkiiyanti na sa.mkiiyissanti, appa.tiku.t.thaani ^a^T2.0038^ea^ sama.nehi braahma.nehi vi~n~nuuhii''ti.
[21] ``anabhijjhaalu ^a^V1.0035^ea^ vihareyya, abyaapannena cetasaa.
[22] sato ekaggacittassa {ekaggacittaaya.m (ka0)}, ajjhatta.m susamaahito''ti.. navama.m.

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati gijjhakuu.te pabbate. tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa paribbaajakaa sippinikaatiire {sappiniyaa tiire (sii0 pii0), sippiniyaa tiire (syaa0 ka.m0), sippiniyaa nadiyaa tiire (ka0)} paribbaajakaaraame pa.tivasanti, seyyathida.m annabhaaro varadharo sakuludaayii ca paribbaajako a~n~ne ca abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa paribbaajakaa. atha kho bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yena sippinikaatiira.m paribbaajakaaraamo tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho bhagavaa te paribbaajake etadavoca --

[03] ``cattaarimaani, paribbaajakaa, dhammapadaani agga~n~naani ratta~n~naani ^a^P2.0030^ea^ va.msa~n~naani poraa.naani asa.mki.n.naani asa.mki.n.napubbaani, na sa.mkiiyanti na sa.mkiiyissanti, appa.tiku.t.thaani sama.nehi braahma.nehi vi~n~nuuhi. katamaani cattaari? anabhijjhaa, paribbaajakaa, dhammapada.m agga~n~na.m ratta~n~na.m va.msa~n~na.m poraa.na.m asa.mki.n.na.m asa.mki.n.napubba.m, na sa.mkiiyati na sa.mkiiyissati, appa.tiku.t.tha.m sama.nehi braahma.nehi vi~n~nuuhi. abyaapaado, paribbaajakaa, dhammapada.m...pe0... sammaasati, paribbaajakaa, dhammapada.m...pe0... sammaasamaadhi, paribbaajakaa, dhammapada.m agga~n~na.m ratta~n~na.m va.msa~n~na.m ^a^M1.0339^ea^ poraa.na.m asa.mki.n.na.m asa.mki.n.napubba.m, na sa.mkiiyati na sa.mkiiyissati, appa.tiku.t.tha.m sama.nehi braahma.nehi vi~n~nuuhi. imaani kho ^a^T2.0039^ea^, paribbaajakaa, cattaari dhammapadaani agga~n~naani ratta~n~naani va.msa~n~naani poraa.naani asa.mki.n.naani asa.mki.n.napubbaani, na sa.mkiiyanti na sa.mkiiyissanti, appa.tiku.t.thaani sama.nehi braahma.nehi vi~n~nuuhi.

[03] ``yo kho, paribbaajakaa, eva.m vadeyya -- `ahameta.m anabhijjha.m dhammapada.m paccakkhaaya abhijjhaalu.m kaamesu tibbasaaraaga.m sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa pa~n~naapessaamii'ti, tamaha.m tattha eva.m vadeyya.m -- `etu vadatu byaaharatu passaamissaanubhaava'nti. so vata, paribbaajakaa, anabhijjha.m dhammapada.m paccakkhaaya abhijjhaalu.m kaamesu tibbasaaraaga.m sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa pa~n~naapessatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] ``yo ^a^V1.0036^ea^ kho, paribbaajakaa, eva.m vadeyya -- `ahameta.m abyaapaada.m dhammapada.m paccakkhaaya byaapannacitta.m padu.t.thamanasa"nkappa.m sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa pa~n~naapessaamii'ti, tamaha.m tattha eva.m vadeyya.m -- `etu vadatu byaaharatu passaamissaanubhaava'nti. so vata, paribbaajakaa, abyaapaada.m dhammapada.m paccakkhaaya byaapannacitta.m padu.t.thamanasa"nkappa.m sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa pa~n~naapessatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] ``yo kho, paribbaajakaa, eva.m vadeyya -- `ahameta.m sammaasati.m dhammapada.m paccakkhaaya mu.t.thassati.m asampajaana.m sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa pa~n~naapessaamii'ti, tamaha.m tattha eva.m vadeyya.m -- `etu vadatu byaaharatu passaamissaanubhaava'nti. so vata, paribbaajakaa, sammaasati.m dhammapada.m paccakkhaaya mu.t.thassati.m asampajaana.m sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa pa~n~naapessatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] ``yo kho, paribbaajakaa, eva.m vadeyya -- `ahameta.m ^a^T2.0040^ea^ sammaasamaadhi.m dhammapada.m paccakkhaaya asamaahita.m vibbhantacitta.m sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa pa~n~naapessaamii'ti, tamaha.m tattha eva.m vadeyya.m -- `etu vadatu byaaharatu ^a^P2.0031^ea^ passaamissaanubhaava'nti. so vata, paribbaajakaa, sammaasamaadhi.m dhammapada.m paccakkhaaya asamaahita.m vibbhantacitta.m sama.na.m vaa braahma.na.m vaa pa~n~naapessatiiti neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.

[03] ``yo kho, paribbaajakaa, imaani cattaari dhammapadaani garahitabba.m pa.tikkositabba.m ma~n~neyya, tassa di.t.theva dhamme cattaaro sahadhammikaa vaadaanupaataa gaarayhaa ^a^M1.0340^ea^ .thaanaa {vaadaanuvaadaa gaarayha.m .thaana.m (ma0 ni0 3.8)} aagacchanti. katame cattaaro? anabhijjha.m ce bhava.m dhammapada.m garahati pa.tikkosati, ye ca hi {ye ca (ma0 ni0 3.142-143)} abhijjhaaluu kaamesu tibbasaaraagaa sama.nabraahma.naa te bhoto pujjaa te bhoto paasa.msaa. abyaapaada.m ce bhava.m dhammapada.m garahati pa.tikkosati, ye ca hi byaapannacittaa padu.t.thamanasa"nkappaa sama.nabraahma.naa te bhoto pujjaa te bhoto paasa.msaa. sammaasati.m ce bhava.m dhammapada.m garahati pa.tikkosati, ye ca hi mu.t.thassatii asampajaanaa sama.nabraahma.naa te bhoto pujjaa te bhoto paasa.msaa. sammaasamaadhi.m ce bhava.m dhammapada.m garahati pa.tikkosati, ye ca hi asamaahitaa vibbhantacittaa sama.nabraahma.naa te bhoto pujjaa te bhoto paasa.msaa.

[03] ``yo ^a^V1.0037^ea^ kho, paribbaajakaa, imaani cattaari dhammapadaani garahitabba.m pa.tikkositabba.m ma~n~neyya, tassa di.t.theva dhamme ime cattaaro sahadhammikaa vaadaanupaataa gaarayhaa .thaanaa aagacchanti ^a^T2.0041^ea^. yepi te paribbaajakaa ahesu.m ukkalaa vassabha~n~naa {vassabhi~n~naa (ka0) sa.m0 ni0 3.62 passitabba.m} ahetukavaadaa akiriyavaadaa natthikavaadaa, tepi imaani cattaari dhammapadaani na garahitabba.m na pa.tikkositabba.m ama~n~ni.msu. ta.m kissa hetu? nindaabyaarosanaupaarambhabhayaa''ti {upavaadabhayaati (ka0) ma0 ni0 3.150; sa.m0 ni0 3.62 passitabba.m}.
[21] ``abyaapanno sadaa sato, ajjhatta.m susamaahito.
[22] abhijjhaavinaye sikkha.m, appamattoti vuccatii''ti.. dasama.m.
[06] uruvelavaggo tatiyo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] dve uruvelaa loko kaa.lako {ko.liko (ka0)}, brahmacariyena pa~ncama.m.
[22] kuha.m santu.t.thi va.mso ca, dhammapada.m paribbaajakena caati..

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarimaani ^a^V1.0038^ea^ ^a^M1.0341^ea^ ^a^P2.0032^ea^, bhikkhave, cakkaani, yehi samannaagataana.m devamanussaana.m catucakka.m vattati, yehi samannaagataa devamanussaa nacirasseva mahantatta.m vepullatta.m paapu.nanti bhogesu. katamaani cattaari? patiruupadesavaaso, sappurisaavassayo {sappurisuupassayo (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, attasammaapa.nidhi, pubbe ca katapu~n~nataa -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, cattaari cakkaani, yehi samannaagataana.m devamanussaana.m catucakka.m vattati, yehi samannaagataa devamanussaa nacirasseva mahantatta.m vepullatta.m paapu.nanti bhogesuu''ti.
[21] ``patiruupe ^a^T2.0042^ea^ vase dese, ariyamittakaro siyaa.
[27] sammaapa.nidhisampanno, pubbe pu~n~nakato naro.
[22] dha~n~na.m dhana.m yaso kitti, sukha~nceta.mdhivattatii''ti.. pa.thama.m.
[03] 32^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarimaani, bhikkhave, sa"ngahavatthuuni. katamaani cattaari? daana.m, peyyavajja.m, atthacariyaa, samaanattataa -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, cattaari sa"ngahavatthuunii''ti.
[21] ``daana~nca peyyavajja~nca {sa"ngahe (a.t.thakathaaya.m paa.thantara.m) dii0 ni0 3.273 passitabba.m}, atthacariyaa ca yaa idha.
[27] samaanattataa ca dhammesu, tattha tattha yathaaraha.m.
[22] ete kho sa"ngahaa loke, rathassaa.niiva yaayato..
[21] ``ete ca sa"ngahaa naassu, na maataa puttakaara.naa.
[22] labhetha maana.m puuja.m vaa, pitaa vaa puttakaara.naa..
[21] ``yasmaa ^a^V1.0039^ea^ ca sa"ngahaa {sa"ngahe (a.t.thakathaaya.m paa.thantara.m) dii0 ni0 3.273 passitabba.m} ete, samavekkhanti pa.n.ditaa.
[22] tasmaa mahatta.m papponti, paasa.msaa ca bhavanti te''ti.. dutiya.m.

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ ``siiho ^a^M1.0342^ea^ ^a^P2.0033^ea^, bhikkhave, migaraajaa saayanhasamaya.m aasayaa nikkhamati. aasayaa nikkhamitvaa vijambhati. vijambhitvaa samantaa catuddisaa anuviloketi. samantaa catuddisaa anuviloketvaa tikkhattu.m siihanaada.m nadati. tikkhattu.m siihanaada.m naditvaa gocaraaya pakkamati. ye kho pana te, bhikkhave, tiracchaanagataa paa.naa siihassa migara~n~no nadato sadda.m su.nanti, te yebhuyyena bhaya.m sa.mvega.m santaasa.m aapajjanti. bila.m bilaasayaa pavisanti, daka.m dakaasayaa {udaka.m udakaasayaa (ka0) sa.m0 ni0 3.78; pa.ti0 ma0 a.t.tha0 1.1.37 passitabba.m} pavisanti, vana.m vanaasayaa pavisanti, aakaasa.m pakkhino bhajanti ^a^T2.0043^ea^. yepi te, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naagaa gaamanigamaraajadhaaniisu da.lhehi varattehi bandhanehi baddhaa, tepi taani bandhanaani sa~nchinditvaa sampadaaletvaa bhiitaa muttakariisa.m cajamaanaa yena vaa tena vaa palaayanti. eva.m mahiddhiko kho, bhikkhave, siiho migaraajaa tiracchaanagataana.m paa.naana.m, eva.m mahesakkho eva.m mahaanubhaavo.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, yadaa tathaagato loke uppajjati araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa, so dhamma.m deseti -- `iti sakkaayo, iti sakkaayasamudayo, iti sakkaayanirodho {sakkaayassa attha"ngamo (a.t.tha0, sa.m0 ni0 3.78) ``sakkaayanirodhagaaminii''ti pacchimapada.m pana passitabba.m}, iti sakkaayanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti. yepi te, bhikkhave, devaa diighaayukaa va.n.navanto sukhabahulaa uccesu vimaanesu cira.t.thitikaa, tepi tathaagatassa dhammadesana.m sutvaa yebhuyyena bhaya.m sa.mvega.m santaasa.m aapajjanti -- `aniccaa vata kira, bho, maya.m samaanaa niccamhaati ama~n~nimha; addhuvaa vata kira, bho, maya.m samaanaa dhuvamhaati ama~n~nimha; asassataa vata kira, bho, maya.m samaanaa sassatamhaati ama~n~nimha. maya.m kira, bho, aniccaa addhuvaa asassataa sakkaayapariyaapannaa'ti. eva.m mahiddhiko kho, bhikkhave, tathaagato sadevakassa lokassa, eva.m mahesakkho eva.m mahaanubhaavo''ti.
[21] ``yadaa ^a^V1.0040^ea^ ^a^P2.0034^ea^ buddho abhi~n~naaya, dhammacakka.m pavattayii.
[22] sadevakassa lokassa, satthaa appa.tipuggalo..
[21] ``sakkaaya~nca ^a^T2.0044^ea^ ^a^M1.0343^ea^ nirodha~nca, sakkaayassa ca sambhava.m.
[22] ariya~nca.t.tha"ngika.m magga.m, dukkhuupasamagaamina.m..
[21] ``yepi diighaayukaa devaa, va.n.navanto yasassino.
[22] bhiitaa santaasamaapaadu.m, siihassevi'taremigaa..
[21] ``aviitivattaa sakkaaya.m, aniccaa kira bho maya.m.
[22] sutvaa arahato vaakya.m, vippamuttassa taadino''ti {sa.m0 ni0 3.78}.. tatiya.m.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, aggappasaadaa. katame cattaaro? yaavataa, bhikkhave, sattaa apadaa vaa dvipadaa {dipadaa (sii0 pii0) a0 ni0 5.32; itivu0 90} vaa catuppadaa vaa bahuppadaa vaa ruupino vaa aruupino vaa sa~n~nino vaa asa~n~nino vaa nevasa~n~ninaasa~n~nino vaa, tathaagato tesa.m aggamakkhaayati araha.m sammaasambuddho. ye, bhikkhave, buddhe pasannaa, agge te pasannaa. agge kho pana pasannaana.m aggo vipaako hoti.

[03] ``yaavataa, bhikkhave, dhammaa sa"nkhataa, ariyo a.t.tha"ngiko maggo tesa.m aggamakkhaayati. ye, bhikkhave, ariye a.t.tha"ngike magge pasannaa, agge te pasannaa. agge kho pana pasannaana.m aggo vipaako hoti.

[03] ``yaavataa, bhikkhave, dhammaa sa"nkhataa vaa asa"nkhataa vaa, viraago tesa.m aggamakkhaayati, yadida.m madanimmadano pipaasavinayo aalayasamugghaato va.t.tupacchedo ta.nhaakkhayo viraago nirodho nibbaana.m. ye, bhikkhave, viraage dhamme pasannaa, agge te pasannaa. agge kho pana pasannaana.m aggo vipaako hoti.

[03] ``yaavataa ^a^V1.0041^ea^ ^a^T2.0045^ea^, bhikkhave, sa"nghaa vaa ga.naa vaa, tathaagatasaavakasa"ngho tesa.m aggamakkhaayati, yadida.m cattaari purisayugaani a.t.tha purisapuggalaa esa bhagavato saavakasa"ngho aahuneyyo paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa. ye ^a^P2.0035^ea^, bhikkhave, sa"nghe pasannaa ^a^M1.0344^ea^, agge te pasannaa. agge kho pana pasannaana.m aggo vipaako hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro aggappasaadaa''ti.
[21] ``aggato ve pasannaana.m, agga.m dhamma.m vijaanata.m.
[22] agge buddhe pasannaana.m, dakkhi.neyye anuttare..
[21] ``agge dhamme pasannaana.m, viraaguupasame sukhe.
[22] agge sa"nghe pasannaana.m, pu~n~nakkhette anuttare..
[21] ``aggasmi.m daana.m dadata.m, agga.m pu~n~na.m pava.d.dhati.
[22] agga.m aayu ca va.n.no ca, yaso kitti sukha.m bala.m..
[21] ``aggassa daataa medhaavii, aggadhammasamaahito.
[22] devabhuuto manusso vaa, aggappatto pamodatii''ti {itivu0 90}.. catuttha.m.

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. atha kho vassakaaro braahma.no magadhamahaamatto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho vassakaaro braahma.no magadhamahaamatto bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``catuuhi kho maya.m, bho gotama, dhammehi samannaagata.m mahaapa~n~na.m mahaapurisa.m pa~n~naapema ^a^T2.0046^ea^. katamehi catuuhi? idha, bho gotama, bahussuto hoti tassa tasseva sutajaatassa tassa tasseva kho pana bhaasitassa attha.m jaanaati -- `aya.m imassa bhaasitassa attho, aya.m imassa bhaasitassa ^a^V1.0042^ea^ attho'ti. satimaa kho pana hoti cirakatampi cirabhaasitampi saritaa anussaritaa yaani kho pana taani gaha.t.thakaani ki.mkara.niiyaani, tattha dakkho hoti analaso, tatrupaayaaya viima.msaaya samannaagato ala.m kaatu.m ala.m sa.mvidhaatu.m. imehi kho maya.m, bho gotama, catuuhi dhammehi samannaagata.m mahaapa~n~na.m mahaapurisa.m pa~n~naapema. sace me {sace pana me (sii0 ka0), sace me pana (pii0)}, bho gotama, anumoditabba.m anumodatu me bhava.m gotamo; sace ^a^M1.0345^ea^ pana me, bho gotama, pa.tikkositabba.m pa.tikkosatu me bhava.m gotamo''ti.

[03] ``neva kho tyaaha.m, braahma.na, anumodaami na pa.tikkosaami ^a^P2.0036^ea^. catuuhi kho aha.m, braahma.na, dhammehi samannaagata.m mahaapa~n~na.m mahaapurisa.m pa~n~naapemi. katamehi catuuhi? idha, braahma.na, bahujanahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti bahujanasukhaaya; bahussa janataa ariye ~naaye pati.t.thaapitaa, yadida.m kalyaa.nadhammataa kusaladhammataa. so ya.m vitakka.m aaka"nkhati vitakketu.m ta.m vitakka.m vitakketi, ya.m vitakka.m naaka"nkhati vitakketu.m na ta.m vitakka.m vitakketi; ya.m sa"nkappa.m aaka"nkhati sa"nkappetu.m ta.m sa"nkappa.m sa"nkappeti, ya.m sa"nkappa.m naaka"nkhati sa"nkappetu.m na ta.m sa"nkappa.m sa"nkappeti. iti cetovasippatto hoti vitakkapathe. catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii. aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme ^a^T2.0047^ea^ saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. neva kho tyaaha.m, braahma.na, anumodaami na pana pa.tikkosaami. imehi kho aha.m, braahma.na, catuuhi dhammehi samannaagata.m mahaapa~n~na.m mahaapurisa.m pa~n~naapemii''ti.

[03] ``acchariya.m, bho gotama, abbhuta.m, bho gotama! yaava subhaasita.m cida.m bhotaa gotamena. imehi ca maya.m, bho gotama, catuuhi dhammehi samannaagata.m bhavanta.m gotama.m dhaarema; bhava~nhi gotamo bahujanahitaaya pa.tipanno bahujanasukhaaya; bahu te {bahussa (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} janataa ariye ~naaye pati.t.thaapitaa, yadida.m kalyaa.nadhammataa kusaladhammataa. bhava~nhi gotamo ya.m vitakka.m aaka"nkhati vitakketu.m ta.m vitakka.m vitakketi, ya.m vitakka.m naaka"nkhati vitakketu.m na ta.m vitakka.m vitakketi, ya.m sa"nkappa.m aaka"nkhati sa"nkappetu.m ta.m sa"nkappa.m sa"nkappeti, ya.m sa"nkappa.m naaka"nkhati sa"nkappetu.m na ta.m sa"nkappa.m sa"nkappeti. bhava~nhi gotamo cetovasippatto vitakkapathe. bhava~nhi gotamo catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii ^a^V1.0043^ea^. bhava~nhi gotamo aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatii''ti.

[03] ``addhaa ^a^M1.0346^ea^ ^a^P2.0037^ea^ kho tyaaha.m, braahma.na, aasajja upaniiya vaacaa bhaasitaa. api ca, tyaaha.m byaakarissaami -- `aha~nhi, braahma.na, bahujanahitaaya pa.tipanno bahujanasukhaaya; bahu me {bahussa (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} janataa ariye ~naaye pati.t.thaapitaa, yadida.m kalyaa.nadhammataa kusaladhammataa. aha~nhi, braahma.na, ya.m vitakka.m aaka"nkhaami vitakketu.m ta.m vitakka.m vitakkemi, ya.m vitakka.m naaka"nkhaami vitakketu.m na ta.m vitakka.m vitakkemi ^a^T2.0048^ea^, ya.m sa"nkappa.m aaka"nkhaami sa"nkappetu.m ta.m sa"nkappa.m sa"nkappemi, ya.m sa"nkappa.m naaka"nkhaami sa"nkappetu.m na ta.m sa"nkappa.m sa"nkappemi. aha~nhi, braahma.na, cetovasippatto vitakkapathe. aha~nhi, braahma.na, catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii. aha~nhi, braahma.na, aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharaamii'''ti.
[21] ``yo vedi sabbasattaana.m, maccupaasappamocana.m.
[27] hita.m devamanussaana.m, ~naaya.m dhamma.m pakaasayi.
[22] ya.m ve disvaa ca sutvaa ca, pasiidanti bahuu janaa {pasiidati bahujjano (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}..
[21] ``maggaamaggassa kusalo, katakicco anaasavo.
[22] buddho antimasaariiro {antimadhaarito (ka0)}, ``(mahaapa~n~no) {( ) syaa0 potthake natthi} mahaapurisoti vuccatii''ti.. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa antaraa ca ukka.t.tha.m antaraa ca setabya.m addhaanamaggappa.tipanno hoti. do.nopi suda.m braahma.no antaraa ca ukka.t.tha.m antaraa ca setabya.m addhaanamaggappa.tipanno hoti. addasaa kho do.no braahma.no bhagavato paadesu cakkaani sahassaaraani sanemikaani sanaabhikaani sabbaakaaraparipuuraani; disvaanassa etadahosi -- ``acchariya.m vata, bho, abbhuta.m vata, bho! na vatimaani manussabhuutassa padaani bhavissantii''ti!! atha ^a^P2.0038^ea^ kho bhagavaa maggaa okkamma a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule nisiidi ^a^T2.0049^ea^ ^a^M1.0347^ea^ palla"nka.m ^a^V1.0044^ea^ aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. atha kho do.no braahma.no bhagavato padaani anugacchanto addasa bhagavanta.m a~n~natarasmi.m rukkhamuule nisinna.m paasaadika.m pasaadaniiya.m santindriya.m santamaanasa.m uttamadamathasamathamanuppatta.m danta.m gutta.m sa.myatindriya.m {yatindriya.m (mahaava0 257)} naaga.m. disvaana yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``devo no bhava.m bhavissatii''ti? ``na kho aha.m, braahma.na, devo bhavissaamii''ti. ``gandhabbo no bhava.m bhavissatii''ti? ``na kho aha.m, braahma.na, gandhabbo bhavissaamii''ti. ``yakkho no bhava.m bhavissatii''ti? ``na kho aha.m, braahma.na, yakkho bhavissaamii''ti. ``manusso no bhava.m bhavissatii''ti? ``na kho aha.m, braahma.na, manusso bhavissaamii''ti.

[03] ```devo no bhava.m bhavissatii'ti, iti pu.t.tho samaano -- `na kho aha.m, braahma.na, devo bhavissaamii'ti vadesi. `gandhabbo no bhava.m bhavissatii'ti, iti pu.t.tho samaano -- `na kho aha.m, braahma.na, gandhabbo bhavissaamii'ti vadesi. `yakkho no bhava.m bhavissatii'ti, iti pu.t.tho samaano -- `na kho aha.m, braahma.na, yakkho bhavissaamii'ti vadesi. `manusso no bhava.m bhavissatii'ti, iti pu.t.tho samaano -- `na kho aha.m, braahma.na, manusso bhavissaamii'ti vadesi. atha ko carahi bhava.m bhavissatii''ti?

[03] ``yesa.m kho aha.m, braahma.na, aasavaana.m appahiinattaa devo bhaveyya.m, te me aasavaa pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. yesa.m kho aha.m, braahma.na, aasavaana.m ^a^T2.0050^ea^ appahiinattaa gandhabbo bhaveyya.m... yakkho bhaveyya.m... manusso bhaveyya.m, te me aasavaa pahiinaa ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa. seyyathaapi, braahma.na, uppala.m vaa paduma.m vaa pu.n.dariika.m vaa udake jaata.m udake sa.mva.d.dha.m udakaa accuggamma ti.t.thati anupalitta.m ^a^P2.0039^ea^ udakena; evameva.m kho aha.m, braahma.na, loke jaato loke sa.mva.d.dho loka.m abhibhuyya viharaami anupalitto lokena. buddhoti ma.m, braahma.na, dhaarehii''ti.
[21] ``yena ^a^M1.0348^ea^ devuupapatyassa, gandhabbo vaa viha"ngamo.
[27] yakkhatta.m yena gaccheyya.m, manussatta~nca abbaje.
[22] te mayha.m, aasavaa khii.naa, viddhastaa vina.liikataa..
[21] ``pu.n.dariika.m ^a^V1.0045^ea^ yathaa vaggu, toyena nupalippati {nupalimpati (ka0)}.
[22] nupalippaami {nupalimpaami (ka0)} lokena, tasmaa buddhosmi braahma.naa''ti.. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ ``catuuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu abhabbo parihaanaaya nibbaanasseva santike. katamehi catuuhi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siilasampanno hoti, indriyesu guttadvaaro hoti, bhojane matta~n~nuu hoti, jaagariya.m anuyutto hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siilasampanno hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti paatimokkhasa.mvarasa.mvuto viharati aacaaragocarasampanno a.numattesu vajjesu bhayadassaavii, samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siilasampanno hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu indriyesu guttadvaaro hoti ^a^T2.0051^ea^? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa na nimittaggaahii hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m cakkhundriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati; rakkhati cakkhundriya.m; cakkhundriye sa.mvara.m aapajjati. sotena sadda.m sutvaa... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya na nimittaggaahii hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m manindriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa ^a^P2.0040^ea^ anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati; rakkhati manindriya.m; manindriye sa.mvara.m aapajjati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu indriyesu guttadvaaro hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^M1.0349^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhojane matta~n~nuu hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso aahaara.m aahaareti -- `neva davaaya na madaaya na ma.n.danaaya na vibhuusanaaya; yaavadeva imassa kaayassa .thitiyaa yaapanaaya vihi.msuuparatiyaa brahmacariyaanuggahaaya. iti puraa.na~nca vedana.m pa.tiha"nkhaami, nava~nca vedana.m na uppaadessaami, yaatraa ca me bhavissati, anavajjataa ca phaasuvihaaro caa'ti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhojane matta~n~nuu hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^V1.0046^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu jaagariya.m anuyutto hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu divasa.m ca"nkamena nisajjaaya aavara.niiyehi dhammehi citta.m parisodheti; rattiyaa pa.thama.m yaama.m ca"nkamena nisajjaaya aavara.niiyehi dhammehi citta.m parisodheti; rattiyaa majjhima.m yaama.m dakkhi.nena passena siihaseyya.m kappeti ^a^T2.0052^ea^, paade paada.m accaadhaaya, sato sampajaano u.t.thaanasa~n~na.m manasi karitvaa; rattiyaa pacchima.m yaama.m paccu.t.thaaya ca"nkamena nisajjaaya aavara.niiyehi dhammehi citta.m parisodheti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu jaagariya.m anuyutto hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuuhi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu abhabbo parihaanaaya, nibbaanasseva santiketi.
[21] ``siile pati.t.thito bhikkhu, indriyesu ca sa.mvuto.
[22] bhojanamhi ca matta~n~nuu, jaagariya.m anuyu~njati..
[21] ``eva.m vihaarii aataapii, ahorattamatandito.
[22] bhaavaya.m kusala.m dhamma.m, yogakkhemassa pattiyaa..
[21] ``appamaadarato bhikkhu, pamaade bhayadassi vaa {bhayadassaavii (ka0) dha0 pa0 32 dhammapadepi}.
[22] abhabbo parihaanaaya, nibbaanasseva santike''ti.. sattama.m.

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ ``panu.n.napaccekasacco ^a^P2.0041^ea^ {pa.nunnapaccekasacco (?)}, bhikkhave, bhikkhu `samavayasa.t.thesano passaddhakaayasa"nkhaaro patiliino'ti vuccati. katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu panu.n.napaccekasacco hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno yaani taani puthusama.nabraahma.naana.m ^a^M1.0350^ea^ puthupaccekasaccaani, seyyathida.m -- sassato lokoti vaa, asassato lokoti vaa, antavaa lokoti vaa, anantavaa lokoti vaa, ta.m jiiva.m ta.m sariiranti vaa, a~n~na.m jiiva.m a~n~na.m sariiranti vaa, hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati vaa, na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati vaa, hoti ca na ca hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati vaa, neva hoti na ^a^T2.0053^ea^ na hoti tathaagato para.m mara.naati vaa; sabbaani taani nu.n.naani honti panu.n.naani cattaani vantaani muttaani pahiinaani pa.tinissa.t.thaani. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu panu.n.napaccekasacco hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu patiliino hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno asmimaano pahiino hoti ucchinnamuulo taalaavatthukato anabhaava.mkato aayati.m anuppaadadhammo. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu patiliino hoti. panu.n.napaccekasacco, bhikkhave, bhikkhu `samavayasa.t.thesano passaddhakaayasa"nkhaaro patiliino'ti vuccatii''ti.

[03] 39^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^T2.0054^ea^ ^a^M1.0351^ea^ kho ujjayo braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho ujjayo braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``bhavampi no gotamo ya~n~na.m va.n.netii''ti ^a^V1.0048^ea^? ``na kho aha.m, braahma.na, sabba.m ya~n~na.m va.n.nemi; na panaaha.m, braahma.na, sabba.m ya~n~na.m na va.n.nemi. yathaaruupe kho, braahma.na, ya~n~ne gaavo ha~n~nanti, aje.lakaa ha~n~nanti, kukku.tasuukaraa ha~n~nanti, vividhaa paa.naa sa"nghaata.m aapajjanti; evaruupa.m kho aha.m, braahma.na, saarambha.m ya~n~na.m na va.n.nemi. ta.m kissa hetu? evaruupa~nhi, braahma.na, saarambha.m ya~n~na.m na upasa"nkamanti arahanto vaa arahattamagga.m vaa samaapannaa.

[03] 46^b^.^eb^ atha kho bhagavaa tassaa rattiyaa accayena bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``ima.m, bhikkhave, ratti.m rohitasso devaputto abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.no kevalakappa.m jetavana.m obhaasetvaa yenaaha.m tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa ma.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thito kho ^a^T2.0063^ea^, bhikkhave, rohitasso devaputto ma.m etadavoca -- `yattha nu kho, bhante {sa.m0 ni0 1.107}, na jaayati na jiiyati na miiyati na cavati na upapajjati, sakkaa nu kho so, bhante, gamanena lokassa anto ~naatu.m vaa da.t.thu.m vaa paapu.nitu.m vaa'ti? eva.m vutte aha.m, bhikkhave, rohitassa.m devaputta.m etadavoca.m -- `yattha kho, aavuso, na jaayati na jiiyati na miiyati na cavati na upapajjati, naaha.m ta.m gamanena lokassa anta.m ~naateyya.m da.t.theyya.m patteyyanti vadaamii'ti. eva.m vutte, bhikkhave, rohitasso devaputto ma.m etadavoca -- `acchariya.m, bhante, abbhuta.m, bhante! yaava subhaasitamida.m, bhante, bhagavataa -- yattha kho, aavuso, na jaayati na jiiyati na miiyati na cavati na upapajjati, naaha.m ta.m gamanena lokassa anta.m ~naateyya.m da.t.theyya.m patteyyanti vadaami'''.

[03] ``bhuutapubbaaha.m, bhante, rohitasso naama isi ahosi.m bhojaputto iddhimaa vehaasa"ngamo. tassa mayha.m, bhante, evaruupo javo ahosi, seyyathaapi naama da.lhadhammaa dhanuggaho sikkhito katahattho katuupaasano lahukena asanena appakasirena tiriya.m taalacchaaya.m atipaateyya ^a^M1.0359^ea^. tassa mayha.m, bhante, evaruupo padaviitihaaro ahosi, seyyathaapi naama puratthimaa samuddaa pacchimo samuddo. tassa mayha.m, bhante, evaruupena javena samannaagatassa evaruupena ca padaviitihaarena evaruupa.m icchaagata.m uppajji -- aha.m gamanena lokassa anta.m paapu.nissaamii''ti. so kho aha.m, bhante, a~n~natreva asitapiitakhaayitasaayitaa ^a^P2.0050^ea^ a~n~natra uccaarapassaavakammaa ^a^T2.0064^ea^ a~n~natra niddaakilamathapa.tivinodanaa ^a^V1.0057^ea^ vassasataayuko vassasatajiivii vassasata.m gantvaa appatvaava lokassa anta.m antaraayeva kaala"nkato.

[03] 50^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome ^a^P2.0053^ea^, bhikkhave {cuu.lava0 447}, candimasuuriyaana.m upakkilesaa, yehi upakkilesehi upakkili.t.thaa candimasuuriyaa na tapanti na bhaasanti na virocanti. katame cattaaro? abbhaa, bhikkhave, candimasuuriyaana.m upakkilesaa, yena upakkilesena upakkili.t.thaa candimasuuriyaa na tapanti na bhaasanti na virocanti.
