[03] 61^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V1.0076^ea^ kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``cattaarome ^a^M1.0377^ea^ ^a^P2.0066^ea^, gahapati, dhammaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa dullabhaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro? bhogaa me uppajjantu sahadhammenaati, aya.m pa.thamo dhammo i.t.tho ^a^T2.0086^ea^ kanto manaapo dullabho lokasmi.m.
[03] ``bhoge laddhaa sahadhammena yaso me aagacchatu saha ~naatiihi saha upajjhaayehiiti, aya.m dutiyo dhammo i.t.tho kanto manaapo dullabho lokasmi.m.
[03] ``bhoge laddhaa sahadhammena yasa.m laddhaa saha ~naatiihi saha upajjhaayehi cira.m jiivaami diighamaayu.m paalemiiti, aya.m tatiyo dhammo i.t.tho kanto manaapo dullabho lokasmi.m.

[03] ``bhoge laddhaa sahadhammena yasa.m laddhaa saha ~naatiihi saha upajjhaayehi cira.m jiivitvaa diighamaayu.m paaletvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjaamiiti, aya.m catuttho dhammo i.t.tho kanto manaapo dullabho lokasmi.m. ime kho, gahapati, cattaaro dhammaa i.t.thaa kantaa manaapaa dullabhaa lokasmi.m.

[03] ``imesa.m kho, gahapati, catunna.m dhammaana.m i.t.thaana.m kantaana.m manaapaana.m dullabhaana.m lokasmi.m cattaaro dhammaa pa.tilaabhaaya sa.mvattanti. katame cattaaro? saddhaasampadaa, siilasampadaa, caagasampadaa, pa~n~naasampadaa.

[03] ``katamaa ^a^V1.0077^ea^ ca, gahapati, saddhaasampadaa? idha, gahapati, ariyasaavako saddho hoti, saddahati tathaagatassa bodhi.m -- `itipi so bhagavaa araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi, satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa'ti. aya.m vuccati, gahapati, saddhaasampadaa.

[03] ``katamaa ca, gahapati, siilasampadaa? idha, gahapati, ariyasaavako paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti...pe0... suraamerayamajjapamaada.t.thaanaa pa.tivirato hoti. aya.m vuccati, gahapati, siilasampadaa.

[03] ``katamaa ca, gahapati, caagasampadaa? idha, gahapati, ariyasaavako vigatamalamaccherena ^a^T2.0087^ea^ cetasaa agaara.m ajjhaavasati muttacaago payatapaa.ni vosaggarato yaacayogo daanasa.mvibhaagarato. aya.m vuccati, gahapati, caagasampadaa.

[03] ``katamaa ^a^M1.0378^ea^ ca, gahapati, pa~n~naasampadaa? abhijjhaavisamalobhaabhibhuutena ^a^P2.0067^ea^, gahapati, cetasaa viharanto akicca.m karoti, kicca.m aparaadheti. akicca.m karonto kicca.m aparaadhento yasaa ca sukhaa ca dha.msati. byaapaadaabhibhuutena, gahapati, cetasaa viharanto akicca.m karoti, kicca.m aparaadheti. akicca.m karonto kicca.m aparaadhento yasaa ca sukhaa ca dha.msati. thinamiddhaabhibhuutena, gahapati, cetasaa viharanto akicca.m karoti kicca.m aparaadheti. akicca.m karonto kicca.m aparaadhento yasaa ca sukhaa ca dha.msati. uddhaccakukkuccaabhibhuutena, gahapati, cetasaa viharanto akicca.m karoti, kicca.m aparaadheti. akicca.m karonto kicca.m aparaadhento yasaa ca sukhaa ca dha.msati. vicikicchaabhibhuutena, gahapati, cetasaa viharanto akicca.m karoti, kicca.m aparaadheti. akicca.m karonto kicca.m aparaadhento yasaa ca sukhaa ca dha.msati.

[03] ``sa kho so, gahapati, ariyasaavako abhijjhaavisamalobho cittassa upakkilesoti, iti viditvaa abhijjhaavisamalobha.m cittassa upakkilesa.m pajahati. byaapaado cittassa upakkilesoti, iti viditvaa byaapaada.m cittassa upakkilesa.m pajahati. thinamiddha.m cittassa upakkilesoti, iti viditvaa thinamiddha.m cittassa upakkilesa.m pajahati. uddhaccakukkucca.m cittassa ^a^V1.0078^ea^ upakkilesoti, iti viditvaa uddhaccakukkucca.m cittassa upakkilesa.m pajahati. vicikicchaa cittassa upakkilesoti, iti viditvaa vicikiccha.m cittassa upakkilesa.m pajahati.

[03] ``yato ca kho, gahapati, ariyasaavakassa ^a^T2.0088^ea^ abhijjhaavisamalobho cittassa upakkilesoti, iti viditvaa abhijjhaavisamalobho cittassa upakkileso pahiino hoti. byaapaado cittassa upakkilesoti, iti viditvaa byaapaado cittassa upakkileso pahiino hoti. thinamiddha.m cittassa upakkilesoti, iti viditvaa thinamiddha.m cittassa upakkileso pahiino hoti. uddhaccakukkucca.m cittassa upakkilesoti, iti viditvaa uddhaccakukkucca.m cittassa upakkileso pahiino hoti. vicikicchaa cittassa upakkilesoti, iti viditvaa vicikicchaa cittassa upakkileso pahiino hoti. aya.m vuccati, gahapati, ariyasaavako mahaapa~n~no puthupa~n~no aapaatadaso {aapaathadaso (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} pa~n~naasampanno {haasapa~n~no (ka0)}. aya.m vuccati, gahapati ^a^M1.0379^ea^, pa~n~naasampadaa. imesa.m kho, gahapati, catunna.m dhammaana.m i.t.thaana.m kantaana.m manaapaana.m dullabhaana.m lokasmi.m ime cattaaro dhammaa pa.tilaabhaaya sa.mvattanti.

[03] ``sa kho so, gahapati, ariyasaavako u.t.thaanaviiriyaadhigatehi bhogehi baahaabalaparicitehi sedaavakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi cattaari pattakammaani kattaa hoti. katamaani cattaari? idha gahapati, ariyasaavako u.t.thaanaviiriyaadhigatehi bhogehi baahaabalaparicitehi sedaavakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi attaana.m sukheti pii.neti sammaa sukha.m pariharati. maataapitaro sukheti pii.neti sammaa sukha.m pariharati. puttadaaradaasakammakaraporise sukheti pii.neti sammaa sukha.m pariharati. mittaamacce sukheti pii.neti sammaa sukha.m pariharati. idamassa pa.thama.m .thaanagata.m hoti pattagata.m aayatanaso paribhutta.m.

[03] ``puna ^a^P2.0068^ea^ capara.m, gahapati, ariyasaavako u.t.thaanaviiriyaadhigatehi bhogehi baahaabalaparicitehi sedaavakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi yaa taa honti aapadaa aggito vaa udakato vaa raajato vaa corato vaa appiyato vaa daayaadato {a0 ni0 5.41}, tathaaruupaasu aapadaasu pariyodhaaya ^a^V1.0079^ea^ sa.mvattati. sotthi.m ^a^T2.0089^ea^ attaana.m karoti. idamassa dutiya.m .thaanagata.m hoti pattagata.m aayatanaso paribhutta.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, gahapati, ariyasaavako u.t.thaanaviiriyaadhigatehi bhogehi baahaabalaparicitehi sedaavakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi pa~ncabali.m kattaa hoti -- ~naatibali.m, atithibali.m, pubbapetabali.m, raajabali.m, devataabali.m. idamassa tatiya.m .thaanagata.m hoti pattagata.m aayatanaso paribhutta.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, gahapati, ariyasaavako u.t.thaanaviiriyaadhigatehi bhogehi baahaabalaparicitehi sedaavakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi ye te sama.nabraahma.naa madappamaadaa pa.tivirataa khantisoracce nivi.t.thaa ekamattaana.m damenti, ekamattaana.m samenti, ekamattaana.m parinibbaapenti, tathaaruupesu sama.nabraahma.nesu uddhaggika.m dakkhi.na.m pati.t.thaapeti sovaggika.m sukhavipaaka.m saggasa.mvattanika.m ^a^M1.0380^ea^. idamassa catuttha.m .thaanagata.m hoti pattagata.m aayatanaso paribhutta.m.

[03] ``sa kho so, gahapati, ariyasaavako u.t.thaanaviiriyaadhigatehi bhogehi baahaabalaparicitehi sedaavakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi imaani cattaari pattakammaani kattaa hoti. yassa kassaci, gahapati, a~n~natra imehi catuuhi pattakammehi bhogaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, ime vuccanti, gahapati, bhogaa a.t.thaanagataa apattagataa anaayatanaso paribhuttaa. yassa kassaci, gahapati, imehi catuuhi pattakammehi bhogaa parikkhaya.m gacchanti, ime vuccanti, gahapati, bhogaa .thaanagataa pattagataa aayatanaso paribhuttaa''ti.
[21] ``bhuttaa bhogaa bhataa bhaccaa {gataa bhuutaa (ka0) bha.taa bhaccaa (syaa0 ka.m0)}, viti.n.naa aapadaasu me.
[27] uddhaggaa dakkhi.naa dinnaa, atho pa~ncabalii kataa.
[22] upa.t.thitaa ^a^T2.0090^ea^ siilavanto, sa~n~nataa brahmacaarayo..
[21] ``yadattha.m bhoga.m iccheyya, pa.n.dito gharamaavasa.m.
[22] so ^a^P2.0069^ea^ me attho anuppatto, kata.m ananutaapiya.m..
[21] ``eta.m ^a^V1.0080^ea^ {eva.m (ka0)} anussara.m macco, ariyadhamme .thito naro.
[22] idheva na.m pasa.msanti, pecca sagge pamodatii''ti.. pa.thama.m.

[03] 62^b^.^eb^ atha kho anaathapi.n.diko gahapati yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho anaathapi.n.dika.m gahapati.m bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``cattaarimaani, gahapati, sukhaani adhigamaniiyaani gihinaa kaamabhoginaa kaalena kaala.m samayena samaya.m upaadaaya. katamaani cattaari? atthisukha.m, bhogasukha.m, aana.nyasukha.m {a.na.nasukha.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, anavajjasukha.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, gahapati, atthisukha.m? idha, gahapati, kulaputtassa bhogaa honti u.t.thaanaviiriyaadhigataa baahaabalaparicitaa sedaavakkhittaa dhammikaa dhammaladdhaa ^a^M1.0381^ea^. so `bhogaa me atthi u.t.thaanaviiriyaadhigataa baahaabalaparicitaa sedaavakkhittaa dhammikaa dhammaladdhaa'ti adhigacchati sukha.m, adhigacchati somanassa.m. ida.m vuccati, gahapati, atthisukha.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, gahapati, bhogasukha.m? idha, gahapati, kulaputto u.t.thaanaviiriyaadhigatehi bhogehi baahaabalaparicitehi sedaavakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi paribhu~njati pu~n~naani ca karoti. so `u.t.thaanaviiriyaadhigatehi bhogehi baahaabalaparicitehi sedaavakkhittehi dhammikehi dhammaladdhehi paribhu~njaami pu~n~naani ca karomii'ti adhigacchati sukha.m, adhigacchati somanassa.m. ida.m vuccati, gahapati, bhogasukha.m ^a^T2.0091^ea^.

[03] ``katama~nca, gahapati, aana.nyasukha.m? idha, gahapati, kulaputto na kassaci ki~nci dhaareti appa.m vaa bahu.m vaa. so `na kassaci ki~nci dhaaremi {ki~nci vaa deti (ka0)} appa.m vaa bahu.m vaa'ti adhigacchati sukha.m, adhigacchati somanassa.m. ida.m vuccati, gahapati, aana.nyasukha.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, gahapati, anavajjasukha.m? idha, gahapati, ariyasaavako anavajjena kaayakammena samannaagato hoti, anavajjena vaciikammena samannaagato hoti, anavajjena manokammena ^a^V1.0081^ea^ samannaagato hoti. so `anavajjenamhi ^a^P2.0070^ea^ kaayakammena samannaagato, anavajjena vaciikammena samannaagato, anavajjena manokammena samannaagato'ti adhigacchati sukha.m, adhigacchati somanassa.m. ida.m vuccati, gahapati, anavajjasukha.m. imaani kho, gahapati, cattaari sukhaani adhigamaniiyaani gihinaa kaamabhoginaa kaalena kaala.m samayena samaya.m upaadaayaa''ti.
[21] ``aana.nyasukha.m ~natvaana, atho atthisukha.m para.m.
[22] bhu~nja.m bhogasukha.m macco, tato pa~n~naa vipassati..
[21] ``vipassamaano jaanaati, ubho bhoge sumedhaso.
[22] anavajjasukhasseta.m, kala.m naagghati so.lasi''nti.. dutiya.m.

[03] 63^b^.^eb^ ``sabrahmakaani, bhikkhave {itivu0 106}, taani kulaani yesa.m puttaana.m maataapitaro ajjhaagaare puujitaa honti. sapubbaacariyakaani, bhikkhave, taani kulaani ^a^M1.0382^ea^, yesa.m puttaana.m maataapitaro ajjhaagaare puujitaa honti. sapubbadevataani {sapubbadevaani (syaa0 ka.m0)}, bhikkhave, taani kulaani yesa.m puttaana.m maataapitaro ajjhaagaare puujitaa honti. saahuneyyakaani, bhikkhave, taani kulaani yesa.m puttaana.m maataapitaro ^a^T2.0092^ea^ ajjhaagaare puujitaa honti.

[03] ``brahmaati, bhikkhave, maataapituuna.m {maataapitunna.m (sii0 pii0)} eta.m adhivacana.m. pubbaacariyaati, bhikkhave, maataapituuna.m eta.m adhivacana.m. pubbadevataati {pubbadevaati (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)}, bhikkhave, maataapituuna.m eta.m adhivacana.m. aahuneyyaati, bhikkhave, maataapituuna.m eta.m adhivacana.m. ta.m kissa hetu? bahukaaraa, bhikkhave, maataapitaro, puttaana.m aapaadakaa posakaa imassa lokassa dassetaaro''ti.
[21] ``brahmaati maataapitaro, pubbaacariyaati vuccare.
[22] aahuneyyaa ca puttaana.m, pajaaya anukampakaa..
[21] ``tasmaa ^a^V1.0082^ea^ hi ne namasseyya, sakkareyya ca pa.n.dito.
[27] annena atha paanena, vatthena sayanena ca.
[22] ucchaadanena nhaapanena, paadaana.m dhovanena ca..
[21] ``taaya na.m paaricariyaaya, maataapituusu pa.n.ditaa.
[22] idheva na.m pasa.msanti, pecca sagge pamodatii''ti.. tatiya.m.

[03] 64^b^.^eb^ ``catuuhi ^a^P2.0071^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye. katamehi catuuhi? paa.naatipaatii hoti, adinnaadaayii hoti, kaamesumicchaacaarii hoti, musaavaadii hoti -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuuhi dhammehi samannaagato yathaabhata.m nikkhitto eva.m niraye''ti.
[21] ``paa.naatipaato adinnaadaana.m, musaavaado ca vuccati.
[22] paradaaragamana~ncaapi, nappasa.msanti pa.n.ditaa''ti.. catuttha.m.

[03] 65^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame ^a^T2.0093^ea^ cattaaro? ruupappamaa.no ruupappasanno, ghosappamaa.no ghosappasanno ^a^M1.0383^ea^, luukhappamaa.no luukhappasanno, dhammappamaa.no dhammappasanno -- ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti.
[21] ``ye ca ruupe pamaa.ni.msu {ye ca ruupena paami.msu (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, ye ca ghosena anvaguu.
[22] chandaraagavasuupetaa, naabhijaananti te janaa {na te jaananti ta.m janaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}..
[21] ``ajjhatta~nca ^a^V1.0083^ea^ na jaanaati, bahiddhaa ca na passati.
[22] samantaavara.no baalo, sa ve ghosena vuyhati..
[21] ``ajjhatta~nca na jaanaati, bahiddhaa ca vipassati.
[22] bahiddhaa phaladassaavii, sopi ghosena vuyhati..
[21] ``ajjhatta~nca pajaanaati, bahiddhaa ca vipassati.
[22] viniivara.nadassaavii, na so ghosena vuyhatii''ti.. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 66^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro? saraago, sadoso, samoho, samaano -- ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti.
[21] ``saarattaa ^a^P2.0072^ea^ rajaniiyesu, piyaruupaabhinandino.
[22] mohena aavutaa {adhamaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} sattaa, baddhaa {bandhaa (ka0)} va.d.dhenti bandhana.m..
[21] ``raagaja.m dosaja~ncaapi, mohaja.m caapaviddasuu.
[22] karontaakusala.m kamma.m {dhamma.m (ka0)}, savighaata.m dukhudraya.m..
[21] ``avijjaanivutaa posaa, andhabhuutaa acakkhukaa.
[22] yathaa dhammaa tathaa santaa, na tassevanti {nassevanti (sii0)} ma~n~nare''ti.. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 67^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T2.0094^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tena kho pana samayena saavatthiya.m a~n~nataro bhikkhu ahinaa da.t.tho kaala"nkato hoti. atha kho ^a^V1.0084^ea^ sambahulaa bhikkhuu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami.msu; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi.msu. ekamanta.m nisinnaa kho te bhikkhuu bhagavanta.m etadavocu.m -- ``idha ^a^M1.0384^ea^, bhante, saavatthiya.m a~n~nataro bhikkhu ahinaa da.t.tho kaala"nkato''ti.

[03] ``na hi nuuna {na ha nuuna (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cattaari ahiraajakulaani mettena cittena phari. sace hi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cattaari ahiraajakulaani mettena cittena phareyya, na hi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ahinaa da.t.tho kaala"nkareyya.

[03] ``katamaani cattaari? viruupakkha.m ahiraajakula.m, eraapatha.m ahiraajakula.m, chabyaaputta.m ahiraajakula.m, ka.nhaagotamaka.m ahiraajakula.m. na hi nuuna so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imaani cattaari ahiraajakulaani mettena cittena phari. sace hi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imaani cattaari ahiraajakulaani mettena cittena phareyya, na hi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ahinaa da.t.tho kaala"nkareyya.
[03] ``anujaanaami, bhikkhave, imaani cattaari ahiraajakulaani mettena cittena pharitu.m attaguttiyaa attarakkhaaya attaparittaayaa''ti.
[21] {cuu.lava0 251; jaa0 1.2.105 passitabba.m} ``viruupakkhehi me metta.m, metta.m eraapathehi me.
[22] chabyaaputtehi me metta.m, metta.m ka.nhaagotamakehi ca..
[21] ``apaadakehi me metta.m, metta.m dvipaadakehi {dipaadakehi (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} me.
[22] catuppadehi ^a^P2.0073^ea^ me metta.m, metta.m bahuppadehi me..
[21] ``maa ^a^T2.0095^ea^ ma.m apaadako hi.msi, maa ma.m hi.msi dvipaadako {dipaadako (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}.
[22] maa ma.m catuppado hi.msi, maa ma.m hi.msi bahuppado..
[21] ``sabbe sattaa sabbe paa.naa, sabbe bhuutaa ca kevalaa.
[22] sabbe bhadraani passantu, maa ka~nci {ki~nci (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} paapamaagamaa..
[21] ``appamaa.no ^a^V1.0085^ea^ buddho, appamaa.no dhammo.
[22] appamaa.no sa"ngho, pamaa.navantaani sariisapaani {siri.msapaani (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}..
[21] ``ahivicchikaa satapadii, u.n.nanaabhii sarabuu muusikaa.
[27] kataa me rakkhaa kataa me parittaa {kata.m me paritta.m (?)}, pa.tikkamantu bhuutaani.
[22] soha.m namo bhagavato, namo sattanna.m sammaasambuddhaana''nti.. sattama.m.

[03] 68^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^M1.0385^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati gijjhakuu.te pabbate acirapakkante devadatte. tatra kho bhagavaa devadatta.m aarabbha bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``attavadhaaya, bhikkhave {cuu.lava0 252; sa.m0 ni0 2.184}, devadattassa laabhasakkaarasiloko udapaadi. paraabhavaaya, bhikkhave, devadattassa laabhasakkaarasiloko udapaadi.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, kadalii attavadhaaya phala.m deti, paraabhavaaya phala.m deti; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, attavadhaaya devadattassa laabhasakkaarasiloko udapaadi, paraabhavaaya devadattassa laabhasakkaarasiloko udapaadi.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, ve.lu attavadhaaya phala.m deti, paraabhavaaya phala.m deti; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, attavadhaaya devadattassa laabhasakkaarasiloko udapaadi, paraabhavaaya devadattassa laabhasakkaarasiloko udapaadi.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, na.lo attavadhaaya phala.m deti, paraabhavaaya phala.m deti; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, attavadhaaya devadattassa laabhasakkaarasiloko udapaadi, paraabhavaaya devadattassa ^a^T2.0096^ea^ laabhasakkaarasiloko udapaadi.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, vadhukaa ya~n~nadeva ratti.m vaa diva.m vaa aaniitaa hoti, taavadevassaa tibba.m hirottappa.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti sassuyaapi sasurepi saamikepi antamaso daasakammakaraporisesu. saa aparena samayena sa.mvaasamanvaaya vissaasamanvaaya sassumpi sasurampi saamikampi evamaaha -- `apetha, ki.m pana tumhe jaanaathaa'ti! evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhikkhu ya~n~nadeva ratti.m vaa diva.m vaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti, taavadevassa tibba.m hirottappa.m paccupa.t.thita.m hoti bhikkhuusu bhikkhuniisu upaasakesu upaasikaasu antamaso aaraamikasama.nuddesesu. so aparena samayena sa.mvaasamanvaaya vissaasamanvaaya aacariyampi upajjhaayampi evamaaha -- `apetha, ki.m pana tumhe jaanaathaa'ti! tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `adhunaagatavadhukaasamena cetasaa viharissaamaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave, sikkhitabba''nti. tatiya.m.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo tamo hoti tamaparaaya.no? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo niice kule paccaajaato hoti -- ca.n.daalakule vaa venakule vaa nesaadakule vaa rathakaarakule vaa pukkusakule vaa dalidde appannapaanabhojane kasiravuttike, yattha kasirena ghaasacchaado labbhati. so ca hoti dubba.n.no duddasiko oko.timako bavhaabaadho kaa.no vaa ku.nii vaa kha~njo vaa pakkhahato vaa, na laabhii annassa paanassa vatthassa yaanassa maalaagandhavilepanassa seyyaavasathapadiipeyyassa. so kaayena duccarita.m carati, vaacaaya duccarita.m carati, manasaa duccarita.m carati. so kaayena duccarita.m caritvaa, vaacaaya duccarita.m caritvaa, manasaa duccarita.m caritvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo tamo hoti tamaparaaya.no.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo tamo hoti jotiparaaya.no? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo niice kule paccaajaato hoti -- ca.n.daalakule vaa venakule vaa nesaadakule vaa rathakaarakule vaa pukkusakule vaa dalidde appannapaanabhojane kasiravuttike, yattha kasirena ghaasacchaado labbhati; so ca hoti dubba.n.no duddasiko oko.timako bavhaabaadho kaa.no vaa ku.nii vaa kha~njo vaa pakkhahato vaa na laabhii annassa paanassa vatthassa yaanassa maalaagandhavilepanassa seyyaavasathapadiipeyyassa. so kaayena sucarita.m carati, vaacaaya sucarita.m carati, manasaa sucarita.m carati. so kaayena sucarita.m caritvaa, vaacaaya ^a^T2.0111^ea^ sucarita.m caritvaa, manasaa sucarita.m caritvaa kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapajjati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo tamo hoti jotiparaaya.no.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo sama.nesu sama.nasukhumaalo hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yaacitova bahula.m ciivara.m paribhu~njati, appa.m ayaacito; yaacitova bahula.m pi.n.dapaata.m paribhu~njati, appa.m ayaacito; yaacitova bahula.m senaasana.m paribhu~njati, appa.m ayaacito; yaacitova bahula.m gilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m paribhu~njati, appa.m ayaacito. yehi kho pana sabrahmacaariihi saddhi.m viharati, tyassa {tyaassa (sii0) a0 ni0 5.104} manaapeneva bahula.m kaayakammena samudaacaranti, appa.m ^a^M1.0400^ea^ amanaapena; manaapeneva bahula.m vaciikammena samudaacaranti, appa.m amanaapena; manaapeneva bahula.m manokammena samudaacaranti, appa.m amanaapena; manaapa.myeva bahula.m upahaara.m upaharanti, appa.m amanaapa.m. yaani kho pana taani vedayitaani pittasamu.t.thaanaani vaa semhasamu.t.thaanaani vaa vaatasamu.t.thaanaani vaa sannipaatikaani vaa utupari.naamajaani vaa visamaparihaarajaani vaa opakkamikaani vaa kammavipaakajaani vaa, taani panassa na bahudeva uppajjanti. appaabaadho hoti. catunna.m jhaanaana.m aabhicetasikaana.m ^a^T2.0115^ea^ di.t.thadhammasukhavihaaraana.m nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii, aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m ^a^P2.0088^ea^ pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme ^a^V1.0102^ea^ saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo sama.nesu sama.nasukhumaalo hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^M1.0403^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalo sama.napu.n.dariiko hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu udayabbayaanupassii viharati -- `iti ruupa.m, iti ruupassa samudayo, iti ruupassa attha"ngamo; iti vedanaa...pe0... iti sa~n~naa...pe0... iti sa"nkhaaraa...pe0... iti vi~n~naa.na.m, iti vi~n~naa.nassa samudayo, iti vi~n~naa.nassa attha"ngamo'ti ^a^V1.0105^ea^; no ca kho a.t.tha vimokkhe kaayena phusitvaa viharati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo sama.napu.n.dariiko hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo sama.napadumo hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa~ncasu upaadaanakkhandhesu udayabbayaanupassii viharati -- `iti ruupa.m, iti ruupassa samudayo, iti ruupassa attha"ngamo; iti vedanaa...pe0... iti sa~n~naa...pe0... iti sa"nkhaaraa...pe0... iti vi~n~naa.na.m, iti vi~n~naa.nassa samudayo, iti vi~n~naa.nassa attha"ngamo'ti ^a^P2.0091^ea^; a.t.tha ca vimokkhe kaayena phusitvaa viharati ^a^T2.0119^ea^. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo sama.napadumo hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo sama.nesu sama.nasukhumaalo hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yaacitova bahula.m ciivara.m paribhu~njati, appa.m ayaacito...pe0... mameva ta.m, bhikkhave, sammaa vadamaano vadeyya sama.nesu sama.nasukhumaaloti. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti. dasama.m.

[03] 91^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome ^a^V1.0106^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro? asuro asuraparivaaro, asuro devaparivaaro, devo asuraparivaaro, devo devaparivaaro.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^M1.0404^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalo asuro hoti asuraparivaaro? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dussiilo hoti paapadhammo, parisaapissa hoti dussiilaa paapadhammaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo asuro hoti asuraparivaaro.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo asuro hoti ^a^T2.0120^ea^ devaparivaaro? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dussiilo hoti paapadhammo, parisaa ca khvassa hoti siilavatii kalyaa.nadhammaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo asuro hoti devaparivaaro.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo devo hoti asuraparivaaro? idha ^a^P2.0092^ea^, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo siilavaa hoti kalyaa.nadhammo, parisaa ca khvassa hoti dussiilaa paapadhammaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo devo hoti asuraparivaaro.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo devo hoti devaparivaaro? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo siilavaa hoti kalyaa.nadhammo, parisaapissa hoti siilavatii kalyaa.nadhammaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo devo hoti, devaparivaaro. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 92^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome ^a^V1.0107^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo laabhii hoti ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa, na laabhii adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya. idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo laabhii hoti adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya, na laabhii ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa. idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo na ceva laabhii hoti ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa na ca laabhii adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya. idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo laabhii ceva hoti ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa laabhii ca adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti. dutiya.m.

[03] 93^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome ^a^M1.0405^ea^ ^a^T2.0121^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo laabhii hoti ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa, na laabhii adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya. idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo laabhii hoti adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya, na laabhii ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa. idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo na ceva laabhii hoti ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa na ca laabhii adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya. idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo laabhii ceva hoti ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa laabhii ca adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya.

[03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m puggalo laabhii hoti ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa ^a^P2.0093^ea^ na laabhii adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya, tena, bhikkhave, puggalena ajjhatta.m cetosamathe pati.t.thaaya adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya yogo kara.niiyo. so aparena samayena laabhii ceva hoti ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa laabhii ca adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya.

[03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m puggalo laabhii adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya na laabhii ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa, tena, bhikkhave, puggalena adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya pati.t.thaaya ajjhatta.m cetosamathe yogo ^a^V1.0108^ea^ kara.niiyo. so aparena samayena laabhii ceva hoti adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya laabhii ca ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa.

[03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m puggalo na ceva laabhii ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa na ca laabhii adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya, tena, bhikkhave, puggalena tesa.myeva kusalaana.m dhammaana.m pa.tilaabhaaya adhimatto chando ca vaayaamo ca ussaaho ca usso.lhii ca appa.tivaanii ca sati ca sampaja~n~na~nca kara.niiya.m. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, aadittacelo vaa aadittasiiso vaa tasseva {tassa tasseva (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} celassa vaa siisassa vaa nibbaapanaaya adhimatta.m chanda~nca vaayaama~nca ussaaha~nca usso.lhi~nca appa.tivaani~nca sati~nca sampaja~n~na~nca kareyya; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, tena puggalena tesa.myeva kusalaana.m dhammaana.m pa.tilaabhaaya adhimatto chando ca vaayaamo ca ussaaho ca usso.lhii ca appa.tivaanii ca ^a^M1.0406^ea^ sati ^a^T2.0122^ea^ ca sampaja~n~na~nca kara.niiya.m. so aparena samayena laabhii ceva hoti ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa laabhii ca adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya.

[03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m puggalo laabhii ceva hoti ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa laabhii ca adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya, tena, bhikkhave, puggalena tesuyeva kusalesu dhammesu pati.t.thaaya uttari {uttari.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} aasavaana.m khayaaya yogo kara.niiyo. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti. tatiya.m.

[03] 94^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo laabhii hoti ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa, na laabhii adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya. idha ^a^P2.0094^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo laabhii hoti adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya, na laabhii ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa. idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo na ceva laabhii hoti ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa na ca laabhii adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya. idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo laabhii ceva hoti ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa laabhii ca adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya.

[03] ``tatra ^a^V1.0109^ea^, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m puggalo laabhii ^a^T2.0123^ea^ ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa na laabhii adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya, tena, bhikkhave, puggalena yvaaya.m puggalo laabhii adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya so upasa"nkamitvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `katha.m nu kho, aavuso, sa"nkhaaraa da.t.thabbaa? katha.m sa"nkhaaraa sammasitabbaa? katha.m sa"nkhaaraa vipassitabbaa' {passitabbaa (ka0)} ti? tassa so yathaadi.t.tha.m yathaavidita.m byaakaroti -- `eva.m kho, aavuso, sa"nkhaaraa da.t.thabbaa, eva.m sa"nkhaaraa sammasitabbaa, eva.m sa"nkhaaraa vipassitabbaa'ti. so aparena samayena laabhii ceva hoti ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa laabhii ca adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya.

[03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m puggalo laabhii adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya na laabhii ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa, tena, bhikkhave, puggalena yvaaya.m puggalo laabhii ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa so upasa"nkamitvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `katha.m nu kho, aavuso, citta.m sa.n.thapetabba.m? katha.m citta.m sannisaadetabba.m ^a^M1.0407^ea^? katha.m citta.m ekodi kaatabba.m? katha.m citta.m samaadahaatabba'nti? tassa so yathaadi.t.tha.m yathaavidita.m byaakaroti -- `eva.m kho, aavuso, citta.m sa.n.thapetabba.m, eva.m citta.m sannisaadetabba.m, eva.m citta.m ekodi kaatabba.m {ekodi kattabba.m (pii0)}, eva.m citta.m samaadahaatabba'nti. so aparena samaye laabhii ceva hoti adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya laabhii ca ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa.

[03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m puggalo na ceva laabhii ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa na ca laabhii adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya, tena, bhikkhave, puggalena yvaaya.m puggalo laabhii ceva ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa laabhii ^a^T2.0124^ea^ ca adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya so upasa"nkamitvaa evamassa vacaniiyo -- `katha.m nu kho, aavuso, citta.m sa.n.thapetabba.m? katha.m citta.m sannisaadetabba.m? katha.m citta.m ekodi kaatabba.m? katha.m citta.m samaadahaatabba.m? katha.m sa"nkhaaraa da.t.thabbaa? katha.m sa"nkhaaraa sammasitabbaa? katha.m sa"nkhaaraa vipassitabbaa'ti? tassa so yathaadi.t.tha.m yathaavidita.m byaakaroti -- `eva.m kho, aavuso, citta.m sa.n.thapetabba.m, eva.m citta.m sannisaadetabba.m, eva.m citta.m ekodi kaatabba.m, eva.m citta.m samaadahaatabba.m, eva.m sa"nkhaaraa da.t.thabbaa, eva.m sa"nkhaaraa sammasitabbaa, eva.m sa"nkhaaraa vipassitabbaa'ti. so aparena samayena ^a^P2.0095^ea^ laabhii ceva hoti ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa laabhii ca adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya.

[03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m puggalo laabhii ceva hoti ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa laabhii adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya ^a^V1.0110^ea^, tena, bhikkhave, puggalena tesu ceva kusalesu dhammesu pati.t.thaaya uttari aasavaana.m khayaaya yogo kara.niiyo. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti. catuttha.m.

[03] 95^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro? nevattahitaaya pa.tipanno no parahitaaya, parahitaaya pa.tipanno no attahitaaya, attahitaaya pa.tipanno no parahitaaya, attahitaaya ceva {attahitaaya ca (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} pa.tipanno parahitaaya ca.

[03] ``seyyathaapi ^a^M1.0408^ea^, bhikkhave, chavaalaata.m ubhato paditta.m {aaditta.m (ka0)}, majjhe guuthagata.m, neva gaame ka.t.thattha.m pharati na ara~n~ne ( ) {(ka.t.thattha.m pharati) katthaci}; tathuupamaaha.m ^a^T2.0125^ea^, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami yvaaya.m puggalo nevattahitaaya pa.tipanno no parahitaaya.

[03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m puggalo parahitaaya pa.tipanno no attahitaaya, aya.m imesa.m dvinna.m puggalaana.m abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro ca. tatra, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m puggalo attahitaaya pa.tipanno no parahitaaya, aya.m imesa.m ti.n.na.m puggalaana.m abhikkantataro ca pa.niitataro ca. tatra, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m puggalo attahitaaya ceva pa.tipanno parahitaaya ca, aya.m imesa.m catunna.m puggalaana.m aggo ca se.t.tho ca paamokkho {mokkho (pii0) sa.m0 ni0 3.662-663; a0 ni0 5.181} ca uttamo ca pavaro ca.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, gavaa khiira.m, khiiramhaa dadhi, dadhimhaa navaniita.m, navaniitamhaa sappi, sappimhaa sappima.n.do, sappima.n.do {sappimhaa sappima.n.do (ka0)} tattha {tatra (sa.m0 ni0 3.662-662)} aggamakkhaayati; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, yvaaya.m puggalo attahitaaya ceva pa.tipanno parahitaaya ca, aya.m imesa.m catunna.m puggalaana.m aggo ca se.t.tho ca paamokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro ca. ime ^a^P2.0096^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 96^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome ^a^V1.0111^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro? attahitaaya pa.tipanno no parahitaaya, parahitaaya pa.tipanno no attahitaaya, nevattahitaaya pa.tipanno no parahitaaya, attahitaaya ceva pa.tipanno parahitaaya ca.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo attahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti no parahitaaya? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ^a^T2.0126^ea^ attanaa raagavinayaaya pa.tipanno hoti, no para.m raagavinayaaya samaadapeti; attanaa dosavinayaaya pa.tipanno hoti, no para.m dosavinayaaya samaadapeti; attanaa ^a^M1.0409^ea^ mohavinayaaya pa.tipanno hoti, no para.m mohavinayaaya samaadapeti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo attahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti, no parahitaaya.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo parahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti, no attahitaaya? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo attanaa na raagavinayaaya pa.tipanno hoti, para.m raagavinayaaya samaadapeti; attanaa na dosavinayaaya pa.tipanno hoti, para.m dosavinayaaya samaadapeti; attanaa na mohavinayaaya pa.tipanno hoti, para.m mohavinayaaya samaadapeti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo parahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti, no attahitaaya.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo nevattahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti, no parahitaaya? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo attanaa na raagavinayaaya pa.tipanno hoti, no para.m raagavinayaaya samaadapeti; attanaa na dosavinayaaya pa.tipanno hoti, no para.m dosavinayaaya samaadapeti; attanaa na mohavinayaaya pa.tipanno hoti, no para.m mohavinayaaya samaadapeti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo nevattahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti, no parahitaaya.

[03] 97^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro? attahitaaya pa.tipanno no parahitaaya, parahitaaya pa.tipanno no attahitaaya, nevattahitaaya pa.tipanno no parahitaaya, attahitaaya ceva pa.tipanno parahitaaya ca.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^M1.0410^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalo attahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti, no parahitaaya? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo khippanisantii ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu, sutaana~nca dhammaana.m dhaarakajaatiko {dhaara.najaatiko (ka0)} hoti, dhaataana~nca {dhataana~nca (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} dhammaana.m atthuupaparikkhii hoti atthama~n~naaya dhammama~n~naaya, dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno hoti; no ca kalyaa.navaaco hoti kalyaa.navaakkara.no poriyaa vaacaaya samannaagato vissa.t.thaaya anelagalaaya atthassa vi~n~naapaniyaa, no ca sandassako hoti samaadapako {samaadaapako (?)} samuttejako sampaha.msako sabrahmacaariina.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo attahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti, no parahitaaya.

[03] ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, valaahakaa. katame cattaaro? gajjitaa no vassitaa, vassitaa no gajjitaa, neva gajjitaa no vassitaa, gajjitaa ca vassitaa ca. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro valaahakaa. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro valaahakuupamaa {pu0 pa0 157} puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro? gajjitaa no vassitaa, vassitaa no gajjitaa, neva gajjitaa no vassitaa, gajjitaa ca vassitaa ca.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo gajjitaa hoti no vassitaa? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo bhaasitaa hoti, no kattaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo gajjitaa hoti, no vassitaa. seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, valaahako gajjitaa, no vassitaa; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami.

[03] 107^b^.^eb^ ``catasso ^a^V1.0124^ea^ imaa, bhikkhave, muusikaa. katamaa catasso? gaadha.m kattaa no vasitaa, vasitaa no gaadha.m kattaa, neva gaadha.m kattaa no vasitaa, gaadha.m kattaa ca vasitaa ca -- imaa kho, bhikkhave, catasso muusikaa. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro muusikuupamaa puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro? gaadha.m kattaa no vasitaa, vasitaa no gaadha.m kattaa, neva gaadha.m kattaa no vasitaa, gaadha.m kattaa ca vasitaa ca.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^P2.0108^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalo gaadha.m kattaa hoti no vasitaa? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dhamma.m pariyaapu.naati -- sutta.m, geyya.m, veyyaakara.na.m, gaatha.m, udaana.m, itivuttaka.m, jaataka.m, abbhutadhamma.m, vedalla.m. so `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo gaadha.m kattaa hoti, no vasitaa. seyyathaapi saa ^a^T2.0145^ea^, bhikkhave, muusikaa gaadha.m kattaa, no vasitaa; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo vasitaa hoti, no gaadha.m kattaa? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dhamma.m na pariyaapu.naati -- sutta.m, geyya.m, veyyaakara.na.m, gaatha.m ^a^M1.0423^ea^, udaana.m, itivuttaka.m, jaataka.m, abbhutadhamma.m, vedalla.m. so `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo vasitaa hoti, no gaadha.m kattaa. seyyathaapi saa, bhikkhave, muusikaa vasitaa hoti, no gaadha.m kattaa; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m, puggala.m vadaami.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo neva gaadha.m kattaa hoti no vasitaa? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dhamma.m na pariyaapu.naati -- sutta.m, geyya.m, veyyaakara.na.m, gaatha.m, udaana.m, itivuttaka.m, jaataka.m, abbhutadhamma.m, vedalla.m. so `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave ^a^V1.0125^ea^, puggalo neva gaadha.m kattaa hoti, no vasitaa. seyyathaapi saa, bhikkhave, muusikaa neva gaadha.m kattaa hoti, no vasitaa; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo gaadha.m kattaa ca hoti vasitaa ca? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ^a^T2.0146^ea^ dhamma.m pariyaapu.naati -- sutta.m, geyya.m, veyyaakara.na.m, gaatha.m, udaana.m, itivuttaka.m, jaataka.m, abbhutadhamma.m, vedalla.m. so `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo gaadha.m kattaa ca hoti vasitaa ca. seyyathaapi saa, bhikkhave, muusikaa gaadha.m kattaa ca hoti vasitaa ca; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro muusikuupamaa puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti. sattama.m.

[03] 108^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, baliibaddaa {balivaddaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), balibaddhaa (ka0) pu0 pa0 162}. katame cattaaro? sagavaca.n.do ^a^P2.0109^ea^ no paragavaca.n.do, paragavaca.n.do no sagavaca.n.do, sagavaca.n.do ca paragavaca.n.do ca, neva sagavaca.n.do no paragavaca.n.do -- ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro baliibaddaa. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro baliibadduupamaa puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro? sagavaca.n.do no paragavaca.n.do, paragavaca.n.do no sagavaca.n.do, sagavaca.n.do ca paragavaca.n.do ca, neva sagavaca.n.do no paragavaca.n.do.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^M1.0424^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalo sagavaca.n.do hoti, no paragavaca.n.do? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sakaparisa.m ubbejetaa hoti, no paraparisa.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo sagavaca.n.do hoti, no paragavaca.n.do. seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, baliibaddo sagavaca.n.do, no paragavaca.n.do; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^T2.0147^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalo paragavaca.n.do hoti, no sagavaca.n.do? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo paraparisa.m ubbejetaa hoti, no sakaparisa.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo paragavaca.n.do ^a^V1.0126^ea^ hoti, no sagavaca.n.do. seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, baliibaddo paragavaca.n.do, no sagavaca.n.do; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami.

[03] 109^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, rukkhaa. katame cattaaro? pheggu ^a^P2.0110^ea^ phegguparivaaro, pheggu saaraparivaaro, saaro phegguparivaaro, saaro saaraparivaaro -- ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro rukkhaa. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro rukkhuupamaa puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame ^a^T2.0148^ea^ cattaaro? pheggu phegguparivaaro, pheggu saaraparivaaro, saaro phegguparivaaro, saaro saaraparivaaro.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^M1.0425^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalo pheggu hoti phegguparivaaro? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dussiilo hoti paapadhammo; parisaapissa hoti dussiilaa paapadhammaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo pheggu hoti phegguparivaaro. seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, rukkho pheggu phegguparivaaro; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^V1.0127^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalo pheggu hoti saaraparivaaro? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dussiilo hoti paapadhammo; parisaa ca khvassa hoti siilavatii kalyaa.nadhammaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo pheggu hoti saaraparivaaro. seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, rukkho pheggu saaraparivaaro; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo saaro hoti phegguparivaaro? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo siilavaa hoti kalyaa.nadhammo; parisaa ca khvassa hoti dussiilaa paapadhammaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo saaro hoti phegguparivaaro. seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, rukkho saaro phegguparivaaro; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo saaro hoti saaraparivaaro? idha bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo siilavaa hoti kalyaa.nadhammo; parisaapissa hoti siilavatii kalyaa.nadhammaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo saaro hoti saaraparivaaro. seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, rukkho saaro saaraparivaaro; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro rukkhuupamaa puggalaa santo ^a^T2.0149^ea^ sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti {pu0 pa0 170}. navama.m.

[03] 110^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, aasiivisaa {aasivisaa (ka0) pu0 pa0 163}. katame cattaaro? aagataviso na ghoraviso, ghoraviso na aagataviso, aagataviso ca ghoraviso ca, nevaagataviso na ghoraviso -- ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro aasiivisaa. evameva.m ^a^P2.0111^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro aasiivisuupamaa puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro? aagataviso na ghoraviso, ghoraviso na aagataviso ^a^M1.0426^ea^, aagataviso ca ghoraviso ca, nevaagataviso na ghoraviso.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo aagataviso hoti, na ghoraviso? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo abhi.nha.m kujjhati. so ca khvassa kodho {kopo (ka0) pu0 pa0 163} na diigharatta.m anuseti. eva.m kho ^a^V1.0128^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalo aagataviso hoti, na ghoraviso. seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, aasiiviso aagataviso, na ghoraviso; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo ghoraviso hoti, na aagataviso? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo na heva kho abhi.nha.m kujjhati. so ca khvassa kodho diigharatta.m anuseti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo ghoraviso hoti, na aagataviso. seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, aasiiviso ghoraviso, na aagataviso; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo aagataviso ca hoti ghoraviso ca? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo abhi.nha.m kujjhati. so ca khvassa kodho diigharatta.m anuseti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo aagataviso ca hoti ghoraviso ^a^T2.0150^ea^ ca. seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, aasiiviso aagataviso ca ghoraviso ca; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo nevaagataviso hoti na ghoraviso? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo na heva kho abhi.nha.m kujjhati. so ca khvassa kodho na diigharatta.m anuseti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo nevaagataviso hoti, na ghoraviso. seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, aasiiviso nevaagataviso na ghoraviso; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m puggala.m vadaami. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro aasiivisuupamaa puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti. dasama.m.

[03] 111^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V1.0129^ea^ ^a^M1.0427^ea^ ^a^P2.0112^ea^ kho kesi assadammasaarathi yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho kesi.m assadammasaarathi.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``tva.m khosi, kesi, pa~n~naato assadammasaarathiiti {sa~n~naato assadammasaarathi (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}. katha.m pana tva.m, kesi, assadamma.m vinesii''ti? ``aha.m kho, bhante, assadamma.m sa.nhenapi vinemi, pharusenapi vinemi ^a^T2.0151^ea^, sa.nhapharusenapi vinemii''ti. ``sace te, kesi, assadammo sa.nhena vinaya.m na upeti, pharusena vinaya.m na upeti, sa.nhapharusena vinaya.m na upeti, kinti na.m karosii''ti? ``sace me, bhante, assadammo sa.nhena vinaya.m na upeti, pharusena vinaya.m na upeti, sa.nhapharusena vinaya.m na upeti; hanaami na.m, bhante. ta.m kissa hetu? maa me aacariyakulassa ava.n.no ahosii''ti.

[03] ``bhagavaa pana, bhante, anuttaro purisadammasaarathi. katha.m pana, bhante, bhagavaa purisadamma.m vinetii''ti? ``aha.m kho, kesi, purisadamma.m sa.nhenapi vinemi, pharusenapi vinemi, sa.nhapharusenapi vinemi. tatrida.m, kesi, sa.nhasmi.m -- iti kaayasucarita.m iti kaayasucaritassa vipaako, iti vaciisucarita.m iti vaciisucaritassa vipaako, iti manosucarita.m iti manosucaritassa vipaako, iti devaa, iti manussaati. tatrida.m, kesi, pharusasmi.m -- iti kaayaduccarita.m iti kaayaduccaritassa vipaako, iti vaciiduccarita.m iti vaciiduccaritassa vipaako, iti manoduccarita.m iti manoduccaritassa vipaako, iti nirayo, iti tiracchaanayoni, iti pettivisayo''ti.

[03] ``tatrida.m, kesi, sa.nhapharusasmi.m -- iti kaayasucarita.m iti kaayasucaritassa vipaako, iti kaayaduccarita.m iti kaayaduccaritassa vipaako, iti vaciisucarita.m iti vaciisucaritassa vipaako, iti vaciiduccarita.m iti vaciiduccaritassa vipaako, iti manosucarita.m iti manosucaritassa ^a^V1.0130^ea^ vipaako, iti manoduccarita.m iti manoduccaritassa vipaako, iti devaa, iti manussaa, iti nirayo, iti tiracchaanayoni, iti pettivisayo''ti.

[03] ``sace ^a^T2.0152^ea^ ^a^M1.0428^ea^ te, bhante, purisadammo sa.nhena vinaya.m na upeti, pharusena ^a^P2.0113^ea^ vinaya.m na upeti, sa.nhapharusena vinaya.m na upeti, kinti na.m bhagavaa karotii''ti? ``sace me, kesi, purisadammo sa.nhena vinaya.m na upeti, pharusena vinaya.m na upeti, sa.nhapharusena vinaya.m na upeti, hanaami na.m, kesii''ti. ``na kho, bhante, bhagavato paa.naatipaato kappati. atha ca pana bhagavaa evamaaha -- `hanaami, na.m kesii'''ti! ``sacca.m, kesi! na tathaagatassa paa.naatipaato kappati. api ca yo purisadammo sa.nhena vinaya.m na upeti, pharusena vinaya.m na upeti, sa.nhapharusena vinaya.m na upeti, na ta.m tathaagato vattabba.m anusaasitabba.m ma~n~nati, naapi vi~n~nuu sabrahmacaarii vattabba.m anusaasitabba.m ma~n~nanti. vadho heso, kesi, ariyassa vinaye -- ya.m na tathaagato vattabba.m anusaasitabba.m ma~n~nati, naapi vi~n~nuu sabrahmacaarii vattabba.m anusaasitabba.m ma~n~nantii''ti.

[03] ``so hi nuuna, bhante, suhato hoti -- ya.m na tathaagato vattabba.m anusaasitabba.m ma~n~nati, naapi vi~n~nuu sabrahmacaarii vattabba.m anusaasitabba.m ma~n~nantiiti. abhikkanta.m, bhante, abhikkanta.m, bhante...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m, bhante, bhagavaa dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 112^b^.^eb^ ``catuuhi ^a^T2.0153^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no bhadro assaajaaniiyo raajaaraho hoti raajabhoggo, ra~n~no a"nganteva sa"nkha.m gacchati. katamehi catuuhi? ajjavena, javena, khantiyaa, soraccena -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuuhi a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no bhadro assaajaaniiyo raajaaraho hoti, raajabhoggo, ra~n~no a"nganteva sa"nkha.m gacchati.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, catuuhi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa. katamehi catuuhi? ajjavena, javena, khantiyaa, soraccena -- imehi ^a^V1.0131^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, catuuhi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu ^a^P2.0114^ea^ aahuneyyo hoti...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 113^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome ^a^M1.0429^ea^, bhikkhave, bhadraa assaajaaniiyaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco bhadro assaajaaniiyo patodacchaaya.m disvaa sa.mvijjati sa.mvega.m aapajjati -- `ki.m nu kho ma.m ajja assadammasaarathi kaara.na.m kaaressati, kimassaaha.m {kathamassaaha.m (ka0)} pa.tikaromii'ti! evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro assaajaaniiyo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo bhadro assaajaaniiyo santo sa.mvijjamaano lokasmi.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro assaajaaniiyo na heva kho patodacchaaya.m disvaa sa.mvijjati sa.mvega.m aapajjati, api ca kho lomavedhaviddho sa.mvijjati sa.mvega.m aapajjati -- `ki.m nu kho ma.m ajja assadammasaarathi kaara.na.m kaaressati, kimassaaha.m pa.tikaromii'ti! evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro ^a^T3.0154^ea^ assaajaaniiyo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo bhadro assaajaaniiyo santo sa.mvijjamaano lokasmi.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro assaajaaniiyo na heva kho patodacchaaya.m disvaa sa.mvijjati sa.mvega.m aapajjati naapi lomavedhaviddho sa.mvijjati sa.mvega.m aapajjati, api ca kho cammavedhaviddho sa.mvijjati sa.mvega.m aapajjati -- `ki.m nu kho ma.m ajja assadammasaarathi kaara.na.m kaaressati, kimassaaha.m pa.tikaromii'ti! evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro assaajaaniiyo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, tatiyo bhadro assaajaaniiyo santo sa.mvijjamaano lokasmi.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro assaajaaniiyo na heva kho patodacchaaya.m disvaa sa.mvijjati sa.mvega.m aapajjati naapi lomavedhaviddho sa.mvijjati sa.mvega.m aapajjati naapi cammavedhaviddho sa.mvijjati sa.mvega.m aapajjati, api ca kho a.t.thivedhaviddho sa.mvijjati sa.mvega.m aapajjati -- `ki.m ^a^P2.0115^ea^ nu kho ma.m ajja assadammasaarathi kaara.na.m kaaressati, kimassaaha.m pa.tikaromii'ti ^a^V1.0132^ea^! evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro assaajaaniiyo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, catuttho bhadro assaajaaniiyo santo sa.mvijjamaano ^a^M1.0430^ea^ lokasmi.m. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro bhadraa assaajaaniiyaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, cattaarome bhadraa purisaajaaniiyaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco bhadro purisaajaaniiyo su.naati -- `amukasmi.m naama gaame vaa nigame vaa itthii vaa puriso vaa dukkhito vaa kaala"nkato {kaalakato (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} vaa'ti. so tena sa.mvijjati, sa.mvega.m aapajjati. sa.mviggo yoniso padahati. pahitatto kaayena ^a^T2.0155^ea^ ceva paramasacca.m {paramatthasacca.m (ka0) ma0 ni0 2.183 passitabba.m} sacchikaroti, pa~n~naaya ca ativijjha passati. seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, bhadro assaajaaniiyo patodacchaaya.m disvaa sa.mvijjati sa.mvega.m aapajjati; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m bhadra.m purisaajaaniiya.m vadaami. evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro purisaajaaniiyo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo bhadro purisaajaaniiyo santo sa.mvijjamaano lokasmi.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro purisaajaaniiyo na heva kho su.naati -- `amukasmi.m naama gaame vaa nigame vaa itthii vaa puriso vaa dukkhito vaa kaala"nkato vaa'ti, api ca kho saama.m passati itthi.m vaa purisa.m vaa dukkhita.m vaa kaala"nkata.m vaa. so tena sa.mvijjati, sa.mvega.m aapajjati. sa.mviggo yoniso padahati. pahitatto kaayena ceva paramasacca.m sacchikaroti, pa~n~naaya ca ativijjha passati. seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, bhadro assaajaaniiyo lomavedhaviddho sa.mvijjati sa.mvega.m aapajjati; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m bhadra.m purisaajaaniiya.m vadaami. evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro purisaajaaniiyo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo bhadro purisaajaaniiyo santo sa.mvijjamaano lokasmi.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro purisaajaaniiyo na heva kho su.naati -- `amukasmi.m naama gaame vaa nigame vaa itthii vaa puriso vaa dukkhito vaa kaala"nkato vaa'ti, naapi saama.m passati itthi.m vaa purisa.m vaa dukkhita.m vaa kaala"nkata.m vaa, api ca khvassa ~naati vaa saalohito vaa dukkhito vaa hoti kaala"nkato vaa. so tena sa.mvijjati, sa.mvega.m aapajjati. sa.mviggo ^a^P2.0116^ea^ yoniso padahati. pahitatto kaayena ^a^T2.0156^ea^ ceva paramasacca.m ^a^M1.0431^ea^ sacchikaroti, pa~n~naaya ca ativijjha passati. seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, bhadro assaajaaniiyo cammavedhaviddho sa.mvijjati ^a^V1.0133^ea^ sa.mvega.m aapajjati; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m bhadra.m purisaajaaniiya.m vadaami. evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro purisaajaaniiyo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, tatiyo bhadro purisaajaaniiyo santo sa.mvijjamaano lokasmi.m.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro purisaajaaniiyo na heva kho su.naati -- `amukasmi.m naama gaame vaa nigame vaa itthii vaa puriso vaa dukkhito vaa kaala"nkato vaa'ti, naapi saama.m passati itthi.m vaa purisa.m vaa dukkhita.m vaa kaala"nkata.m vaa, naapissa ~naati vaa saalohito vaa dukkhito vaa hoti kaala"nkato vaa, api ca kho saama~n~neva phu.t.tho hoti saariirikaahi vedanaahi dukkhaahi tibbaahi {tippaahi (sii0 pii0)} kharaahi ka.tukaahi asaataahi amanaapaahi paa.naharaahi. so tena sa.mvijjati, sa.mvega.m aapajjati. sa.mviggo yoniso padahati. pahitatto kaayena ceva paramasacca.m sacchikaroti, pa~n~naaya ca ativijjha passati. seyyathaapi so, bhikkhave, bhadro assaajaaniiyo a.t.thivedhaviddho sa.mvijjati sa.mvega.m aapajjati; tathuupamaaha.m, bhikkhave, ima.m bhadra.m purisaajaaniiya.m vadaami. evaruupopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro purisaajaaniiyo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, catuttho bhadro purisaajaaniiyo santo sa.mvijjamaano lokasmi.m. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro bhadraa purisaajaaniiyaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti. tatiya.m.

[03] 114^b^.^eb^ ``catuuhi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no naago raajaaraho ^a^T2.0157^ea^ hoti raajabhoggo, ra~n~no a"nganteva sa"nkha.m gacchati. katamehi catuuhi? idha, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago sotaa ca hoti, hantaa ca, khantaa ca, gantaa ca.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago sotaa hoti? idha, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago yamena.m hatthidammasaarathi kaara.na.m kaareti -- yadi vaa katapubba.m yadi vaa akatapubba.m -- ta.m a.t.thi.m katvaa {a.t.thikatvaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0) a0 ni0 5.140} manasi katvaa sabbacetasaa {sabba.m cetaso (sabbattha)} samannaaharitvaa ^a^M1.0432^ea^ ohitasoto su.naati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago sotaa hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago hantaa hoti? idha, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago sa"ngaamagato ^a^V1.0134^ea^ hatthimpi hanati, hatthaaruhampi hanati, assampi hanati, assaaruhampi hanati ^a^P2.0117^ea^, rathampi hanati, rathikampi hanati, pattikampi hanati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago hantaa hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago khantaa hoti? idha bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago sa"ngaamagato khamo hoti sattippahaaraana.m asippahaaraana.m usuppahaaraana.m pharasuppahaaraana.m {``pharasuppahaaraana''nti ida.m pada.m syaamapotthake natthi. ma0 ni0 3.217 passitabba.m} bheripa.navasa"nkhati.navaninnaadasaddaana.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago khantaa hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago gantaa hoti? idha, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago yamena.m hatthidammasaarathi disa.m peseti -- yadi vaa gatapubba.m yadi vaa agatapubba.m -- ta.m khippameva gantaa hoti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, ra~n~no naago gantaa hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuuhi a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no naago raajaaraho hoti raajabhoggo, ra~n~no a"nganteva sa"nkha.m gacchati.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, catuuhi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti ^a^T2.0158^ea^ ...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa. katamehi catuuhi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sotaa ca hoti, hantaa ca, khantaa ca, gantaa ca.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sotaa hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu tathaagatappavedite dhammavinaye desiyamaane a.t.thi.m katvaa manasi katvaa sabbacetasaa samannaaharitvaa ohitasoto dhamma.m su.naati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sotaa hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hantaa hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uppanna.m kaamavitakka.m naadhivaaseti pajahati vinodeti (hanati) {( ) natthi sii0 syaa0 pii0 potthakesu. a0 ni0 4.164 pa.tipadaavagge catutthasutte pana ``sametii''ti pada.m sabbatthapi dissati} byantiikaroti anabhaava.m gameti, uppanna.m byaapaadavitakka.m...pe0... uppanna.m vihi.msaavitakka.m...pe0... uppannuppanne paapake akusale dhamme naadhivaaseti pajahati vinodeti hanati ^a^M1.0433^ea^ byantiikaroti anabhaava.m gameti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hantaa hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khantaa hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khamo hoti siitassa ^a^V1.0135^ea^ u.nhassa jighacchaaya pipaasaaya, .da.msamakasavaataatapasariisapasamphassaana.m duruttaana.m duraagataana.m vacanapathaana.m uppannaana.m ^a^P2.0118^ea^ saariirikaana.m vedanaana.m dukkhaana.m tibbaana.m kharaana.m ka.tukaana.m asaataana.m amanaapaana.m paa.naharaana.m adhivaasakajaatiko hoti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khantaa hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gantaa hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yaaya.m disaa agatapubbaa iminaa diighena addhunaa yadida.m sabbasa"nkhaarasamatho sabbuupadhipa.tinissaggo ta.nhaakkhayo viraago nirodho nibbaana.m, ta.m khippa~n~neva gantaa ^a^T2.0159^ea^ hoti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gantaa hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuuhi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 115^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarimaani, bhikkhave, .thaanaani. katamaani cattaari? atthi, bhikkhave, .thaana.m amanaapa.m kaatu.m; ta~nca kayiramaana.m anatthaaya sa.mvattati. atthi, bhikkhave, .thaana.m amanaapa.m kaatu.m; ta~nca kayiramaana.m atthaaya sa.mvattati. atthi, bhikkhave, .thaana.m manaapa.m kaatu.m; ta~nca kayiramaana.m anatthaaya sa.mvattati. atthi, bhikkhave, .thaana.m manaapa.m kaatu.m; ta~nca kayiramaana.m atthaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, yamida.m {yadida.m (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} .thaana.m amanaapa.m kaatu.m; ta~nca kayiramaana.m anatthaaya sa.mvattati -- ida.m, bhikkhave, .thaana.m ubhayeneva na kattabba.m ma~n~nati {pa~n~naayati (?)}. yampida.m {yadida.m (ka0)} .thaana.m amanaapa.m kaatu.m; iminaapi na.m {ta.m (sii0 pii0) syaamapotthake natthi} na kattabba.m ma~n~nati. yampida.m .thaana.m kayiramaana.m anatthaaya sa.mvattati; iminaapi na.m {ta.m (pii0) sii0 syaa0 potthakesu natthi} na kattabba.m ma~n~nati. ida.m, bhikkhave, .thaana.m ubhayeneva na kattabba.m ma~n~nati.

[03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, yamida.m .thaana.m amanaapa.m kaatu.m; ta~nca kayiramaana.m atthaaya sa.mvattati -- imasmi.m, bhikkhave, .thaane baalo ca pa.n.dito ca veditabbo purisathaame ^a^M1.0434^ea^ purisaviiriye purisaparakkame. na, bhikkhave, baalo iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `ki~ncaapi kho ida.m .thaana.m amanaapa.m kaatu.m; atha carahida.m ^a^P2.0119^ea^ .thaana.m kayiramaana.m atthaaya sa.mvattatii'ti. so ta.m .thaana.m na karoti. tassa ta.m .thaana.m akayiramaana.m anatthaaya sa.mvattati. pa.n.dito ca kho, bhikkhave, iti ^a^V1.0136^ea^ pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `ki~ncaapi kho ida.m .thaana.m amanaapa.m kaatu.m; atha ^a^T2.0160^ea^ carahida.m .thaana.m kayiramaana.m atthaaya sa.mvattatii'ti. so ta.m .thaana.m karoti. tassa ta.m .thaana.m kayiramaana.m atthaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, yamida.m {yadida.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} .thaana.m manaapa.m kaatu.m; ta~nca kayiramaana.m anatthaaya sa.mvattati -- imasmimpi, bhikkhave, .thaane baalo ca pa.n.dito ca veditabbo purisathaame purisaviiriye purisaparakkame. na, bhikkhave, baalo iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `ki~ncaapi kho ida.m .thaana.m manaapa.m kaatu.m; atha carahida.m .thaana.m kayiramaana.m anatthaaya sa.mvattatii'ti. so ta.m .thaana.m karoti. tassa ta.m .thaana.m kayiramaana.m anatthaaya sa.mvattati. pa.n.dito ca kho, bhikkhave, iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `ki~ncaapi kho ida.m .thaana.m manaapa.m kaatu.m; atha carahida.m .thaana.m kayiramaana.m anatthaaya sa.mvattatii'ti. so ta.m .thaana.m na karoti. tassa ta.m .thaana.m akayiramaana.m atthaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``tatra, bhikkhave, yamida.m .thaana.m manaapa.m kaatu.m, ta~nca kayiramaana.m atthaaya sa.mvattati -- ida.m, bhikkhave, .thaana.m ubhayeneva kattabba.m ma~n~nati. yampida.m .thaana.m manaapa.m kaatu.m, iminaapi na.m kattabba.m ma~n~nati; yampida.m .thaana.m kayiramaana.m atthaaya sa.mvattati, iminaapi na.m kattabba.m ma~n~nati. ida.m, bhikkhave, .thaana.m ubhayeneva kattabba.m ma~n~nati. imaani kho, bhikkhave, cattaari .thaanaanii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 116^b^.^eb^ ``catuuhi, bhikkhave, .thaanehi appamaado kara.niiyo. katamehi catuuhi? kaayaduccarita.m, bhikkhave, pajahatha, kaayasucarita.m bhaavetha; tattha ca maa pamaadattha. vaciiduccarita.m, bhikkhave, pajahatha, vaciisucarita.m bhaavetha; tattha ca maa pamaadattha. manoduccarita.m, bhikkhave, pajahatha, manosucarita.m bhaavetha; tattha ca maa pamaadattha. micchaadi.t.thi.m, bhikkhave, pajahatha, sammaadi.t.thi.m bhaavetha ^a^T2.0161^ea^; tattha ca maa pamaadattha.

[03] ``yato ^a^M1.0435^ea^ ^a^P2.0120^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno kaayaduccarita.m pahiina.m hoti kaayasucarita.m bhaavita.m, vaciiduccarita.m ^a^V1.0137^ea^ pahiina.m hoti vaciisucarita.m bhaavita.m, manoduccarita.m pahiina.m hoti manosucarita.m bhaavita.m, micchaadi.t.thi pahiinaa hoti sammaadi.t.thi bhaavitaa, so na bhaayati samparaayikassa mara.nassaa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 117^b^.^eb^ ``catuusu, bhikkhave, .thaanesu attaruupena appamaado sati cetaso aarakkho kara.niiyo. katamesu catuusu? `maa me rajaniiyesu dhammesu citta.m rajjii'ti attaruupena appamaado sati cetaso aarakkho kara.niiyo; `maa me dosaniiyesu dhammesu citta.m dussii'ti attaruupena appamaado sati cetaso aarakkho kara.niiyo; `maa me mohaniiyesu dhammesu citta.m muyhii'ti attaruupena appamaado sati cetaso aarakkho kara.niiyo; `maa me madaniiyesu dhammesu citta.m majjii'ti attaruupena appamaado sati cetaso aarakkho kara.niiyo.

[03] ``yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno rajaniiyesu dhammesu citta.m na rajjati viitaraagattaa, dosaniiyesu dhammesu citta.m na dussati viitadosattaa, mohaniiyesu dhammesu citta.m na muyhati viitamohattaa, madaniiyesu dhammesu citta.m na majjati viitamadattaa, so na chambhati na kampati na vedhati na santaasa.m aapajjati, na ca pana sama.navacanahetupi gacchatii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 118^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarimaani, bhikkhave, saddhassa kulaputtassa dassaniiyaani sa.mvejaniiyaani .thaanaani. katamaani cattaari? `idha tathaagato jaato'ti, bhikkhave, saddhassa kulaputtassa dassaniiya.m sa.mvejaniiya.m .thaana.m. `idha tathaagato anuttara.m ^a^T2.0162^ea^ sammaasambodhi.m abhisambuddho'ti, bhikkhave, saddhassa kulaputtassa dassaniiya.m sa.mvejaniiya.m .thaana.m. `idha tathaagato anuttara.m dhammacakka.m pavattesii'ti, bhikkhave, saddhassa kulaputtassa dassaniiya.m sa.mvejaniiya.m .thaana.m. `idha tathaagato anupaadisesaaya nibbaanadhaatuyaa parinibbuto'ti ^a^M1.0436^ea^, bhikkhave, saddhassa kulaputtassa dassaniiya.m sa.mvejaniiya.m .thaana.m. imaani ^a^P2.0121^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, cattaari saddhassa kulaputtassa dassaniiyaani sa.mvejaniiyaani .thaanaanii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 119^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarimaani ^a^V1.0138^ea^, bhikkhave, bhayaani. katamaani cattaari? jaatibhaya.m, jaraabhaya.m, byaadhibhaya.m, mara.nabhaya.m -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, cattaari bhayaanii''ti. navama.m.
[03] 120^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarimaani, bhikkhave, bhayaani. katamaani cattaari? aggibhaya.m, udakabhaya.m, raajabhaya.m, corabhaya.m -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, cattaari bhayaanii''ti. dasama.m.
[06] kesivaggo dutiyo.
