[21] kesi javo patodo ca, naago .thaanena pa~ncama.m.
[22] appamaado ca aarakkho, sa.mvejaniiya~nca dve bhayaati..
[03] 121^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarimaani ^a^V1.0139^ea^, bhikkhave, bhayaani. katamaani cattaari? attaanuvaadabhaya.m, paraanuvaadabhaya.m, da.n.dabhaya.m, duggatibhaya.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, attaanuvaadabhaya.m? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha~nceva {aha~nce (?)} kho ^a^T2.0163^ea^ pana kaayena duccarita.m careyya.m, vaacaaya duccarita.m careyya.m, manasaa duccarita.m careyya.m, ki~nca ta.m ya.m ma.m {ki~nca ta.m ma.m (sii0), ki~nca ma.m (syaa0 ka.m0), ki~nca ta.m kamma.m (pii0 ka0)} attaa siilato na upavadeyyaa'ti! so attaanuvaadabhayassa bhiito kaayaduccarita.m pahaaya ^a^M1.0437^ea^ kaayasucarita.m bhaaveti, vaciiduccarita.m pahaaya vaciisucarita.m bhaaveti, manoduccarita.m pahaaya manosucarita.m bhaaveti, suddha.m attaana.m pariharati. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, attaanuvaadabhaya.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, paraanuvaadabhaya.m? idha ^a^P2.0122^ea^, bhikkhave, ekacco iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `aha~nceva kho pana kaayena duccarita.m careyya.m, vaacaaya duccarita.m careyya.m, manasaa duccarita.m careyya.m, ki~nca ta.m ya.m ma.m pare siilato na upavadeyyu'nti! so paraanuvaadabhayassa bhiito kaayaduccarita.m pahaaya kaayasucarita.m bhaaveti, vaciiduccarita.m pahaaya vaciisucarita.m bhaaveti, manoduccarita.m pahaaya manosucarita.m bhaaveti, suddha.m attaana.m pariharati. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, paraanuvaadabhaya.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, da.n.dabhaya.m? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco passati cora.m aagucaari.m, raajaano gahetvaa vividhaa kammakaara.naa kaarente, kasaahipi taa.lente, vettehipi taa.lente, addhada.n.dakehipi taa.lente, hatthampi chindante, paadampi chindante, hatthapaadampi chindante, ka.n.nampi chindante, naasampi chindante, ka.n.nanaasampi chindante, bila"ngathaalikampi karonte, sa"nkhamu.n.dikampi karonte, raahumukhampi karonte, jotimaalikampi karonte, hatthapajjotikampi karonte, erakavattikampi ^a^V1.0140^ea^ karonte, ciirakavaasikampi karonte, e.neyyakampi karonte, balisama.msikampi karonte, kahaapa.nakampi karonte, khaaraapatacchikampi ^a^T2.0164^ea^ karonte, palighaparivattikampi karonte, palaalapii.thakampi karonte, tattenapi telena osi~ncante, sunakhehipi khaadaapente, jiivantampi suule uttaasente, asinaapi siisa.m chindante.

[03] ``tassa eva.m hoti -- `yathaaruupaana.m kho paapakaana.m kammaana.m hetu cora.m aagucaari.m raajaano gahetvaa vividhaa kammakaara.naa kaarenti, kasaahipi taa.lenti...pe0... asinaapi siisa.m chindanti, aha~nceva kho pana evaruupa.m paapakamma.m kareyya.m, mampi raajaano gahetvaa evaruupaa vividhaa kammakaara.naa kaareyyu.m, kasaahipi taa.leyyu.m, vettehipi taa.leyyu.m, addhada.n.dakehipi taa.leyyu.m, hatthampi chindeyyu.m, paadampi chindeyyu.m, hatthapaadampi chindeyyu.m, ka.n.nampi chindeyyu.m, naasampi chindeyyu.m, ka.n.nanaasampi chindeyyu.m, bila"ngathaalikampi kareyyu.m, sa"nkhamu.n.dikampi kareyyu.m; raahumukhampi kareyyu.m, jotimaalikampi kareyyu.m, hatthapajjotikampi kareyyu.m, erakavattikampi kareyyu.m, ciirakavaasikampi kareyyu.m, e.neyyakampi kareyyu.m, balisama.msikampi kareyyu.m, kahaapa.nakampi ^a^M1.0438^ea^ kareyyu.m, khaaraapatacchikampi kareyyu.m, palighaparivattikampi kareyyu.m, palaalapii.thakampi kareyyu.m, tattenapi telena osi~nceyyu.m, sunakhehipi khaadaapeyyu.m, jiivantampi suule uttaaseyyu.m, asinaapi siisa.m chindeyyu'nti. so da.n.dabhayassa bhiito na paresa.m paabhata.m vilumpanto carati. kaayaduccarita.m pahaaya...pe0... suddha.m attaana.m pariharati. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, da.n.dabhaya.m.

[03] ``katama~nca ^a^P2.0123^ea^, bhikkhave, duggatibhaya.m? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- `kaayaduccaritassa kho paapako vipaako abhisamparaaya.m, vaciiduccaritassa paapako vipaako abhisamparaaya.m, manoduccaritassa paapako vipaako abhisamparaaya.m. aha~nceva kho pana kaayena duccarita.m careyya.m, vaacaaya duccarita.m careyya.m, manasaa duccarita.m careyya.m, ki~nca ta.m yaaha.m na kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjeyya'nti! so duggatibhayassa bhiito kaayaduccarita.m pahaaya kaayasucarita.m bhaaveti, vaciiduccarita.m pahaaya vaciisucarita.m bhaaveti, manoduccarita.m pahaaya manosucarita.m bhaaveti, suddha.m attaana.m pariharati. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, duggatibhaya.m. imaani kho, bhikkhave, cattaari bhayaanii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 122^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarimaani ^a^V1.0141^ea^, bhikkhave, bhayaani udakorohantassa {udakorohante (ma0 ni0 2.161)} paa.tika"nkhitabbaani ^a^T2.0165^ea^. katamaani cattaari? uumibhaya.m, kumbhiilabhaya.m, aava.t.tabhaya.m, susukaabhaya.m -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, cattaari bhayaani udakorohantassa paa.tika"nkhitabbaani. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, cattaari bhayaani idhekaccassa kulaputtassa imasmi.m dhammavinaye agaarasmaa {saddhaa agaarasmaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} anagaariya.m pabbajitassa {pabbajato (sii0)} paa.tika"nkhitabbaani. katamaani cattaari? uumibhaya.m, kumbhiilabhaya.m, aava.t.tabhaya.m, susukaabhaya.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, uumibhaya.m? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti -- `oti.n.nomhi jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi, dukkhoti.n.no ^a^M1.0439^ea^ dukkhapareto; appeva naama imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyaa pa~n~naayethaa'ti! tamena.m tathaa pabbajita.m samaana.m sabrahmacaarino ovadanti anusaasanti -- `eva.m te abhikkamitabba.m, eva.m te pa.tikkamitabba.m, eva.m te aaloketabba.m ^a^P2.0124^ea^, eva.m te viloketabba.m, eva.m te sami~njitabba.m, eva.m te pasaaritabba.m, eva.m te sa"nghaa.tipattaciivara.m dhaaretabba'nti. tassa eva.m hoti -- `maya.m kho pubbe agaariyabhuutaa samaanaa a~n~ne ovadaamapi anusaasaamapi. ime panamhaaka.m puttamattaa ma~n~ne nattamattaa ma~n~ne ovaditabba.m anusaasitabba.m ma~n~nantii'ti. so kupito anattamano sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uumibhayassa bhiito sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavatto. uumibhayanti kho, bhikkhave, kodhuupaayaasasseta.m adhivacana.m. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, uumibhaya.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, kumbhiilabhaya.m? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti -- `oti.n.nomhi ^a^T2.0166^ea^ jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi, dukkhoti.n.no dukkhapareto; appeva naama imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyaa pa~n~naayethaa'ti! tamena.m tathaa pabbajita.m samaana.m sabrahmacaarino ovadanti anusaasanti -- `ida.m te khaaditabba.m, ida.m te na khaaditabba.m, ida.m te bhu~njitabba.m, ida.m te na bhu~njitabba.m, ida.m te saayitabba.m, ida.m te na saayitabba.m, ida.m te paatabba.m ^a^V1.0142^ea^, ida.m te na paatabba.m, kappiya.m te khaaditabba.m, akappiya.m te na khaaditabba.m, kappiya.m te bhu~njitabba.m, akappiya.m te na bhu~njitabba.m, kappiya.m te saayitabba.m, akappiya.m te na saayitabba.m, kappiya.m te paatabba.m, akappiya.m te na paatabba.m, kaale te khaaditabba.m, vikaale te na khaaditabba.m, kaale te bhu~njitabba.m, vikaale te na bhu~njitabba.m, kaale te saayitabba.m, vikaale te na saayitabba.m, kaale te paatabba.m, vikaale te na paatabba'nti. tassa eva.m hoti -- `maya.m kho pubbe agaariyabhuutaa samaanaa ya.m icchaama ta.m khaadaama, ya.m na icchaama na ta.m khaadaama; ya.m icchaama ta.m bhu~njaama, ya.m na icchaama na ta.m bhu~njaama; ya.m icchaama ta.m saayaama, ya.m na icchaama na ta.m saayaama; ya.m icchaama ta.m pivaama, ya.m na icchaama na ta.m pivaama; kappiyampi khaadaama akappiyampi khaadaama kappiyampi bhu~njaama akappiyampi bhu~njaama kappiyampi saayaama akappiyampi saayaama kappiyampi pivaama akappiyampi pivaama, kaalepi khaadaama vikaalepi khaadaama kaalepi bhu~njaama vikaalepi bhu~njaama kaalepi ^a^M1.0440^ea^ saayaama ^a^T2.0167^ea^ vikaalepi saayaama kaalepi pivaama ^a^P2.0125^ea^ vikaalepi pivaama; yampi no saddhaa gahapatikaa divaa vikaale pa.niita.m khaadaniiya.m vaa bhojaniiya.m vaa denti, tatrapime {tatthapime (ma0 ni0 2.163)} mukhaavara.na.m ma~n~ne karontii'ti. so kupito anattamano sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kumbhiilabhayassa bhiito sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavatto. kumbhiilabhayanti kho, bhikkhave, odarikattasseta.m adhivacana.m. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, kumbhiilabhaya.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, aava.t.tabhaya.m? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti -- `oti.n.nomhi jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi, dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi dukkhoti.n.no dukkhapareto; appeva naama imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyaa pa~n~naayethaa'ti! so eva.m pabbajito samaano pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya gaama.m vaa nigama.m vaa pi.n.daaya pavisati arakkhiteneva kaayena arakkhitaaya vaacaaya arakkhitena cittena anupa.t.thitaaya satiyaa asa.mvutehi indriyehi. so tattha passati gahapati.m vaa gahapatiputta.m vaa pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappita.m sama"ngiibhuuta.m paricaarayamaana.m. tassa eva.m hoti -- `maya.m kho pubbe agaariyabhuutaa samaanaa pa~ncahi kaamagu.nehi samappitaa sama"ngiibhuutaa paricaarimhaa; sa.mvijjanti kho pana me kule bhogaa. sakkaa bhoge ca bhu~njitu.m pu~n~naani ca kaatu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattitvaa bhoge ca bhu~njeyya.m pu~n~naani ca kareyya'nti ^a^T2.0168^ea^! so sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati ^a^V1.0143^ea^. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aava.t.tabhayassa bhiito sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavatto. aava.t.tabhayanti kho, bhikkhave, pa~ncanneta.m kaamagu.naana.m adhivacana.m. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, aava.t.tabhaya.m.

[03] ``katama~nca, bhikkhave, susukaabhaya.m? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajito hoti -- `oti.n.nomhi jaatiyaa jaraaya mara.nena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upaayaasehi, dukkhoti.n.no dukkhapareto; appeva naama imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyaa pa~n~naayethaa'ti! so eva.m pabbajito samaano pubba.nhasamaya.m nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya gaama.m vaa nigama.m ^a^M1.0441^ea^ vaa pi.n.daaya pavisati ^a^P2.0126^ea^ arakkhiteneva kaayena arakkhitaaya vaacaaya arakkhitena cittena anupa.t.thitaaya satiyaa asa.mvutehi indriyehi. so tattha passati maatugaama.m dunnivattha.m vaa duppaaruta.m vaa. tassa maatugaama.m disvaa dunnivattha.m vaa duppaaruta.m vaa raago citta.m anuddha.mseti. so raagaanuddha.msitena cittena sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu susukaabhayassa bhiito sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavatto. susukaabhayanti kho, bhikkhave, maatugaamasseta.m adhivacana.m. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, susukaabhaya.m. imaani kho, bhikkhave, cattaari bhayaani idhekaccassa kulaputtassa imasmi.m dhammavinaye agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajitassa paa.tika"nkhitabbaanii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 123^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame ^a^T2.0169^ea^ cattaaro? {kathaa0 671 aadayo} idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so tadassaadeti, ta.m nikaameti, tena ca vitti.m aapajjati. tattha .thito tadadhimutto tabbahulavihaarii aparihiino kaala.m kurumaano brahmakaayikaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjati. brahmakaayikaana.m, bhikkhave, devaana.m kappo aayuppamaa.na.m. tattha puthujjano yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa yaavataka.m tesa.m devaana.m aayuppamaa.na.m ta.m sabba.m khepetvaa nirayampi gacchati tiracchaanayonimpi gacchati pettivisayampi gacchati. bhagavato pana saavako tattha yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa yaavataka.m tesa.m ^a^V1.0144^ea^ devaana.m aayuppamaa.na.m ta.m sabba.m khepetvaa tasmi.myeva bhave parinibbaayati. aya.m kho, bhikkhave, viseso aya.m adhippayaaso ida.m naanaakara.na.m sutavato ariyasaavakassa assutavataa puthujjanena, yadida.m gatiyaa upapattiyaa sati {yadida.m cutiyaa upapattiyaa caati (ka0) a0 ni0 3.117 passitabba.m}.

[03] ``puna ^a^P2.0127^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so tadassaadeti, ta.m nikaameti, tena ca vitti.m aapajjati. tattha .thito tadadhimutto tabbahulavihaarii ^a^M1.0442^ea^ aparihiino kaala.m kurumaano aabhassaraana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjati. aabhassaraana.m, bhikkhave, devaana.m dve kappaa aayuppamaa.na.m. tattha puthujjano yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa yaavataka.m tesa.m devaana.m aayuppamaa.na.m ta.m sabba.m khepetvaa nirayampi gacchati tiracchaanayonimpi gacchati pettivisayampi gacchati. bhagavato pana ^a^T2.0170^ea^ saavako tattha yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa yaavataka.m tesa.m devaana.m aayuppamaa.na.m ta.m sabba.m khepetvaa tasmi.myeva bhave parinibbaayati. aya.m kho, bhikkhave, viseso aya.m adhippayaaso ida.m naanaakara.na.m sutavato ariyasaavakassa assutavataa puthujjanena, yadida.m gatiyaa upapattiyaa sati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajaano sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so tadassaadeti, ta.m nikaameti, tena ca vitti.m aapajjati. tattha .thito tadadhimutto tabbahulavihaarii aparihiino, kaala.m kurumaano subhaki.nhaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjati. subhaki.nhaana.m, bhikkhave, devaana.m cattaaro kappaa aayuppamaa.na.m. tattha puthujjano yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa yaavataka.m tesa.m devaana.m aayuppamaa.na.m ta.m sabba.m khepetvaa nirayampi gacchati tiracchaanayonimpi gacchati pettivisayampi gacchati. bhagavato pana saavako tattha yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa yaavataka.m tesa.m devaana.m aayuppamaa.na.m ta.m sabba.m khepetvaa tasmi.myeva bhave parinibbaayati. aya.m kho, bhikkhave, viseso aya.m adhippayaaso ida.m naanaakara.na.m sutavato ariyasaavakassa assutavataa puthujjanena, yadida.m gatiyaa upapattiyaa sati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva ^a^V1.0145^ea^ somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so tadassaadeti, ta.m nikaameti, tena ca vitti.m ^a^T2.0171^ea^ aapajjati. tattha .thito ^a^P2.0128^ea^ tadadhimutto tabbahulavihaarii aparihiino kaala.m kurumaano vehapphalaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjati. vehapphalaana.m, bhikkhave, devaana.m pa~nca kappasataani aayuppamaa.na.m. tattha puthujjano yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa yaavataka.m tesa.m devaana.m aayuppamaa.na.m ta.m sabba.m khepetvaa nirayampi gacchati tiracchaanayonimpi gacchati ^a^M1.0443^ea^ pettivisayampi gacchati. bhagavato pana saavako tattha yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa yaavataka.m tesa.m devaana.m aayuppamaa.na.m ta.m sabba.m khepetvaa tasmi.myeva bhave parinibbaayati. aya.m kho, bhikkhave, viseso aya.m adhippayaaso ida.m naanaakara.na.m sutavato ariyasaavakassa assutavataa puthujjanena, yadida.m gatiyaa upapattiyaa sati. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti. tatiya.m.

[03] 124^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so yadeva tattha hoti ruupagata.m vedanaagata.m sa~n~naagata.m sa"nkhaaragata.m vi~n~naa.nagata.m, te dhamme aniccato dukkhato rogato ga.n.dato sallato aghato aabaadhato parato palokato su~n~nato anattato samanupassati. so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa suddhaavaasaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjati. aya.m, bhikkhave, upapatti asaadhaara.naa puthujjanehi.

[01] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m ^a^T2.0172^ea^ upasampajja viharati. so yadeva tattha hoti ruupagata.m vedanaagata.m sa~n~naagata.m sa"nkhaaragata.m vi~n~naa.nagata.m, te dhamme aniccato dukkhato rogato ga.n.dato sallato aghato aabaadhato parato palokato su~n~nato anattato samanupassati. so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa suddhaavaasaana.m ^a^V1.0146^ea^ devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjati. aya.m, bhikkhave, upapatti asaadhaara.naa puthujjanehi. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti. catuttha.m.

[03] 125^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo mettaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m ^a^P2.0129^ea^ disa.m pharitvaa viharati, tathaa dutiya.m tathaa tatiya.m tathaa catuttha.m. iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m ^a^M1.0444^ea^ mettaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena pharitvaa viharati. so tadassaadeti, ta.m nikaameti, tena ca vitti.m aapajjati. tattha .thito tadadhimutto tabbahulavihaarii aparihiino kaala.m kurumaano brahmakaayikaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjati. brahmakaayikaana.m, bhikkhave, devaana.m kappo aayuppamaa.na.m. tattha puthujjano yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa yaavataka.m tesa.m devaana.m aayuppamaa.na.m ta.m sabba.m khepetvaa nirayampi gacchati tiracchaanayonimpi gacchati pettivisayampi gacchati. bhagavato pana saavako tattha yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa yaavataka.m tesa.m devaana.m aayuppamaa.na.m ta.m sabba.m khepetvaa tasmi.myeva bhave parinibbaayati. aya.m kho ^a^T2.0173^ea^, bhikkhave, viseso aya.m adhippayaaso ida.m naanaakara.na.m sutavato ariyasaavakassa assutavataa puthujjanena, yadida.m gatiyaa upapattiyaa sati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo karu.naasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... muditaasahagatena cetasaa...pe0... ^a^T2.0174^ea^ upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati, tathaa dutiya.m tathaa tatiya.m tathaa catuttha.m. iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena pharitvaa viharati. so tadassaadeti, ta.m nikaameti, tena ca vitti.m aapajjati. tattha .thito tadadhimutto tabbahulavihaarii aparihiino kaala.m kurumaano aabhassaraana.m {syaamapotthake pana karu.naadayo tayo vihaaraa aabhassaraadiihi tiihi visu.m visu.m yojetvaa paripu.n.nameva dassita.m} devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjati. aabhassaraana.m, bhikkhave, devaana.m dve kappaa aayuppamaa.na.m...pe0... subhaki.nhaana.m {syaamapotthake pana karu.naadayo tayo vihaaraa aabhassaraadiihi tiihi visu.m visu.m yojetvaa paripu.n.nameva dassita.m} devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjati. subhaki.nhaana.m, bhikkhave, devaana.m cattaaro kappaa aayuppamaa.na.m...pe0... vehapphalaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjati. vehapphalaana.m, bhikkhave, devaana.m ^a^V1.0147^ea^ pa~nca kappasataani aayuppamaa.na.m. tattha puthujjano yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa yaavataka.m tesa.m devaana.m aayuppamaa.na.m ta.m sabba.m khepetvaa nirayampi gacchati tiracchaanayonimpi gacchati pettivisayampi gacchati. bhagavato pana saavako tattha yaavataayuka.m .thatvaa ^a^T2.0175^ea^ yaavataka.m tesa.m devaana.m aayuppamaa.na.m ta.m sabba.m khepetvaa tasmi.myeva bhave parinibbaayati. aya.m kho, bhikkhave, viseso ^a^M1.0445^ea^ aya.m adhippayaaso ida.m naanaakara.na.m sutavato ariyasaavakassa assutavataa puthujjanena, yadida.m gatiyaa upapattiyaa sati. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 126^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome ^a^P2.0130^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo mettaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati, tathaa dutiya.m tathaa tatiya.m tathaa catuttha.m. iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m mettaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena pharitvaa viharati. so yadeva tattha hoti ruupagata.m vedanaagata.m sa~n~naagata.m sa"nkhaaragata.m vi~n~naa.nagata.m te dhamme aniccato dukkhato rogato ga.n.dato sallato aghato aabaadhato parato palokato su~n~nato anattato samanupassati. so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa suddhaavaasaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjati. aya.m, bhikkhave, upapatti asaadhaara.naa puthujjanehi.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo karu.naa...pe0... muditaa...pe0... upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati, tathaa dutiya.m tathaa tatiya.m tathaa catuttha.m. iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena pharitvaa viharati ^a^T2.0176^ea^. so yadeva tattha hoti ruupagata.m vedanaagata.m sa~n~naagata.m sa"nkhaaragata.m vi~n~naa.nagata.m te dhamme aniccato dukkhato rogato ga.n.dato sallato aghato aabaadhato parato palokato su~n~nato anattato samanupassati. so kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa suddhaavaasaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjati. aya.m, bhikkhave, upapatti asaadhaara.naa puthujjanehi. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 127^b^.^eb^ ``tathaagatassa ^a^V1.0148^ea^ ^a^M1.0446^ea^, bhikkhave, arahato sammaasambuddhassa paatubhaavaa cattaaro acchariyaa abbhutaa dhammaa {abbhutadhammaa (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} paatubhavanti. katame cattaaro? yadaa, bhikkhave, bodhisatto tusitaa kaayaa cavitvaa sato sampajaano maatukucchi.m okkamati, atha sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya appamaa.no u.laaro obhaaso paatubhavati atikkammeva devaana.m devaanubhaava.m. yaapi taa lokantarikaa aghaa asa.mvutaa andhakaaraa andhakaaratimisaa yatthapimesa.m {yatthimesa.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} candimasuuriyaana.m eva.mmahiddhikaana.m eva.mmahaanubhaavaana.m aabhaa naanubhonti, tatthapi appamaa.no u.laaro obhaaso paatubhavati atikkammeva devaana.m devaanubhaava.m. yepi tattha sattaa upapannaa tepi tenobhaasena a~n~nama~n~na.m sa~njaananti -- `a~n~nepi kira, bho, santi sattaa idhuupapannaa'ti. tathaagatassa ^a^P2.0131^ea^, bhikkhave, arahato sammaasambuddhassa paatubhaavaa aya.m pa.thamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo {abbhutadhammo (syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)} paatubhavati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, yadaa bodhisatto sato sampajaano maatukucchimhaa nikkhamati, atha sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya appamaa.no u.laaro obhaaso paatubhavati atikkammeva devaana.m devaanubhaava.m. yaapi taa lokantarikaa aghaa asa.mvutaa andhakaaraa andhakaaratimisaa yatthapimesa.m candimasuuriyaana.m eva.mmahiddhikaana.m eva.mmahaanubhaavaana.m aabhaa naanubhonti, tatthapi appamaa.no u.laaro obhaaso paatubhavati atikkammeva devaana.m devaanubhaava.m. yepi tattha sattaa upapannaa tepi tenobhaasena a~n~nama~n~na.m sa~njaananti -- `a~n~nepi kira, bho, santi sattaa idhuupapannaa'ti. tathaagatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammaasambuddhassa ^a^T2.0177^ea^ paatubhaavaa aya.m dutiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo paatubhavati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, yadaa tathaagato anuttara.m sammaasambodhi.m abhisambujjhati, atha sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya appamaa.no u.laaro obhaaso ^a^M1.0447^ea^ paatubhavati atikkammeva devaana.m devaanubhaava.m. yaapi taa lokantarikaa aghaa asa.mvutaa andhakaaraa andhakaaratimisaa yatthapimesa.m candimasuuriyaana.m eva.mmahiddhikaana.m eva.mmahaanubhaavaana.m aabhaa naanubhonti, tatthapi appamaa.no u.laaro obhaaso paatubhavati atikkammeva devaana.m devaanubhaava.m. yepi tattha sattaa upapannaa tepi tenobhaasena a~n~nama~n~na.m sa~njaananti ^a^V1.0149^ea^ -- `a~n~nepi kira, bho, santi sattaa idhuupapannaa'ti. tathaagatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammaasambuddhassa paatubhaavaa aya.m tatiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo paatubhavati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, yadaa tathaagato anuttara.m dhammacakka.m pavatteti, atha sadevake loke samaarake sabrahmake sassama.nabraahma.niyaa pajaaya sadevamanussaaya appamaa.no u.laaro obhaaso paatubhavati atikkammeva devaana.m devaanubhaava.m. yaapi taa lokantarikaa aghaa asa.mvutaa andhakaaraa andhakaaratimisaa yatthapimesa.m candimasuuriyaana.m eva.mmahiddhikaana.m eva.mmahaanubhaavaana.m aabhaa naanubhonti, tatthapi appamaa.no u.laaro obhaaso paatubhavati atikkammeva devaana.m devaanubhaava.m. yepi tattha sattaa upapannaa tepi tenobhaasena a~n~nama~n~na.m sa~njaananti -- `a~n~nepi kira, bho, santi sattaa idhuupapannaa'ti. tathaagatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammaasambuddhassa paatubhaavaa aya.m catuttho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo paatubhavati. tathaagatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammaasambuddhassa paatubhaavaa ime cattaaro acchariyaa abbhutaa dhammaa paatubhavantii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 128^b^.^eb^ ``tathaagatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammaasambuddhassa paatubhaavaa cattaaro acchariyaa abbhutaa dhammaa paatubhavanti. katame cattaaro? aalayaaraamaa {aalayaraamaa (a~n~nasuttesu)}, bhikkhave, pajaa aalayarataa aalayasammuditaa; saa tathaagatena anaalaye dhamme desiyamaane sussuusati sota.m odahati a~n~naa citta.m upa.t.thapeti ^a^T2.0178^ea^. tathaagatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammaasambuddhassa paatubhaavaa aya.m pa.thamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo paatubhavati.

[03] ``maanaaraamaa ^a^M1.0448^ea^, bhikkhave, pajaa maanarataa maanasammuditaa. saa ^a^P2.0132^ea^ tathaagatena maanavinaye dhamme desiyamaane sussuusati sota.m odahati a~n~naa citta.m upa.t.thapeti. tathaagatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammaasambuddhassa paatubhaavaa aya.m dutiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo paatubhavati.

[03] ``anupasamaaraamaa, bhikkhave, pajaa anupasamarataa anupasamasammuditaa. saa tathaagatena opasamike dhamme desiyamaane sussuusati sota.m odahati a~n~naa citta.m upa.t.thapeti. tathaagatassa ^a^V1.0150^ea^, bhikkhave, arahato sammaasambuddhassa paatubhaavaa aya.m tatiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo paatubhavati.

[03] ``avijjaagataa, bhikkhave, pajaa a.n.dabhuutaa pariyonaddhaa. saa tathaagatena avijjaavinaye dhamme desiyamaane sussuusati sota.m odahati a~n~naa citta.m upa.t.thapeti. tathaagatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammaasambuddhassa paatubhaavaa aya.m catuttho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo paatubhavati. tathaagatassa, bhikkhave, arahato sammaasambuddhassa paatubhaavaa ime cattaaro acchariyaa abbhutaa dhammaa paatubhavantii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 129^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, acchariyaa abbhutaa dhammaa aanande. katame cattaaro? sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhuparisaa aananda.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamati, dassanenapi saa attamanaa hoti. tatra ce aanando dhamma.m bhaasati, bhaasitenapi saa attamanaa hoti. atittaava, bhikkhave, bhikkhuparisaa hoti, atha aanando tu.nhii bhavati.

[03] ``sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniparisaa aananda.m ^a^T2.0179^ea^ dassanaaya upasa"nkamati, dassanenapi saa attamanaa hoti. tattha ce aanando dhamma.m bhaasati, bhaasitenapi saa attamanaa hoti. atittaava, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniparisaa hoti, atha aanando tu.nhii bhavati.

[03] ``sace, bhikkhave, upaasakaparisaa aananda.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamati, dassanenapi saa attamanaa hoti. tatra ce aanando dhamma.m bhaasati, bhaasitenapi ^a^M1.0449^ea^ saa attamanaa hoti. atittaava, bhikkhave, upaasakaparisaa hoti, atha aanando tu.nhii bhavati.

[03] ``sace, bhikkhave, upaasikaaparisaa aananda.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamati, dassanenapi saa attamanaa hoti. tatra ce aanando dhamma.m bhaasati, bhaasitenapi saa attamanaa hoti. atittaava, bhikkhave, upaasikaaparisaa hoti, atha aanando tu.nhii bhavati. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro acchariyaa abbhutaa dhammaa aanande''ti. navama.m.

[03] 130^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome ^a^V1.0151^ea^ ^a^P2.0133^ea^, bhikkhave, acchariyaa abbhutaa dhammaa ra~n~ne cakkavattimhi. katame cattaaro? sace, bhikkhave, khattiyaparisaa raajaana.m cakkavatti.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamati, dassanenapi saa attamanaa hoti. tatra ce raajaa cakkavattii bhaasati, bhaasitenapi saa attamanaa hoti. atittaava, bhikkhave, khattiyaparisaa hoti, atha raajaa cakkavattii tu.nhii bhavati.

[03] ``sace, bhikkhave, braahma.naparisaa raajaana.m cakkavatti.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamati, dassanenapi saa attamanaa hoti. tatra ce raajaa cakkavattii bhaasati, bhaasitenapi saa attamanaa hoti. atittaava, bhikkhave, braahma.naparisaa hoti, atha raajaa cakkavattii tu.nhii bhavati.

[03] ``sace, bhikkhave, gahapatiparisaa raajaana.m cakkavatti.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamati, dassanenapi saa attamanaa ^a^T2.0180^ea^ hoti. tatra ce raajaa cakkavattii bhaasati, bhaasitenapi saa attamanaa hoti. atittaava, bhikkhave, gahapatiparisaa hoti, atha raajaa cakkavattii tu.nhii bhavati.

[03] ``sace, bhikkhave, sama.naparisaa raajaana.m cakkavatti.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamati, dassanenapi saa attamanaa hoti. tatra ce raajaa cakkavattii bhaasati, bhaasitenapi saa attamanaa hoti. atittaava, bhikkhave, sama.naparisaa hoti, atha raajaa cakkavattii tu.nhii bhavati. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro acchariyaa abbhutaa dhammaa ra~n~ne cakkavattimhi.

[03] ``evameva.m ^a^M1.0450^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro {cattaarome (ka0)} acchariyaa abbhutaa dhammaa aanande. katame cattaaro? sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhuparisaa aananda.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamati, dassanenapi saa attamanaa hoti. tatra ce aanando dhamma.m bhaasati, bhaasitenapi saa attamanaa hoti. atittaava, bhikkhave, bhikkhuparisaa hoti, atha aanando tu.nhii bhavati.

[03] ``sace, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniparisaa...pe0... sace, bhikkhave, upaasakaparisaa...pe0... sace ^a^V1.0152^ea^, bhikkhave, upaasikaaparisaa aananda.m dassanaaya upasa"nkamati, dassanenapi saa attamanaa hoti. tatra ce aanando dhamma.m bhaasati, bhaasitenapi saa attamanaa hoti. atittaava, bhikkhave, upaasikaaparisaa hoti, atha aanando tu.nhii bhavati. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro acchariyaa abbhutaa dhammaa aanande''ti. dasama.m.

[03] 131^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome ^a^V1.0153^ea^ ^a^T2.0181^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa orambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani appahiinaani honti, upapattipa.tilaabhiyaani sa.myojanaani appahiinaani honti, bhavapa.tilaabhiyaani sa.myojanaani appahiinaani honti.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa orambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani pahiinaani honti, upapattipa.tilaabhiyaani sa.myojanaani appahiinaani honti, bhavapa.tilaabhiyaani sa.myojanaani appahiinaani honti.

[03] ``idha ^a^M1.0451^ea^ ^a^P2.0134^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa orambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani pahiinaani honti, upapattipa.tilaabhiyaani sa.myojanaani pahiinaani honti, bhavapa.tilaabhiyaani sa.myojanaani appahiinaani honti.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa orambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani pahiinaani honti, upapattipa.tilaabhiyaani sa.myojanaani pahiinaani honti, bhavapa.tilaabhiyaani sa.myojanaani pahiinaani honti.

[03] ``katamassa, bhikkhave, puggalassa orambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani appahiinaani, upapattipa.tilaabhiyaani sa.myojanaani appahiinaani, bhavapa.tilaabhiyaani sa.myojanaani appahiinaani? sakadaagaamissa. imassa kho, bhikkhave, puggalassa orambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani appahiinaani, upapattipa.tilaabhiyaani sa.myojanaani appahiinaani, bhavapa.tilaabhiyaani sa.myojanaani appahiinaani.

[03] ``katamassa ^a^V1.0154^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalassa orambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani pahiinaani, upapattipa.tilaabhiyaani sa.myojanaani appahiinaani, bhavapa.tilaabhiyaani sa.myojanaani ^a^T2.0182^ea^ appahiinaani? uddha.msotassa akani.t.thagaamino. imassa kho, bhikkhave, puggalassa orambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani pahiinaani, upapattipa.tilaabhiyaani sa.myojanaani appahiinaani, bhavapa.tilaabhiyaani sa.myojanaani appahiinaani.

[03] ``katamassa, bhikkhave, puggalassa orambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani pahiinaani, upapattipa.tilaabhiyaani sa.myojanaani pahiinaani, bhavapa.tilaabhiyaani sa.myojanaani appahiinaani? antaraaparinibbaayissa. imassa kho, bhikkhave, puggalassa orambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani pahiinaani, upapattipa.tilaabhiyaani sa.myojanaani pahiinaani, bhavapa.tilaabhiyaani sa.myojanaani appahiinaani.

[03] ``katamassa, bhikkhave, puggalassa orambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani pahiinaani, upapattipa.tilaabhiyaani sa.myojanaani pahiinaani, bhavapa.tilaabhiyaani sa.myojanaani pahiinaani? arahato. imassa kho, bhikkhave, puggalassa orambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani pahiinaani, upapattipa.tilaabhiyaani sa.myojanaani pahiinaani, bhavapa.tilaabhiyaani sa.myojanaani pahiinaani. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 132^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome ^a^M1.0452^ea^ ^a^P2.0135^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro? yuttappa.tibhaano, no muttappa.tibhaano; muttappa.tibhaano, no yuttappa.tibhaano; yuttappa.tibhaano ca muttappa.tibhaano ca; neva yuttappa.tibhaano na muttappa.tibhaano -- ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti {pu0 pa0 152 aadayo}. dutiya.m.

[03] 133^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome ^a^T2.0183^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro ^a^V1.0155^ea^? uggha.tita~n~nuu, vipa~ncita~n~nuu, neyyo, padaparamo -- ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti {pu0 pa0 152 aadayo}. tatiya.m.

[03] 134^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro? u.t.thaanaphaluupajiivii na kammaphaluupajiivii, kammaphaluupajiivii na u.t.thaanaphaluupajiivii, u.t.thaanaphaluupajiivii ceva kammaphaluupajiivii ca, neva u.t.thaanaphaluupajiivii na kammaphaluupajiivii -- ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti {pu0 pa0 167}. catuttha.m.
[03] 135^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, puggalaa {pu0 pa0 144 aadayo} santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro? saavajjo, vajjabahulo, appavajjo, anavajjo.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo saavajjo hoti? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo saavajjena kaayakammena samannaagato hoti, saavajjena vaciikammena samannaagato hoti, saavajjena manokammena samannaagato hoti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo saavajjo hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^P2.0136^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalo vajjabahulo hoti? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo saavajjena bahula.m kaayakammena samannaagato hoti, appa.m anavajjena; saavajjena bahula.m vaciikammena samannaagato hoti, appa.m anavajjena; saavajjena bahula.m manokammena samannaagato hoti, appa.m anavajjena. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo vajjabahulo hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^M1.0453^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalo appavajjo hoti? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo anavajjena bahula.m kaayakammena samannaagato ^a^T2.0184^ea^ hoti, appa.m saavajjena; anavajjena bahula.m vaciikammena samannaagato hoti, appa.m saavajjena; anavajjena bahula.m manokammena samannaagato hoti, appa.m saavajjena. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo appavajjo hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^V1.0156^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalo anavajjo hoti? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo anavajjena kaayakammena samannaagato hoti, anavajjena vaciikammena samannaagato hoti, anavajjena manokammena samannaagato hoti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo anavajjo hoti. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 136^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo siilesu na paripuurakaarii hoti, samaadhismi.m na paripuurakaarii, pa~n~naaya na paripuurakaarii.
[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo siilesu paripuurakaarii hoti, samaadhismi.m na paripuurakaarii, pa~n~naaya na paripuurakaarii.
[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo siilesu paripuurakaarii hoti, samaadhismi.m paripuurakaarii, pa~n~naaya na paripuurakaarii.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo siilesu paripuurakaarii hoti, samaadhismi.m paripuurakaarii, pa~n~naaya paripuurakaarii. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 137^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro? idha ^a^P2.0137^ea^, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo na siilagaru hoti na siilaadhipateyyo, na samaadhigaru hoti na samaadhaadhipateyyo, na ^a^T2.0185^ea^ pa~n~naagaru hoti na pa~n~naadhipateyyo.
[01] ``idha ^a^V1.0157^ea^ ^a^M1.0454^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo siilagaru hoti siilaadhipateyyo, na samaadhigaru hoti na samaadhaadhipateyyo, na pa~n~naagaru hoti na pa~n~naadhipateyyo.
[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo siilagaru hoti siilaadhipateyyo, samaadhigaru hoti samaadhaadhipateyyo, na pa~n~naagaru hoti na pa~n~naadhipateyyo.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo siilagaru hoti siilaadhipateyyo, samaadhigaru hoti samaadhaadhipateyyo, pa~n~naagaru hoti pa~n~naadhipateyyo. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti. sattama.m.

[03] 138^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro? nika.t.thakaayo anika.t.thacitto, anika.t.thakaayo nika.t.thacitto, anika.t.thakaayo ca anika.t.thacitto ca, nika.t.thakaayo ca nika.t.thacitto ca.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo nika.t.thakaayo hoti anika.t.thacitto? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ara~n~navanapatthaani {ara~n~ne vanapatthaani (sii0 pii0)} pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevati. so tattha kaamavitakkampi vitakketi byaapaadavitakkampi vitakketi vihi.msaavitakkampi vitakketi. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo nika.t.thakaayo hoti anika.t.thacitto.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo anika.t.thakaayo hoti nika.t.thacitto? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo naheva kho ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevati. so tattha nekkhammavitakkampi vitakketi abyaapaadavitakkampi vitakketi avihi.msaavitakkampi vitakketi. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo anika.t.thakaayo hoti ^a^T2.0186^ea^ nika.t.thacitto.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo anika.t.thakaayo ca hoti anika.t.thacitto ca? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo naheva kho ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani ^a^M1.0455^ea^ pa.tisevati ^a^P2.0138^ea^. so ^a^V1.0158^ea^ tattha kaamavitakkampi vitakketi byaapaadavitakkampi vitakketi vihi.msaavitakkampi vitakketi. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo anika.t.thakaayo ca hoti anika.t.thacitto ca.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, puggalo nika.t.thakaayo ca hoti nika.t.thacitto ca? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ara~n~navanapatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevati. so tattha nekkhammavitakkampi vitakketi abyaapaadavitakkampi vitakketi avihi.msaavitakkampi vitakketi. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, puggalo nika.t.thakaayo ca hoti nika.t.thacitto ca. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 139^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, dhammakathikaa. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco dhammakathiko appa~nca bhaasati asahita~nca; parisaa cassa {parisaa ca (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0) pu0 pa0 156} na kusalaa hoti sahitaasahitassa. evaruupo, bhikkhave, dhammakathiko evaruupaaya parisaaya dhammakathikotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco dhammakathiko appa~nca bhaasati sahita~nca; parisaa cassa kusalaa hoti sahitaasahitassa. evaruupo, bhikkhave, dhammakathiko evaruupaaya parisaaya dhammakathikotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco dhammakathiko bahu~nca bhaasati asahita~nca; parisaa cassa na kusalaa hoti sahitaasahitassa. evaruupo, bhikkhave, dhammakathiko evaruupaaya parisaaya dhammakathikotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco dhammakathiko bahu~nca ^a^T2.0187^ea^ bhaasati sahita~nca; parisaa cassa kusalaa hoti sahitaasahitassa. evaruupo, bhikkhave, dhammakathiko evaruupaaya parisaaya dhammakathikotveva sa"nkha.m gacchati. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro dhammakathikaa''ti. navama.m.

[03] 140^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome ^a^V1.0159^ea^, bhikkhave, vaadii. katame cattaaro? atthi ^a^P2.0139^ea^, bhikkhave, vaadii atthato pariyaadaana.m gacchati, no bya~njanato; atthi, bhikkhave, vaadii bya~njanato ^a^M1.0456^ea^ pariyaadaana.m gacchati, no atthato; atthi, bhikkhave, vaadii atthato ca bya~njanato ca pariyaadaana.m gacchati; atthi, bhikkhave, vaadii nevatthato no bya~njanato pariyaadaana.m gacchati. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro vaadii. a.t.thaanameta.m, bhikkhave, anavakaaso ya.m catuuhi pa.tisambhidaahi samannaagato {samannaagato bhikkhu (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} atthato vaa bya~njanato vaa pariyaadaana.m gaccheyyaa''ti. dasama.m.
[06] puggalavaggo catuttho.

[21] sa.myojana.m pa.tibhaano, uggha.tita~n~nu u.t.thaana.m.

[03] 141^b^.^eb^ ``catasso ^a^V1.0160^ea^ imaa, bhikkhave, aabhaa. katamaa catasso? candaabhaa, suuriyaabhaa, aggaabhaa, pa~n~naabhaa -- imaa kho, bhikkhave, catasso aabhaa. etadagga.m, bhikkhave, imaasa.m catunna.m {catassanna.m (syaa0 ka.m0) saddaniitipadamaalaa passitabbaa} aabhaana.m yadida.m pa~n~naabhaa''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 142^b^.^eb^ ``catasso imaa, bhikkhave, pabhaa. katamaa catasso? candappabhaa ^a^T2.0188^ea^, suuriyappabhaa, aggippabhaa, pa~n~naapabhaa -- imaa kho, bhikkhave, catasso pabhaa. etadagga.m, bhikkhave, imaasa.m catunna.m pabhaana.m yadida.m pa~n~naapabhaa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 143^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, aalokaa. katame cattaaro? candaaloko, suuriyaaloko, aggaaloko, pa~n~naaloko -- ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro aalokaa. etadagga.m, bhikkhave, imesa.m catunna.m aalokaana.m yadida.m pa~n~naaloko''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 144^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome ^a^M1.0457^ea^, bhikkhave, obhaasaa. katame cattaaro? candobhaaso, suuriyobhaaso, aggobhaaso, pa~n~nobhaaso -- ime ^a^P2.0140^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro obhaasaa. etadagga.m, bhikkhave, imesa.m catunna.m obhaasaana.m yadida.m pa~n~nobhaaso''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 145^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome ^a^V1.0161^ea^, bhikkhave, pajjotaa. katame cattaaro? candapajjoto, suuriyapajjoto, aggipajjoto, pa~n~naapajjoto -- ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro pajjotaa. etadagga.m, bhikkhave, imesa.m catunna.m pajjotaana.m yadida.m pa~n~naapajjoto''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 146^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, kaalaa. katame cattaaro? kaalena dhammassavana.m, kaalena dhammasaakacchaa, kaalena sammasanaa {kaalena samatho (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, kaalena vipassanaa -- ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro kaalaa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 147^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, kaalaa sammaa bhaaviyamaanaa sammaa anuparivattiyamaanaa anupubbena aasavaana.m khaya.m paapenti. katame cattaaro? kaalena dhammassavana.m, kaalena dhammasaakacchaa, kaalena sammasanaa, kaalena vipassanaa ^a^T2.0189^ea^ -- ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro kaalaa sammaa bhaaviyamaanaa sammaa anuparivattiyamaanaa anupubbena aasavaana.m khaya.m paapenti.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, uparipabbate thullaphusitake deve vassante ta.m udaka.m yathaaninna.m pavattamaana.m pabbatakandarapadarasaakhaa paripuureti; pabbatakandarapadarasaakhaa paripuuraa kusobbhe paripuurenti; kusobbhaa paripuuraa mahaasobbhe paripuurenti; mahaasobbhaa paripuuraa kunnadiyo paripuurenti; kunnadiyo ^a^M1.0458^ea^ paripuuraa mahaanadiyo paripuurenti; mahaanadiyo paripuuraa samudda.m {samudda.m saagara.m (sii0 pii0 ka0), samuddasaagara.m (syaa0 ka.m0)} paripuurenti. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, ime cattaaro kaalaa sammaa bhaaviyamaanaa sammaa anuparivattiyamaanaa anupubbena aasavaana.m khaya.m paapentii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 148^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarimaani ^a^V1.0162^ea^ ^a^P2.0141^ea^, bhikkhave, vaciiduccaritaani. katamaani cattaari? musaavaado, pisu.naa vaacaa, pharusaa vaacaa, samphappalaapo -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, cattaari vaciiduccaritaanii''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 149^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarimaani, bhikkhave, vaciisucaritaani. katamaani cattaari? saccavaacaa, apisu.naa vaacaa, sa.nhaa vaacaa, mantabhaasaa -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, cattaari vaciisucaritaanii''ti. navama.m.
[03] 150^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, saaraa. katame cattaaro? siilasaaro, samaadhisaaro, pa~n~naasaaro, vimuttisaaro -- ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro saaraa''ti. dasama.m.

[03] 152^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarimaani, bhikkhave, balaani. katamaani cattaari? saddhaabala.m, viiriyabala.m, satibala.m, samaadhibala.m -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, cattaari balaanii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 154^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarimaani, bhikkhave, balaani. katamaani cattaari? satibala.m, samaadhibala.m, anavajjabala.m, sa"ngahabala.m -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, cattaari balaanii''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 156^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarimaani ^a^M1.0460^ea^, bhikkhave, kappassa asa"nkhyeyyaani. katamaani cattaari? yadaa, bhikkhave, kappo sa.mva.t.tati, ta.m na sukara.m sa"nkhaatu.m ^a^T2.0191^ea^ -- ettakaani vassaaniiti vaa, ettakaani vassasataaniiti vaa, ettakaani vassasahassaaniiti vaa, ettakaani vassasatasahassaaniiti vaa.

[03] ``yadaa, bhikkhave, kappo sa.mva.t.to ti.t.thati, ta.m na sukara.m sa"nkhaatu.m -- ettakaani vassaaniiti vaa, ettakaani vassasataaniiti vaa, ettakaani vassasahassaaniiti vaa, ettakaani vassasatasahassaaniiti vaa.

[03] ``yadaa, bhikkhave, kappo viva.t.tati, ta.m na sukara.m sa"nkhaatu.m -- ettakaani vassaaniiti vaa, ettakaani vassasataaniiti vaa, ettakaani vassasahassaaniiti vaa, ettakaani vassasatasahassaaniiti vaa.

[01] ``yadaa, bhikkhave, kappo viva.t.to ti.t.thati, ta.m na sukara.m sa"nkhaatu.m -- ettakaani vassaaniiti vaa, ettakaani vassasataaniiti vaa, ettakaani vassasahassaaniiti vaa, ettakaani vassasatasahassaaniiti vaa. imaani kho, bhikkhave, cattaari kappassa asa"nkhyeyyaanii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 157^b^.^eb^ ``dveme, bhikkhave, rogaa. katame dve? kaayiko ^a^P2.0143^ea^ ca rogo cetasiko ca rogo. dissanti, bhikkhave, sattaa kaayikena rogena ekampi vassa.m aarogya.m pa.tijaanamaanaa, dvepi ^a^V1.0165^ea^ vassaani aarogya.m pa.tijaanamaanaa, tii.nipi vassaani aarogya.m pa.tijaanamaanaa, cattaaripi vassaani aarogya.m pa.tijaanamaanaa, pa~ncapi vassaani aarogya.m pa.tijaanamaanaa, dasapi vassaani aarogya.m pa.tijaanamaanaa, viisatipi vassaani aarogya.m pa.tijaanamaanaa, ti.msampi vassaani aarogya.m pa.tijaanamaanaa, cattaariisampi vassaani aarogya.m pa.tijaanamaanaa, pa~n~naasampi vassaani aarogya.m pa.tijaanamaanaa, vassasatampi, bhiyyopi aarogya.m pa.tijaanamaanaa ^a^T2.0192^ea^. te, bhikkhave, sattaa sudullabhaa {dullabhaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} lokasmi.m ye cetasikena rogena muhuttampi aarogya.m pa.tijaananti, a~n~natra khii.naasavehi.

[03] ``cattaarome ^a^M1.0461^ea^, bhikkhave, pabbajitassa rogaa. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mahiccho hoti vighaatavaa asantu.t.tho itariitaraciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena. so mahiccho samaano vighaatavaa asantu.t.tho itariitaraciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena paapika.m iccha.m pa.nidahati anava~n~nappa.tilaabhaaya laabhasakkaarasilokappa.tilaabhaaya. so u.t.thahati gha.tati vaayamati anava~n~nappa.tilaabhaaya laabhasakkaarasilokappa.tilaabhaaya. so sa"nkhaaya kulaani upasa"nkamati, sa"nkhaaya nisiidati, sa"nkhaaya dhamma.m bhaasati, sa"nkhaaya uccaarapassaava.m sandhaareti. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro pabbajitassa rogaa.

[03] ``tasmaatiha, bhikkhave, eva.m sikkhitabba.m -- `na mahicchaa bhavissaama vighaatavanto asantu.t.thaa itariitaraciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanappaccayabhesajjaparikkhaarena, na paapika.m iccha.m pa.nidahissaama anava~n~nappa.tilaabhaaya laabhasakkaarasilokappa.tilaabhaaya, na u.t.thahissaama na gha.tessaama na vaayamissaama anava~n~nappa.tilaabhaaya laabhasakkaarasilokappa.tilaabhaaya, khamaa bhavissaama siitassa u.nhassa jighacchaaya pipaasaaya .da.msamakasavaataatapasariisapasamphassaana.m duruttaana.m duraagataana.m vacanapathaana.m, uppannaana.m saariirikaana.m vedanaana.m dukkhaana.m tibbaana.m kharaana.m ka.tukaana.m asaataana.m amanaapaana.m paa.naharaana.m adhivaasakajaatikaa bhavissaamaa'ti. eva~nhi vo, bhikkhave ^a^T2.0193^ea^, sikkhitabba''nti. sattama.m.

[03] 158^b^.^eb^ tatra ^a^V1.0166^ea^ kho aayasmaa saariputto bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``aavuso bhikkhave''ti ^a^P2.0144^ea^. ``aavuso''ti kho te bhikkhuu aayasmato saariputtassa paccassosu.m. aayasmaa saariputto etadavoca --

[03] ``yo hi koci, aavuso, bhikkhu vaa bhikkhunii vaa cattaaro dhamme attani samanupassati, ni.t.thamettha gantabba.m -- `parihaayaami kusalehi dhammehi'. parihaanameta.m vutta.m bhagavataa. katame cattaaro? raagavepullatta.m {raagavepullata.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, dosavepullatta.m, mohavepullatta.m, gambhiiresu kho panassa .thaanaa.thaanesu pa~n~naacakkhu ^a^M1.0462^ea^ na kamati. yo hi koci, aavuso, bhikkhu vaa bhikkhunii vaa ime cattaaro dhamme attani samanupassati, ni.t.thamettha gantabba.m -- `parihaayaami kusalehi dhammehi'. parihaanameta.m vutta.m bhagavataa.

[03] ``yo hi koci, aavuso, bhikkhu vaa bhikkhunii vaa cattaaro dhamme attani samanupassati, ni.t.thamettha gantabba.m -- `na parihaayaami kusalehi dhammehi'. aparihaanameta.m vutta.m bhagavataa. katame cattaaro? raagatanutta.m {raagatanuttana.m (ka0)}, dosatanutta.m, mohatanutta.m, gambhiiresu kho panassa .thaanaa.thaanesu pa~n~naacakkhu kamati. yo hi koci, aavuso, bhikkhu vaa bhikkhunii vaa ime cattaaro dhamme attani samanupassati, ni.t.thamettha gantabba.m -- `na parihaayaami kusalehi dhammehi'. aparihaanameta.m vutta.m bhagavataa''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 159^b^.^eb^ eva.m me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m aayasmaa aanando kosambiya.m viharati ghositaaraame ^a^T2.0194^ea^. atha kho a~n~nataraa bhikkhunii a~n~natara.m purisa.m aamantesi -- ``ehi tva.m, ambho purisa, yenayyo aanando tenupasa"nkama; upasa"nkamitvaa mama vacanena ayyassa aanandassa paade sirasaa vanda -- `itthannaamaa, bhante, bhikkhunii aabaadhikinii dukkhitaa baa.lhagilaanaa. saa ayyassa aanandassa paade sirasaa vandatii'ti. eva~nca vadehi -- `saadhu kira, bhante, ayyo aanando yena bhikkhunupassayo yena saa bhikkhunii tenupasa"nkamatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa'''ti ^a^V1.0167^ea^. ``eva.m, ayye''ti kho so puriso tassaa bhikkhuniyaa pa.tissutvaa yenaayasmaa aanando tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmanta.m ^a^P2.0145^ea^ aananda.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so puriso aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca --

[03] ``itthannaamaa, bhante, bhikkhunii aabaadhikinii dukkhitaa baa.lhagilaanaa. saa aayasmato aanandassa paade sirasaa vandati, eva~nca vadeti -- `saadhu kira, bhante, aayasmaa aanando yena bhikkhunupassayo yena saa bhikkhunii tenupasa"nkamatu anukampa.m upaadaayaa'''ti. adhivaasesi kho aayasmaa aanando tu.nhiibhaavena.

[03] atha ^a^M1.0463^ea^ kho aayasmaa aanando nivaasetvaa pattaciivaramaadaaya yena bhikkhunupassayo yena saa bhikkhunii tenupasa"nkami. addasaa kho saa bhikkhunii aayasmanta.m aananda.m duuratova aagacchanta.m. disvaa sasiisa.m paarupitvaa ma~ncake nipajji. atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena saa bhikkhunii tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja ^a^T2.0195^ea^ kho aayasmaa aanando ta.m bhikkhuni.m etadavoca --

[03] ``aahaarasambhuuto aya.m, bhagini, kaayo aahaara.m nissaaya. aahaaro pahaatabbo. ta.nhaasambhuuto aya.m, bhagini, kaayo ta.nha.m nissaaya. ta.nhaa pahaatabbaa. maanasambhuuto aya.m, bhagini, kaayo maana.m nissaaya. maano pahaatabbo. methunasambhuuto aya.m, bhagini, kaayo. methune ca setughaato vutto bhagavataa.

[03] ```aahaarasambhuuto aya.m, bhagini, kaayo aahaara.m nissaaya. aahaaro pahaatabbo'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? idha, bhagini, bhikkhu pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso aahaara.m aahaareti -- `neva davaaya na madaaya na ma.n.danaaya na vibhuusanaaya, yaavadeva imassa kaayassa .thitiyaa yaapanaaya vihi.msuuparatiyaa brahmacariyaanuggahaaya. iti puraa.na~nca vedana.m pa.tiha"nkhaami, nava~nca vedana.m na uppaadessaami. yaatraa ca me bhavissati anavajjataa ca phaasuvihaaro caa'ti. so aparena samayena aahaara.m nissaaya aahaara.m pajahati. `aahaarasambhuuto aya.m, bhagini, kaayo aahaara.m nissaaya. aahaaro pahaatabbo'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```ta.nhaasambhuuto ^a^V1.0168^ea^ aya.m, bhagini, kaayo ta.nha.m nissaaya. ta.nhaa pahaatabbaa'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca ^a^P2.0146^ea^ vutta.m? idha, bhagini, bhikkhu su.naati -- `itthannaamo kira bhikkhu aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatii'ti. tassa eva.m hoti -- `kudaassu naama ahampi ^a^T2.0196^ea^ aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissaamii'ti! so aparena samayena ta.nha.m nissaaya ta.nha.m pajahati. `ta.nhaasambhuuto aya.m, bhagini, kaayo ta.nha.m nissaaya. ta.nhaa pahaatabbaa'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.

[03] ```maanasambhuuto ^a^M1.0464^ea^ aya.m, bhagini, kaayo maana.m nissaaya. maano pahaatabbo'ti, iti kho paneta.m vutta.m. ki~nceta.m pa.ticca vutta.m? idha, bhagini, bhikkhu su.naati -- `itthannaamo kira bhikkhu aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatii'ti. tassa eva.m hoti -- `so hi naama aayasmaa aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissati; kima"nga.m {kima"nga (sii0 pii0) a0 ni0 5.180; cuu.lava0 331; sa.m0 ni0 5.1020} panaaha'nti! so aparena samayena maana.m nissaaya maana.m pajahati. `maanasambhuuto aya.m, bhagini, kaayo maana.m nissaaya. maano pahaatabbo'ti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta.m.
[03] ``methunasambhuuto aya.m, bhagini, kaayo. methune ca setughaato vutto bhagavataa''ti.

[03] atha kho saa bhikkhunii ma~ncakaa vu.t.thahitvaa eka.msa.m uttaraasa"nga.m karitvaa aayasmato aanandassa paadesu sirasaa nipatitvaa aayasmanta.m aananda.m etadavoca -- ``accayo ma.m, bhante, accagamaa, yathaabaala.m yathaamuu.lha.m yathaaakusala.m, yaaha.m evamakaasi.m. tassaa me, bhante, ayyo aanando accaya.m accayato pa.tigga.nhaatu, aayati.m ^a^T2.0197^ea^ sa.mvaraayaa''ti. ``taggha ta.m {taggha tva.m (sii0 pii0 ka0)}, bhagini, accayo accagamaa, yathaabaala.m yathaamuu.lha.m yathaaakusala.m, yaa tva.m evamakaasi. yato ca kho tva.m, bhagini, accaya.m accayato disvaa yathaadhamma.m pa.tikarosi, ta.m te maya.m pa.tigga.nhaama. vuddhi hesaa, bhagini, ariyassa vinaye yo accaya.m accayato disvaa yathaadhamma.m pa.tikaroti aayati.m sa.mvara.m aapajjatii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 160^b^.^eb^ ``sugato ^a^V1.0169^ea^ ^a^P2.0147^ea^ vaa, bhikkhave, loke ti.t.thamaano sugatavinayo vaa tadassa bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaana.m.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, sugato? idha, bhikkhave, tathaagato loke uppajjati araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno sugato lokaviduu anuttaro ^a^M1.0465^ea^ purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa. aya.m, bhikkhave, sugato.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, sugatavinayo? so dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. aya.m, bhikkhave, sugatavinayo. eva.m sugato vaa, bhikkhave, loke ti.t.thamaano sugatavinayo vaa tadassa bahujanahitaaya bahujanasukhaaya lokaanukampaaya atthaaya hitaaya sukhaaya devamanussaananti.

[03] ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, dhammaa saddhammassa sammosaaya antaradhaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu duggahita.m suttanta.m pariyaapu.nanti dunnikkhittehi padabya~njanehi. dunnikkhittassa, bhikkhave, padabya~njanassa ^a^T2.0198^ea^ atthopi dunnayo hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo dhammo saddhammassa sammosaaya antaradhaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu dubbacaa honti dovacassakara.nehi dhammehi samannaagataa akkhamaa appadakkhi.naggaahino anusaasani.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo dhammo saddhammassa sammosaaya antaradhaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhuu bahussutaa aagataagamaa dhammadharaa vinayadharaa maatikaadharaa, te na sakkacca.m suttanta.m para.m vaacenti. tesa.m accayena chinnamuulako suttanto hoti appa.tisara.no. aya.m, bhikkhave, tatiyo dhammo saddhammassa sammosaaya antaradhaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna ^a^V1.0170^ea^ capara.m, bhikkhave, theraa bhikkhuu baahulikaa honti ^a^P2.0148^ea^ saathalikaa, okkamane pubba"ngamaa, paviveke nikkhittadhuraa, na viiriya.m aarabhanti appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya. tesa.m pacchimaa janataa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjati. saapi hoti baahulikaa saathalikaa, okkamane pubba"ngamaa, paviveke nikkhittadhuraa, na viiriya.m aarabhati appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya. aya.m, bhikkhave, catuttho dhammo saddhammassa sammosaaya antaradhaanaaya sa.mvattati. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro dhammaa saddhammassa sammosaaya antaradhaanaaya sa.mvattantii''ti.

[03] ``cattaarome ^a^M1.0466^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammaa saddhammassa .thitiyaa asammosaaya anantaradhaanaaya sa.mvattanti. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu suggahita.m suttanta.m pariyaapu.nanti sunikkhittehi padabya~njanehi. sunikkhittassa, bhikkhave, padabya~njanassa atthopi sunayo ^a^T2.0199^ea^ hoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo dhammo saddhammassa .thitiyaa asammosaaya anantaradhaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu suvacaa honti sovacassakara.nehi dhammehi samannaagataa khamaa padakkhi.naggaahino anusaasani.m. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo dhammo saddhammassa .thitiyaa asammosaaya anantaradhaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, ye te bhikkhuu bahussutaa aagataagamaa dhammadharaa vinayadharaa maatikaadharaa, te sakkacca.m suttanta.m para.m vaacenti. tesa.m accayena nacchinnamuulako {acchinnamuulako (syaa0 ka.m0) a0 ni0 5.156} suttanto hoti sappa.tisara.no. aya.m, bhikkhave, tatiyo dhammo saddhammassa .thitiyaa asammosaaya anantaradhaanaaya sa.mvattati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, theraa bhikkhuu na baahulikaa honti na saathalikaa, okkamane nikkhittadhuraa, paviveke pubba"ngamaa, viiriya.m aarabhanti appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya. tesa.m pacchimaa janataa di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjati. saapi hoti na baahulikaa na saathalikaa, okkamane nikkhittadhuraa, paviveke pubba"ngamaa, viiriya.m aarabhati appattassa pattiyaa anadhigatassa adhigamaaya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyaaya ^a^V1.0171^ea^. aya.m, bhikkhave, catuttho dhammo saddhammassa .thitiyaa asammosaaya anantaradhaanaaya sa.mvattati. ime ^a^P2.0149^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro dhammaa saddhammassa .thitiyaa asammosaaya anantaradhaanaaya sa.mvattantii''ti. dasama.m.
[06] indriyavaggo pa.thamo.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] indriyaani saddhaa pa~n~naa, sati sa"nkhaanapa~ncama.m.
[22] kappo rogo parihaani, bhikkhunii sugatena caati..

[03] 161^b^.^eb^ ``catasso ^a^V1.0172^ea^ ^a^M1.0467^ea^ ^a^T2.0200^ea^ imaa, bhikkhave, pa.tipadaa. katamaa catasso? dukkhaa pa.tipadaa dandhaabhi~n~naa, dukkhaa pa.tipadaa khippaabhi~n~naa, sukhaa pa.tipadaa dandhaabhi~n~naa, sukhaa pa.tipadaa khippaabhi~n~naa -- imaa kho, bhikkhave, catasso pa.tipadaa''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 162^b^.^eb^ ``catasso imaa, bhikkhave, pa.tipadaa. katamaa catasso? dukkhaa pa.tipadaa dandhaabhi~n~naa, dukkhaa pa.tipadaa khippaabhi~n~naa, sukhaa pa.tipadaa dandhaabhi~n~naa, sukhaa pa.tipadaa khippaabhi~n~naa.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, dukkhaa pa.tipadaa dandhaabhi~n~naa? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco pakatiyaapi tibbaraagajaatiko hoti, abhikkha.na.m raagaja.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti. pakatiyaapi tibbadosajaatiko hoti, abhikkha.na.m dosaja.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti. pakatiyaapi tibbamohajaatiko hoti, abhikkha.na.m mohaja.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti. tassimaani pa~ncindriyaani muduuni paatubhavanti -- saddhindriya.m, viiriyindriya.m, satindriya.m, samaadhindriya.m, pa~n~nindriya.m. so imesa.m pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m muduttaa dandha.m aanantariya.m paapu.naati aasavaana.m khayaaya. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkhaa pa.tipadaa dandhaabhi~n~naa.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, dukkhaa pa.tipadaa khippaabhi~n~naa? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco pakatiyaapi tibbaraagajaatiko hoti, abhikkha.na.m raagaja.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti. pakatiyaapi tibbadosajaatiko hoti, abhikkha.na.m dosaja.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti. pakatiyaapi tibbamohajaatiko hoti ^a^T2.0201^ea^, abhikkha.na.m mohaja.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti. tassimaani ^a^V1.0173^ea^ pa~ncindriyaani adhimattaani ^a^P2.0150^ea^ paatubhavanti -- saddhindriya.m, viiriyindriya.m, satindriya.m, samaadhindriya.m, pa~n~nindriya.m. so imesa.m pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m adhimattattaa khippa.m aanantariya.m paapu.naati aasavaana.m khayaaya. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkhaa pa.tipadaa khippaabhi~n~naa.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, sukhaa pa.tipadaa dandhaabhi~n~naa? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco pakatiyaapi na tibbaraagajaatiko hoti, naabhikkha.na.m raagaja.m dukkha.m domanassa.m ^a^M1.0468^ea^ pa.tisa.mvedeti. pakatiyaapi na tibbadosajaatiko hoti, naabhikkha.na.m dosaja.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti. pakatiyaapi na tibbamohajaatiko hoti, naabhikkha.na.m mohaja.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti. tassimaani pa~ncindriyaani muduuni paatubhavanti -- saddhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m. so imesa.m pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m muduttaa dandha.m aanantariya.m paapu.naati aasavaana.m khayaaya. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sukhaa pa.tipadaa dandhaabhi~n~naa.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, sukhaa pa.tipadaa khippaabhi~n~naa? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco pakatiyaapi na tibbaraagajaatiko hoti, naabhikkha.na.m raagaja.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti. pakatiyaapi na tibbadosajaatiko hoti, naabhikkha.na.m dosaja.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti. pakatiyaapi na tibbamohajaatiko hoti, naabhikkha.na.m mohaja.m dukkha.m domanassa.m pa.tisa.mvedeti. tassimaani pa~ncindriyaani adhimattaani paatubhavanti -- saddhindriya.m, viiriyindriya.m, satindriya.m, samaadhindriya.m, pa~n~nindriya.m ^a^T2.0202^ea^. so imesa.m pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m adhimattattaa khippa.m aanantariya.m paapu.naati aasavaana.m khayaaya. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sukhaa pa.tipadaa khippaabhi~n~naa. imaa kho, bhikkhave, catasso pa.tipadaa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, sukhaa pa.tipadaa dandhaabhi~n~naa? idha bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati; vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati; piitiyaa ca viraagaa upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajaano sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti -- `upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii'ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati; sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so imaani pa~nca sekhabalaani upanissaaya viharati -- saddhaabala.m...pe0... pa~n~naabala.m. tassimaani pa~ncindriyaani muduuni paatubhavanti -- saddhindriya.m...pe0... pa~n~nindriya.m. so imesa.m pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m muduttaa dandha.m aanantariya.m paapu.naati aasavaana.m khayaaya. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sukhaa pa.tipadaa dandhaabhi~n~naa.

[03] ``katamaa ^a^V1.0175^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, sukhaa pa.tipadaa khippaabhi~n~naa? {kathaa0 815 aadayo} idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m...pe0... ^a^T2.0204^ea^ tatiya.m jhaana.m...pe0... ^a^P2.0152^ea^ catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. so imaani pa~nca sekhabalaani upanissaaya viharati -- saddhaabala.m, hiribala.m, ottappabala.m, viiriyabala.m, pa~n~naabala.m. tassimaani pa~ncindriyaani adhimattaani paatubhavanti -- saddhindriya.m, viiriyindriya.m, satindriya.m, samaadhindriya.m, pa~n~nindriya.m. so imesa.m pa~ncanna.m indriyaana.m adhimattattaa khippa.m aanantariya.m paapu.naati aasavaana.m khayaaya. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, sukhaa pa.tipadaa khippaabhi~n~naa. imaa kho, bhikkhave, catasso pa.tipadaa''ti. tatiya.m.

[03] 164^b^.^eb^ ``catasso ^a^M1.0470^ea^ imaa, bhikkhave, pa.tipadaa. katamaa catasso? akkhamaa pa.tipadaa, khamaa pa.tipadaa, damaa pa.tipadaa, samaa pa.tipadaa. katamaa ca, bhikkhave, akkhamaa pa.tipadaa? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco {ekacco puggalo (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} akkosanta.m paccakkosati, rosanta.m pa.tirosati, bha.n.danta.m pa.tibha.n.dati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, akkhamaa pa.tipadaa.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, khamaa pa.tipadaa? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco akkosanta.m na paccakkosati, rosanta.m na pa.tirosati, bha.n.danta.m na pa.tibha.n.dati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, khamaa pa.tipadaa.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, damaa pa.tipadaa? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa na nimittaggaahii hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii; yatvaadhikara.namena.m cakkhundriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa sa.mvaraaya ^a^T2.0205^ea^ pa.tipajjati; rakkhati cakkhundriya.m; cakkhundriye sa.mvara.m aapajjati. sotena sadda.m sutvaa... ghaanena ^a^V1.0176^ea^ gandha.m ghaayitvaa... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya na nimittaggaahii hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii; yatvaadhikara.namena.m manindriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati ^a^P2.0153^ea^; rakkhati manindriya.m; manindriye sa.mvara.m aapajjati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, damaa pa.tipadaa.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, samaa pa.tipadaa? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uppanna.m kaamavitakka.m naadhivaaseti pajahati vinodeti sameti byantiikaroti anabhaava.m gameti; uppanna.m byaapaadavitakka.m...pe0... uppanna.m vihi.msaavitakka.m... uppannuppanne paapake akusale dhamme naadhivaaseti pajahati vinodeti sameti byantiikaroti anabhaava.m gameti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, samaa pa.tipadaa. imaa kho, bhikkhave, catasso pa.tipadaa''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] ``ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo, yena midhekacce sattaa tamhaa kaayaa cutaa aagaamino ^a^V1.0185^ea^ honti aagantaaro itthatta.m? ko pana, bhante, hetu ko paccayo, yena midhekacce ^a^P2.0160^ea^ sattaa tamhaa kaayaa cutaa anaagaamino honti anaagantaaro itthatta''nti? ``idha, saariputta, ekaccassa puggalassa orambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani appahiinaani honti, so di.t.theva dhamme nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati. so tadassaadeti, ta.m nikaameti, tena ca vitti.m aapajjati; tattha .thito tadadhimutto tabbahulavihaarii aparihiino kaala.m kurumaano nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanuupagaana.m devaana.m sahabyata.m upapajjati. so tato cuto aagaamii hoti aagantaa itthatta.m.
