[03] ``saddhaa, bhikkhave, bhikkhunii eva.m sammaa aayaacamaanaa aayaaceyya -- `taadisaa homi yaadisaa khemaa ca bhikkhunii uppalava.n.naa caa'ti. esaa, bhikkhave, tulaa eta.m pamaa.na.m mama saavikaana.m bhikkhuniina.m, yadida.m khemaa ca bhikkhunii uppalava.n.naa ca.

[03] ``saddho, bhikkhave, upaasako eva.m sammaa aayaacamaano aayaaceyya -- `taadiso homi yaadiso citto ca gahapati hatthako ca aa.lavako'ti. esaa, bhikkhave, tulaa eta.m pamaa.na.m mama saavakaana.m upaasakaana.m, yadida.m citto ca gahapati hatthako ca aa.lavako.

[03] ``saddhaa, bhikkhave, upaasikaa eva.m sammaa aayaacamaanaa aayaaceyya -- `taadisaa homi yaadisaa khujjuttaraa ca upaasikaa ve.luka.n.dakiyaa ca nandamaataa'ti. esaa, bhikkhave, tulaa eta.m pamaa.na.m mama saavikaana.m upaasikaana.m, yadida.m khujjuttaraa ca upaasikaa ve.luka.n.dakiyaa ca nandamaataa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 177^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^V1.0191^ea^ kho aayasmaa raahulo yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m raahula.m bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``yaa ca, raahula ^a^T2.0223^ea^, ajjhattikaa pathaviidhaatu yaa ca baahiraa pathaviidhaatu, pathaviidhaaturevesaa. `ta.m neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti, evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa pathaviidhaatuyaa nibbindati, pathaviidhaatuyaa citta.m viraajeti.

[03] ``yaa ca, raahula, ajjhattikaa aapodhaatu yaa ca baahiraa aapodhaatu ^a^P2.0165^ea^, aapodhaaturevesaa. `ta.m neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti, evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa aapodhaatuyaa nibbindati, aapodhaatuyaa citta.m viraajeti.

[03] ``yaa ^a^M1.0484^ea^ ca, raahula, ajjhattikaa tejodhaatu yaa ca baahiraa tejodhaatu, tejodhaaturevesaa. `ta.m neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti, evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa tejodhaatuyaa nibbindati, tejodhaatuyaa citta.m viraajeti.

[03] ``yaa ca, raahula, ajjhattikaa vaayodhaatu yaa ca baahiraa vaayodhaatu, vaayodhaaturevesaa. `ta.m neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti, evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya da.t.thabba.m. evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya disvaa vaayodhaatuyaa nibbindati, vaayodhaatuyaa citta.m viraajeti.

[03] ``yato kho, raahula, bhikkhu imaasu catuusu dhaatuusu nevattaana.m na attaniya.m samanupassati, aya.m vuccati, raahula, bhikkhu acchecchi ta.nha.m, vivattayi sa.myojana.m, sammaa maanaabhisamayaa antamakaasi dukkhassaa''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 178^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome ^a^V1.0192^ea^, bhikkhave, puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu a~n~natara.m santa.m cetovimutti.m upasampajja viharati. so sakkaayanirodha.m manasi karoti. tassa sakkaayanirodha.m manasi karoto sakkaayanirodhe citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati naadhimuccati. tassa kho eva.m {tassa ko eta.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0), eva.m kho tassa (?) ``eva.m hi tassaa bhikkhave jambaaliyaa''ti paa.tho viya}, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno na sakkaayanirodho ^a^T2.0224^ea^ paa.tika"nkho. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso lepagatena {lasagatena (sii0 pii0)} hatthena saakha.m ga.nheyya, tassa so hattho sajjeyyapi ga.nheyyapi {gayheyyapi (?)} bajjheyyapi {khajjeyyapi (sii0)}; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu a~n~natara.m santa.m cetovimutti.m upasampajja viharati. so sakkaayanirodha.m manasi karoti. tassa sakkaayanirodha.m manasi karoto sakkaayanirodhe citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati naadhimuccati. tassa kho eva.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno na sakkaayanirodho paa.tika"nkho.

[03] ``idha ^a^M1.0485^ea^ pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu a~n~natara.m santa.m cetovimutti.m upasampajja viharati. so sakkaayanirodha.m manasi karoti ^a^P2.0166^ea^. tassa sakkaayanirodha.m manasi karoto sakkaayanirodhe citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati adhimuccati. tassa kho eva.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno sakkaayanirodho paa.tika"nkho. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso suddhena hatthena saakha.m ga.nheyya, tassa so hattho neva sajjeyya na ga.nheyya na bajjheyya; evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu a~n~natara.m santa.m cetovimutti.m upasampajja viharati. so sakkaayanirodha.m manasi karoti. tassa sakkaayanirodha.m manasi karoto sakkaayanirodhe citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati adhimuccati. tassa kho eva.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno sakkaayanirodho paa.tika"nkho.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu a~n~natara.m santa.m cetovimutti.m upasampajja viharati. so avijjaappabheda.m manasi karoti. tassa avijjaappabheda.m manasi karoto avijjaappabhede citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati naadhimuccati. tassa kho eva.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno na avijjaappabhedo paa.tika"nkho. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, jambaalii ^a^T2.0225^ea^ anekavassaga.nikaa. tassaa puriso yaani ceva aayamukhaani taani pidaheyya, yaani ca apaayamukhaani taani vivareyya, devo ca na sammaa dhaara.m anuppaveccheyya. eva~nhi tassaa, bhikkhave, jambaaliyaa na aa.lippabhedo ^a^V1.0193^ea^ paa.tika"nkho. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu a~n~natara.m santa.m cetovimutti.m upasampajja viharati. so avijjaappabheda.m manasi karoti. tassa avijjaappabheda.m manasi karoto avijjaappabhede citta.m na pakkhandati nappasiidati na santi.t.thati naadhimuccati. tassa kho eva.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno na avijjaappabhedo paa.tika"nkho.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu a~n~natara.m santa.m cetovimutti.m upasampajja viharati. so avijjaappabheda.m manasi karoti. tassa avijjaappabheda.m manasi karoto avijjaappabhede citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati adhimuccati. tassa kho eva.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno avijjaappabhedo paa.tika"nkho. seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, jambaalii anekavassaga.nikaa. tassaa puriso yaani ceva aayamukhaani taani vivareyya, yaani ca apaayamukhaani taani pidaheyya, devo ca sammaa dhaara.m anuppaveccheyya. eva~nhi tassaa, bhikkhave, jambaaliyaa aa.lippabhedo paa.tika"nkho. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu a~n~natara.m ^a^M1.0486^ea^ santa.m cetovimutti.m upasampajja viharati. so avijjaappabheda.m manasi karoti. tassa avijjaappabheda.m ^a^P2.0167^ea^ manasi karoto avijjaappabhede citta.m pakkhandati pasiidati santi.t.thati adhimuccati. tassa kho eva.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno avijjaappabhedo paa.tika"nkho ^a^T2.0226^ea^. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi''nti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 179^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa aanando yenaayasmaa saariputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa aayasmataa saariputtena saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando aayasmanta.m saariputta.m etadavoca -- ``ko nu kho, aavuso saariputta, hetu ko paccayo, yena midhekacce sattaa di.t.theva dhamme na parinibbaayantii''ti?

[03] ``idhaavuso aananda, sattaa imaa haanabhaagiyaa sa~n~naati yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti, imaa .thitibhaagiyaa sa~n~naati yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti, imaa visesabhaagiyaa sa~n~naati yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti, ^a^V1.0194^ea^ imaa nibbedhabhaagiyaa sa~n~naati yathaabhuuta.m nappajaananti. aya.m kho, aavuso aananda, hetu aya.m paccayo, yena midhekacce sattaa di.t.theva dhamme na parinibbaayantii''ti.

[03] ``ko panaavuso saariputta, hetu ko paccayo, yena midhekacce sattaa di.t.theva dhamme parinibbaayantii''ti? ``idhaavuso aananda, sattaa imaa haanabhaagiyaa sa~n~naati yathaabhuuta.m pajaananti, imaa .thitibhaagiyaa sa~n~naati yathaabhuuta.m pajaananti, imaa visesabhaagiyaa sa~n~naati yathaabhuuta.m pajaananti, imaa nibbedhabhaagiyaa sa~n~naati yathaabhuuta.m pajaananti. aya.m kho, aavuso aananda, hetu aya.m paccayo, yena midhekacce sattaa di.t.theva dhamme parinibbaayantii''ti. navama.m.

[03] 180^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^T2.0227^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa bhoganagare viharati aanandacetiye {aanande cetiye (dii0 ni0 2.186) mahaava0 303 pana a~n~nathaa aagata.m}. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu ^a^M1.0487^ea^ bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, mahaapadese desessaami, ta.m su.naatha ^a^P2.0168^ea^, saadhuka.m manasi karotha; bhaasissaamii''ti. ``eva.m, bhante''ti kho te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``katame, bhikkhave, cattaaro mahaapadesaa? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m vadeyya -- `sammukhaa meta.m, aavuso, bhagavato suta.m sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- aya.m dhammo, aya.m vinayo, ida.m satthusaasana'nti. tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno bhaasita.m neva abhinanditabba.m nappa.tikkositabba.m. anabhinanditvaa appa.tikkositvaa taani padabya~njanaani saadhuka.m uggahetvaa sutte otaaretabbaani {osaaretabbaani}, vinaye sandassetabbaani. taani ce sutte otaariyamaanaani {osaariyamaanaani} vinaye sandassiyamaanaani na ceva sutte otaranti {osaranti (dii0 ni0 2.188)} na vinaye sandissanti, ni.t.thamettha gantabba.m -- `addhaa, ida.m na ceva tassa bhagavato vacana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassa; imassa ca bhikkhuno duggahita'nti. iti heta.m {iti hida.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 ka0)}, bhikkhave, cha.d.deyyaatha.

[03] {ettako paa.tho diighanikaaye na dissati, peyyaalamukhena dassito bhaveyya} ``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m vadeyya -- `sammukhaa meta.m, aavuso, bhagavato suta.m sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- aya.m dhammo, aya.m vinayo, ida.m satthusaasana'nti. tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ^a^V1.0195^ea^ bhaasita.m neva abhinanditabba.m nappa.tikkositabba.m. anabhinanditvaa appa.tikkositvaa taani padabya~njanaani saadhuka.m uggahetvaa sutte otaaretabbaani, vinaye sandassetabbaani {ettako paa.tho diighanikaaye na dissati, peyyaalamukhena dassito bhaveyya}. taani ce sutte otaariyamaanaani vinaye ^a^T2.0228^ea^ sandassiyamaanaani sutte ceva otaranti vinaye ca sandissanti, ni.t.thamettha gantabba.m -- `addhaa, ida.m tassa bhagavato vacana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassa; imassa ca bhikkhuno suggahita'nti. ida.m, bhikkhave, pa.thama.m mahaapadesa.m dhaareyyaatha.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m vadeyya -- `asukasmi.m naama aavaase sa"ngho viharati sathero sapaamokkho. tassa me sa"nghassa sammukhaa suta.m sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- aya.m dhammo, aya.m vinayo, ida.m satthusaasana'nti. tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno bhaasita.m neva abhinanditabba.m nappa.tikkositabba.m. anabhinanditvaa ^a^M1.0488^ea^ appa.tikkositvaa taani padabya~njanaani saadhuka.m uggahetvaa sutte otaaretabbaani, vinaye sandassetabbaani. taani ce sutte otaariyamaanaani vinaye sandassiyamaanaani na ceva sutte otaranti na vinaye sandissanti, ni.t.thamettha gantabba.m -- `addhaa, ida.m na ceva tassa bhagavato vacana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassa ^a^P2.0169^ea^; tassa ca sa"nghassa duggahita'nti. iti heta.m, bhikkhave, cha.d.deyyaatha.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m vadeyya -- `asukasmi.m naama aavaase sa"ngho viharati sathero sapaamokkho. tassa me sa"nghassa sammukhaa suta.m sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- aya.m dhammo, aya.m vinayo, ida.m satthusaasana'nti. tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno bhaasita.m neva abhinanditabba.m nappa.tikkositabba.m. anabhinanditvaa appa.tikkositvaa taani padabya~njanaani saadhuka.m uggahetvaa sutte otaaretabbaani, vinaye sandassetabbaani. taani ce sutte otaariyamaanaani, vinaye sandassiyamaanaani sutte ceva otaranti vinaye ca ^a^T2.0229^ea^ sandissanti, ni.t.thamettha gantabba.m -- `addhaa, ida.m tassa bhagavato vacana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassa; tassa ca sa"nghassa suggahita'nti. ida.m, bhikkhave, dutiya.m mahaapadesa.m dhaareyyaatha.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m vadeyya -- `asukasmi.m naama aavaase sambahulaa theraa bhikkhuu viharanti bahussutaa aagataagamaa dhammadharaa vinayadharaa maatikaadharaa. tesa.m me theraana.m sammukhaa suta.m sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- aya.m dhammo, aya.m vinayo, ida.m satthusaasana'nti. tassa, bhikkhave ^a^V1.0196^ea^, bhikkhuno bhaasita.m neva abhinanditabba.m nappa.tikkositabba.m. anabhinanditvaa appa.tikkositvaa taani padabya~njanaani saadhuka.m uggahetvaa sutte otaaretabbaani, vinaye sandassetabbaani. taani ce sutte otaariyamaanaani vinaye sandassiyamaanaani na ceva sutte otaranti na vinaye sandissanti, ni.t.thamettha gantabba.m -- `addhaa, ida.m na ceva tassa bhagavato vacana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassa; tesa~nca theraana.m duggahita'nti. iti heta.m, bhikkhave, cha.d.deyyaatha.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m vadeyya -- `asukasmi.m naama aavaase sambahulaa theraa bhikkhuu viharanti bahussutaa aagataagamaa dhammadharaa vinayadharaa maatikaadharaa. tesa.m me theraana.m sammukhaa suta.m sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- aya.m dhammo, aya.m vinayo, ida.m satthusaasana'nti. tassa, bhikkhave ^a^M1.0489^ea^, bhikkhuno bhaasita.m neva abhinanditabba.m nappa.tikkositabba.m. anabhinanditvaa appa.tikkositvaa taani padabya~njanaani saadhuka.m uggahetvaa sutte otaaretabbaani, vinaye sandassetabbaani. taani ce sutte otaariyamaanaani vinaye ^a^T2.0230^ea^ sandassiyamaanaani sutte ceva otaranti vinaye ca sandissanti, ni.t.thamettha gantabba.m -- `addhaa, ida.m tassa bhagavato vacana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassa; tesa~nca theraana.m suggahita'nti. ida.m, bhikkhave, tatiya.m mahaapadesa.m dhaareyyaatha.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m vadeyya -- `asukasmi.m naama aavaase eko thero bhikkhu viharati bahussuto ^a^P2.0170^ea^ aagataagamo dhammadharo vinayadharo maatikaadharo. tassa me therassa sammukhaa suta.m sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- aya.m dhammo, aya.m vinayo, ida.m satthusaasana'nti. tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno bhaasita.m neva abhinanditabba.m nappa.tikkositabba.m. anabhinanditvaa appa.tikkositvaa taani padabya~njanaani saadhuka.m uggahetvaa sutte otaaretabbaani, vinaye sandassetabbaani. taani ce sutte otaariyamaanaani vinaye sandassiyamaanaani na ceva sutte otaranti na vinaye sandissanti, ni.t.thamettha gantabba.m -- `addhaa, ida.m na ceva tassa bhagavato vacana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassa; tassa ca therassa duggahita'nti. iti heta.m, bhikkhave, cha.d.deyyaatha.

[03] ``idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu eva.m vadeyya -- `asukasmi.m naama aavaase eko thero bhikkhu ^a^V1.0197^ea^ viharati bahussuto aagataagamo dhammadharo vinayadharo maatikaadharo. tassa me therassa sammukhaa suta.m sammukhaa pa.tiggahita.m -- aya.m dhammo, aya.m vinayo, ida.m satthusaasana'nti. tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno bhaasita.m neva abhinanditabba.m nappa.tikkositabba.m. anabhinanditvaa appa.tikkositvaa taani padabya~njanaani saadhuka.m uggahetvaa sutte otaaretabbaani, vinaye sandassetabbaani. taani ce sutte otaariyamaanaani vinaye sandassiyamaanaani sutte ceva otaranti vinaye ^a^T2.0231^ea^ ca sandissanti, ni.t.thamettha gantabba.m -- `addhaa, ida.m tassa bhagavato vacana.m arahato sammaasambuddhassa; tassa ca therassa suggahita'nti. ida.m, bhikkhave, catuttha.m mahaapadesa.m dhaareyyaatha. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro mahaapadesaa''ti. dasama.m.

[03] 181^b^.^eb^ ``catuuhi ^a^V1.0198^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato yodhaajiivo raajaaraho hoti raajabhoggo, ra~n~no a"nganteva sa"nkha.m gacchati. katamehi catuuhi? idha, bhikkhave, yodhaajiivo .thaanakusalo ca hoti, duurepaatii ca, akkha.navedhii ca, mahato ca kaayassa padaaletaa. imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuuhi a"ngehi samannaagato yodhaajiivo raajaaraho hoti raajabhoggo, ra~n~no a"nganteva sa"nkha.m gacchati. evameva.m ^a^P2.0171^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, catuuhi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa. katamehi catuuhi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu .thaanakusalo ca hoti, duurepaatii ca, akkha.navedhii ca, mahato ca kaayassa padaaletaa.
[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu .thaanakusalo hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti...pe0... samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu .thaanakusalo hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu duurepaatii hoti? idha, bhikkhave ^a^T2.0232^ea^, bhikkhu ya.m ki~nci ruupa.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa ya.m duure santike vaa, sabba.m ruupa.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passati. yaa kaaci vedanaa...pe0... yaa kaaci sa~n~naa... ye keci sa"nkhaaraa... ya.m ki~nci vi~n~naa.na.m atiitaanaagatapaccuppanna.m ajjhatta.m vaa bahiddhaa vaa o.laarika.m vaa sukhuma.m vaa hiina.m vaa pa.niita.m vaa ya.m duure santike vaa ^a^V1.0199^ea^, sabba.m vi~n~naa.na.m `neta.m mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attaa'ti evameta.m yathaabhuuta.m sammappa~n~naaya passati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu duurepaatii hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^M1.0491^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkha.navedhii hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkha.navedhii hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mahato kaayassa padaaletaa hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mahanta.m avijjaakkhandha.m padaaletaa. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mahato kaayassa padaaletaa hoti. imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuuhi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa''ti. pa.thama.m.
[03] 182^b^.^eb^ {kathaa0 624} ``catunna.m ^a^P2.0172^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammaana.m natthi koci paa.tibhogo -- sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa devo vaa maaro vaa brahmaa vaa koci vaa lokasmi.m.

[03] ``katamesa.m catunna.m? `jaraadhamma.m maa jiirii'ti natthi koci paa.tibhogo -- sama.no vaa ^a^T2.0233^ea^ braahma.no vaa devo vaa maaro vaa brahmaa vaa koci vaa lokasmi.m; `byaadhidhamma.m maa byaadhiyii'ti natthi koci paa.tibhogo -- sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa devo vaa maaro vaa brahmaa vaa koci vaa lokasmi.m; `mara.nadhamma.m maa miiyii'ti natthi koci paa.tibhogo -- sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa devo vaa maaro vaa brahmaa vaa koci vaa lokasmi.m; `yaani kho pana taani pubbe attanaa kataani paapakaani kammaani sa.mkilesikaani ponobhavikaani sadaraani dukkhavipaakaani aayati.m jaatijaraamara.nikaani, tesa.m vipaako maa nibbattii'ti natthi koci paa.tibhogo -- sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa devo vaa maaro vaa brahmaa vaa koci vaa lokasmi.m.
[03] ``imesa.m ^a^V1.0200^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, catunna.m dhammaana.m natthi koci paa.tibhogo -- sama.no vaa braahma.no vaa devo vaa maaro vaa brahmaa vaa koci vaa lokasmi''nti. dutiya.m.

[03] 183^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. atha kho vassakaaro braahma.no magadhamahaamatto yena bhagavaa ^a^M1.0492^ea^ tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho vassakaaro braahma.no magadhamahaamatto bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``aha~nhi, bho gotama, eva.mvaadii eva.mdi.t.thi {eva.mdi.t.thii (sabbattha)} -- `yo koci di.t.tha.m bhaasati -- eva.m me di.t.thanti, natthi tato doso; yo koci suta.m bhaasati -- eva.m me sutanti, natthi tato doso; yo koci muta.m bhaasati -- eva.m me mutanti, natthi tato ^a^T2.0234^ea^ doso; yo koci vi~n~naata.m bhaasati -- eva.m me vi~n~naatanti, natthi tato doso'''ti.

[03] ``naaha.m, braahma.na, sabba.m di.t.tha.m bhaasitabbanti vadaami; na panaaha.m, braahma.na, sabba.m di.t.tha.m na bhaasitabbanti vadaami; naaha.m, braahma.na, sabba.m suta.m bhaasitabbanti vadaami; na panaaha.m, braahma.na, sabba.m suta.m na bhaasitabbanti ^a^P2.0173^ea^ vadaami; naaha.m, braahma.na, sabba.m muta.m bhaasitabbanti vadaami; na panaaha.m, braahma.na, sabba.m muta.m na bhaasitabbanti vadaami; naaha.m, braahma.na, sabba.m vi~n~naata.m bhaasitabbanti vadaami; na panaaha.m, braahma.na, sabba.m vi~n~naata.m na bhaasitabbanti vadaami.

[03] ``ya~nhi, braahma.na, di.t.tha.m bhaasato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, evaruupa.m di.t.tha.m na bhaasitabbanti vadaami. ya~nca khvassa, braahma.na, di.t.tha.m abhaasato kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, evaruupa.m di.t.tha.m bhaasitabbanti vadaami.

[03] ``ya~nhi, braahma.na, suta.m bhaasato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti ^a^V1.0201^ea^, evaruupa.m suta.m na bhaasitabbanti vadaami. ya~nca khvassa, braahma.na, suta.m abhaasato kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, evaruupa.m suta.m bhaasitabbanti vadaami.

[03] ``ya~nhi, braahma.na, muta.m bhaasato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, evaruupa.m muta.m na bhaasitabbanti vadaami. ya~nca khvassa, braahma.na, muta.m abhaasato kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, evaruupa.m muta.m bhaasitabbanti vadaami ^a^T2.0235^ea^.

[03] ``ya~nhi ^a^M1.0493^ea^, braahma.na, vi~n~naata.m bhaasato akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, evaruupa.m vi~n~naata.m na bhaasitabbanti vadaami. ya~nca khvassa, braahma.na, vi~n~naata.m abhaasato kusalaa dhammaa parihaayanti, akusalaa dhammaa abhiva.d.dhanti, evaruupa.m vi~n~naata.m bhaasitabbanti vadaamii''ti.
[03] atha kho vassakaaro braahma.no magadhamahaamatto bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaamiiti. tatiya.m.

[03] 184^b^.^eb^ atha kho jaa.nusso.ni braahma.no yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho jaa.nusso.ni braahma.no bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``aha~nhi, bho gotama, eva.mvaadii eva.mdi.t.thi -- `natthi yo mara.nadhammo samaano na bhaayati, na santaasa.m aapajjati mara.nassaa'''ti. ``atthi, braahma.na, mara.nadhammo samaano bhaayati, santaasa.m aapajjati mara.nassa; atthi pana, braahma.na, mara.nadhammo samaano na bhaayati, na santaasa.m aapajjati mara.nassa.

[03] ``katamo ^a^V1.0202^ea^ ca, braahma.na, mara.nadhammo samaano bhaayati, santaasa.m aapajjati mara.nassa? idha, braahma.na, ekacco kaamesu aviitaraago hoti avigatacchando ^a^P2.0174^ea^ avigatapemo avigatapipaaso avigatapari.laaho avigatata.nho. tamena.m a~n~nataro gaa.lho rogaata"nko phusati. tassa a~n~natarena gaa.lhena rogaata"nkena phu.t.thassa ^a^T2.0236^ea^ eva.m hoti -- `piyaa vata ma.m kaamaa jahissanti, piye caaha.m kaame jahissaamii'ti. so socati kilamati paridevati, urattaa.li.m kandati, sammoha.m aapajjati. aya.m kho, braahma.na, mara.nadhammo samaano bhaayati, santaasa.m aapajjati mara.nassa.

[03] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, idhekacco kaaye aviitaraago hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipaaso avigatapari.laaho avigatata.nho. tamena.m a~n~nataro gaa.lho rogaata"nko phusati. tassa a~n~natarena gaa.lhena rogaata"nkena phu.t.thassa eva.m hoti -- `piyo vata ^a^M1.0494^ea^ ma.m kaayo jahissati, piya~ncaaha.m kaaya.m jahissaamii'ti. so socati kilamati paridevati, urattaa.li.m kandati, sammoha.m aapajjati. ayampi kho, braahma.na, mara.nadhammo samaano bhaayati, santaasa.m aapajjati mara.nassa.

[03] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, idhekacco akatakalyaa.no hoti akatakusalo akatabhiiruttaa.no katapaapo kataluddo katakibbiso. tamena.m a~n~nataro gaa.lho rogaata"nko phusati. tassa a~n~natarena gaa.lhena rogaata"nkena phu.t.thassa eva.m hoti -- `akata.m vata me kalyaa.na.m, akata.m kusala.m, akata.m bhiiruttaa.na.m; kata.m paapa.m, kata.m ludda.m, kata.m kibbisa.m. yaavataa, bho, akatakalyaa.naana.m akatakusalaana.m akatabhiiruttaa.naana.m katapaapaana.m kataluddaana.m katakibbisaana.m gati ta.m gati.m pecca gacchaamii'ti. so socati kilamati paridevati, urattaa.li.m kandati, sammoha.m aapajjati. ayampi kho, braahma.na, mara.nadhammo samaano bhaayati, santaasa.m aapajjati mara.nassa.

[03] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, idhekacco ka"nkhii hoti vicikicchii ani.t.tha"ngato saddhamme. tamena.m a~n~nataro gaa.lho rogaata"nko ^a^T2.0237^ea^ phusati. tassa a~n~natarena gaa.lhena rogaata"nkena phu.t.thassa eva.m hoti -- `ka"nkhii vatamhi vicikicchii ani.t.tha"ngato saddhamme'ti. so socati kilamati paridevati, urattaa.li.m kandati, sammoha.m aapajjati. ayampi kho, braahma.na, mara.nadhammo samaano ^a^V1.0203^ea^ bhaayati, santaasa.m aapajjati mara.nassa. ime kho, braahma.na, cattaaro mara.nadhammaa samaanaa bhaayanti, santaasa.m aapajjanti mara.nassa.

[03] ``katamo ^a^P2.0175^ea^ ca, braahma.na, mara.nadhammo samaano na bhaayati, na santaasa.m aapajjati mara.nassa? idha, braahma.na, ekacco kaamesu viitaraago hoti vigatacchando vigatapemo vigatapipaaso vigatapari.laaho vigatata.nho. tamena.m a~n~nataro gaa.lho rogaata"nko phusati. tassa a~n~natarena gaa.lhena rogaata"nkena phu.t.thassa na eva.m hoti -- `piyaa vata ma.m kaamaa jahissanti, piye caaha.m kaame jahissaamii'ti. so na socati na kilamati na paridevati, na urattaa.li.m kandati, na sammoha.m aapajjati. aya.m kho, braahma.na, mara.nadhammo samaano na bhaayati, na santaasa.m aapajjati mara.nassa.

[03] ``puna ^a^M1.0495^ea^ capara.m, braahma.na, idhekacco kaaye viitaraago hoti vigatacchando vigatapemo vigatapipaaso vigatapari.laaho vigatata.nho. tamena.m a~n~nataro gaa.lho rogaata"nko phusati. tassa a~n~natarena gaa.lhena rogaata"nkena phu.t.thassa na eva.m hoti -- `piyo vata ma.m kaayo jahissati, piya~ncaaha.m kaaya.m jahissaamii'ti. so na socati na kilamati na paridevati, na urattaa.li.m kandati, na sammoha.m aapajjati. ayampi kho, braahma.na, mara.nadhammo samaano na bhaayati, na santaasa.m aapajjati mara.nassa.

[03] ``puna ^a^T2.0238^ea^ capara.m, braahma.na, idhekacco akatapaapo hoti akataluddo akatakibbiso katakalyaa.no katakusalo katabhiiruttaa.no. tamena.m a~n~nataro gaa.lho rogaata"nko phusati. tassa a~n~natarena gaa.lhena rogaata"nkena phu.t.thassa eva.m hoti -- `akata.m vata me paapa.m, akata.m ludda.m, akata.m kibbisa.m; kata.m kalyaa.na.m, kata.m kusala.m, kata.m bhiiruttaa.na.m. yaavataa, bho, akatapaapaana.m akataluddaana.m akatakibbisaana.m katakalyaa.naana.m katakusalaana.m katabhiiruttaa.naana.m gati ta.m gati.m pecca gacchaamii'ti. so na socati na kilamati na paridevati, na urattaa.li.m kandati, na sammoha.m aapajjati. ayampi kho, braahma.na, mara.nadhammo samaano na bhaayati, na santaasa.m aapajjati mara.nassa.

[03] ``puna capara.m, braahma.na, idhekacco aka"nkhii hoti avicikicchii ni.t.tha"ngato saddhamme. tamena.m ^a^V1.0204^ea^ a~n~nataro gaa.lho rogaata"nko phusati. tassa a~n~natarena gaa.lhena rogaata"nkena phu.t.thassa eva.m hoti -- `aka"nkhii vatamhi avicikicchii ni.t.tha"ngato saddhamme'ti. so na socati na kilamati na paridevati, na urattaa.li.m kandati, na sammoha.m aapajjati. ayampi ^a^P2.0176^ea^ kho, braahma.na, mara.nadhammo samaano na bhaayati, na santaasa.m aapajjati mara.nassa. ime kho, braahma.na, cattaaro mara.nadhammaa samaanaa na bhaayanti, na santaasa.m aapajjanti mara.nassaa''ti.
[03] ``abhikkanta.m, bho gotama, abhikkanta.m, bho gotama...pe0... upaasaka.m ma.m bhava.m gotamo dhaaretu ajjatagge paa.nupeta.m sara.na.m gata''nti. catuttha.m.

[03] 185^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^M1.0496^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati gijjhakuu.te pabbate. tena kho pana samayena sambahulaa abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa paribbaajakaa sippinikaatiire ^a^T2.0239^ea^ paribbaajakaaraame pa.tivasanti, seyyathida.m annabhaaro varadharo sakuludaayii ca paribbaajako a~n~ne ca abhi~n~naataa abhi~n~naataa paribbaajakaa. atha kho bhagavaa saayanhasamaya.m pa.tisallaanaa vu.t.thito yena sippinikaatiire paribbaajakaaraamo tenupasa"nkami.

[03] tena kho pana samayena tesa.m a~n~natitthiyaana.m paribbaajakaana.m sannisinnaana.m sannipatitaana.m ayamantaraa kathaa udapaadi -- ``itipi braahma.nasaccaani, itipi braahma.nasaccaanii''ti. atha kho bhagavaa yena te paribbaajakaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa pa~n~natte aasane nisiidi. nisajja kho bhagavaa te paribbaajake etadavoca --

[03] ``kaaya nuttha, paribbaajakaa, etarahi kathaaya sannisinnaa, kaa ca pana vo antaraakathaa vippakataa''ti? ``idha, bho gotama, amhaaka.m sannisinnaana.m sannipatitaana.m ayamantaraakathaa udapaadi -- `itipi braahma.nasaccaani, itipi braahma.nasaccaanii'''ti.

[03] ``cattaarimaani, paribbaajakaa, braahma.nasaccaani mayaa saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa paveditaani. katamaani cattaari? idha, paribbaajakaa, braahma.no evamaaha -- `sabbe paa.naa avajjhaa'ti ^a^V1.0205^ea^. iti vada.m braahma.no sacca.m aaha, no musaa. so tena na sama.noti ma~n~nati, na braahma.noti ma~n~nati, na seyyohamasmiiti ma~n~nati, na sadisohamasmiiti ma~n~nati, na hiinohamasmiiti ma~n~nati. api ca yadeva tattha sacca.m tadabhi~n~naaya paa.naana.myeva anuddayaaya {tadabhi~n~naaya anudayaaya (ka0)} anukampaaya pa.tipanno hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, paribbaajakaa, braahma.no evamaaha ^a^T2.0240^ea^ -- `sabbe ^a^P2.0177^ea^ kaamaa aniccaa dukkhaa vipari.naamadhammaa'ti. iti vada.m braahma.no saccamaaha, no musaa. so tena na sama.noti ma~n~nati, na braahma.noti ma~n~nati, na seyyohamasmiiti ma~n~nati, na sadisohamasmiiti ma~n~nati, na hiinohamasmiiti ma~n~nati. api ca yadeva tattha sacca.m tadabhi~n~naaya kaamaana.myeva nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hoti.
[03] ``puna ^a^M1.0497^ea^ capara.m, paribbaajakaa, braahma.no evamaaha -- `sabbe bhavaa aniccaa...pe0... bhavaana.myeva nibbidaaya viraagaaya nirodhaaya pa.tipanno hoti.

[03] ``puna capara.m, paribbaajakaa, braahma.no evamaaha -- `naaha.m kvacani {kvacana (sii0 syaa0)} kassaci ki~ncanatasmi.m na ca mama kvacani katthaci ki~ncanatatthii'ti. iti vada.m braahma.no sacca.m aaha, no musaa. so tena na sama.noti ma~n~nati, na braahma.noti ma~n~nati, na seyyohamasmiiti ma~n~nati, na sadisohamasmiiti ma~n~nati, na hiinohamasmiiti ma~n~nati. api ca yadeva tattha sacca.m tadabhi~n~naaya aaki~nca~n~na.myeva pa.tipada.m pa.tipanno hoti. imaani kho, paribbaajakaa, cattaari braahma.nasaccaani mayaa saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa paveditaanii''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 186^b^.^eb^ atha ^a^T2.0241^ea^ kho a~n~nataro bhikkhu yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kena ^a^V1.0206^ea^ nu kho, bhante, loko niiyati, kena loko parikassati, kassa ca uppannassa vasa.m gacchatii''ti?

[03] ``saadhu saadhu, bhikkhu! bhaddako kho te, bhikkhu, ummaggo {umma"ngo (syaa0 ka0)}, bhaddaka.m pa.tibhaana.m, kalyaa.nii {kalyaa.naa (ka0)} paripucchaa. eva~nhi tva.m, bhikkhu, pucchasi -- `kena nu kho, bhante, loko niiyati, kena loko parikassati, kassa ca uppannassa vasa.m gacchatii'''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``cittena kho, bhikkhu, loko niiyati, cittena parikassati, cittassa uppannassa vasa.m gacchatii''ti.

[03] ``saadhu ^a^P2.0178^ea^, bhante''ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa bhagavanta.m uttari pa~nha.m apucchi -- ```bahussuto dhammadharo, bahussuto dhammadharo'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, bahussuto dhammadharo hotii''ti?

[03] ``saadhu saadhu, bhikkhu! bhaddako kho te, bhikkhu ummaggo, bhaddaka.m pa.tibhaana.m, kalyaa.nii paripucchaa. eva~nhi tva.m, bhikkhu, pucchasi -- `bahussuto dhammadharo, bahussuto dhammadharoti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, bahussuto ^a^M1.0498^ea^ dhammadharo hotii'''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``bahuu kho, bhikkhu, mayaa dhammaa desitaa {bahu kho bhikkhu mayaa dhammo desito (ka0)} -- sutta.m, geyya.m, veyyaakara.na.m, gaathaa, udaana.m, itivuttaka.m, jaataka.m, abbhutadhamma.m, vedalla.m. catuppadaaya cepi, bhikkhu, gaathaaya atthama~n~naaya dhammama~n~naaya ^a^T2.0242^ea^ dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno hoti bahussuto dhammadharoti ala.m vacanaayaa''ti.

[03] ``saadhu, bhante''ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa bhagavanta.m uttari pa~nha.m apucchi -- ```sutavaa nibbedhikapa~n~no, sutavaa nibbedhikapa~n~no'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, sutavaa nibbedhikapa~n~no hotii''ti?

[03] ``saadhu saadhu, bhikkhu! bhaddako kho te, bhikkhu, ummaggo, bhaddaka.m pa.tibhaana.m, kalyaa.nii paripucchaa. eva~nhi tva.m, bhikkhu, pucchasi -- `sutavaa nibbedhikapa~n~no, sutavaa nibbedhikapa~n~noti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, sutavaa nibbedhikapa~n~no hotii'''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``idha, bhikkhu, bhikkhuno `ida.m dukkha'nti suta.m hoti, pa~n~naaya cassa attha.m ativijjha passati; `aya.m dukkhasamudayo'ti suta.m hoti, pa~n~naaya cass attha.m ^a^V1.0207^ea^ ativijjha passati; `aya.m dukkhanirodho'ti suta.m hoti, pa~n~naaya cassa attha.m ativijjha passati; `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti suta.m hoti, pa~n~naaya cassa attha.m ativijjha passati. eva.m kho, bhikkhu, sutavaa nibbedhikapa~n~no hotii''ti.

[03] ``saadhu, bhante''ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa bhagavanta.m uttari pa~nha.m apucchi -- ```pa.n.dito mahaapa~n~no, pa.n.dito mahaapa~n~no'ti, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, pa.n.dito mahaapa~n~no hotii''ti?

[03] ``saadhu ^a^P2.0179^ea^ saadhu bhikkhu! bhaddako kho te, bhikkhu, ummaggo, bhaddaka.m pa.tibhaana.m, kalyaa.nii paripucchaa. eva~nhi tva.m bhikkhu pucchasi -- `pa.n.dito mahaapa~n~no, pa.n.dito mahaapa~n~noti ^a^T2.0243^ea^, bhante, vuccati. kittaavataa nu kho, bhante, pa.n.dito mahaapa~n~no hotii'''ti? ``eva.m, bhante''. ``idha, bhikkhu, pa.n.dito mahaapa~n~no nevattabyaabaadhaaya ceteti na parabyaabaadhaaya ceteti na ^a^M1.0499^ea^ ubhayabyaabaadhaaya ceteti attahitaparahitaubhayahitasabbalokahitameva cintayamaano cinteti. eva.m kho, bhikkhu, pa.n.dito mahaapa~n~no hotii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 187^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati ve.luvane kalandakanivaape. atha kho vassakaaro braahma.no magadhamahaamatto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavataa saddhi.m sammodi. sammodaniiya.m katha.m saara.niiya.m viitisaaretvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho vassakaaro braahma.no magadhamahaamatto bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``jaaneyya nu kho, bho gotama, asappuriso asappurisa.m -- `asappuriso aya.m bhava'''nti? ``a.t.thaana.m kho eta.m, braahma.na, anavakaaso ya.m asappuriso asappurisa.m jaaneyya -- `asappuriso aya.m bhava'''nti. ``jaaneyya pana, bho gotama, asappuriso sappurisa.m -- `sappuriso aya.m bhava'''nti? ``etampi kho, braahma.na, a.t.thaana.m anavakaaso ya.m asappuriso sappurisa.m jaaneyya -- `sappuriso aya.m bhava'''nti. ``jaaneyya nu kho, bho gotama, sappuriso sappurisa.m -- `sappuriso aya.m bhava'''nti? ``.thaana.m kho eta.m, braahma.na, vijjati ^a^V1.0208^ea^ ya.m sappuriso sappurisa.m jaaneyya -- `sappuriso aya.m bhava'''nti. ``jaaneyya pana, bho gotama, sappuriso asappurisa.m -- `asappuriso aya.m bhava'''nti? ``etampi ^a^T2.0244^ea^ kho, braahma.na, .thaana.m vijjati ya.m sappuriso asappurisa.m jaaneyya -- `asappuriso aya.m bhava'''nti.

[03] ``acchariya.m, bho gotama, abbhuta.m, bho gotama! yaava subhaasita.m ^a^P2.0180^ea^ cida.m, bhotaa gotamena -- `a.t.thaana.m kho eta.m, braahma.na, anavakaaso ya.m asappuriso asappurisa.m jaaneyya -- asappuriso aya.m bhavanti. etampi kho, braahma.na, a.t.thaana.m anavakaaso ya.m asappuriso sappurisa.m jaaneyya -- sappuriso aya.m bhavanti. .thaana.m kho eta.m, braahma.na, vijjati ya.m sappuriso sappurisa.m jaaneyya -- sappuriso aya.m bhavanti. etampi kho, braahma.na, .thaana.m vijjati ya.m sappuriso asappurisa.m jaaneyya -- asappuriso aya.m bhava'''nti.

[03] ``ekamida.m, bho gotama, samaya.m todeyyassa braahma.nassa parisati paruupaarambha.m vattenti -- `baalo aya.m raajaa e.leyyo sama.ne raamaputte abhippasanno, sama.ne ca pana raamaputte evaruupa.m paramanipaccakaara.m karoti, yadida.m ^a^M1.0500^ea^ abhivaadana.m paccu.t.thaana.m a~njalikamma.m saamiicikamma'nti. imepi ra~n~no e.leyyassa parihaarakaa baalaa -- yamako moggallo {puggalo (ka0)} uggo naavindakii gandhabbo aggivesso, ye sama.ne raamaputte abhippasannaa, sama.ne ca pana raamaputte evaruupa.m paramanipaccakaara.m karonti, yadida.m abhivaadana.m paccu.t.thaana.m a~njalikamma.m saamiicikammanti. tyaassuda.m todeyyo braahma.no iminaa nayena neti. ta.m ki.m ma~n~nanti, bhonto, pa.n.dito raajaa e.leyyo kara.niiyaadhikara.niiyesu vacaniiyaadhivacaniiyesu ^a^T2.0245^ea^ alamatthadasatarehi alamatthadasataro'ti? `eva.m, bho, pa.n.dito raajaa e.leyyo kara.niiyaadhikara.niiyesu vacaniiyaadhivacaniiyesu alamatthadasatarehi alamatthadasataro'''ti.

[03] ``yasmaa ca kho, bho, sama.no raamaputto ra~n~naa e.leyyena pa.n.ditena pa.n.ditataro kara.niiyaadhikara.niiyesu vacaniiyaadhivacaniiyesu alamatthadasatarena alamatthadasataro, tasmaa raajaa e.leyyo sama.ne raamaputte abhippasanno, sama.ne ca pana raamaputte evaruupa.m paramanipaccakaara.m karoti, yadida.m abhivaadana.m paccu.t.thaana.m a~njalikamma.m saamiicikamma.m''.

[03] ``ta.m ki.m ma~n~nanti, bhonto, pa.n.ditaa ra~n~no e.leyyassa parihaarakaa -- yamako moggallo ^a^V1.0209^ea^ uggo ^a^P2.0181^ea^ naavindakii gandhabbo aggivesso, kara.niiyaadhikara.niiyesu vacaniiyaadhivacaniiyesu alamatthadasatarehi alamatthadasataraati? `eva.m, bho, pa.n.ditaa ra~n~no e.leyyassa parihaarakaa -- yamako moggallo uggo naavindakii gandhabbo aggivesso, kara.niiyaadhikara.niiyesu vacaniiyaadhivacaniiyesu alamatthadasatarehi alamatthadasataraa'''ti.

[03] ``yasmaa ca kho, bho, sama.no raamaputto ra~n~no e.leyyassa parihaarakehi pa.n.ditehi pa.n.ditataro kara.niiyaadhikara.niiyesu vacaniiyaadhivacaniiyesu alamatthadasatarehi alamatthadasataro, tasmaa ra~n~no e.leyyassa parihaarakaa sama.ne raamaputte abhippasannaa; sama.ne ca pana raamaputte evaruupa.m paramanipaccakaara.m karonti, yadida.m abhivaadana.m paccu.t.thaana.m a~njalikamma.m saamiicikamma''nti.

[03] ``acchariya.m, bho, gotama, abbhuta.m, bho gotama! yaava subhaasita.m cida.m bhotaa gotamena ^a^T2.0246^ea^ -- `a.t.thaana.m kho eta.m, braahma.na, anavakaaso ya.m asappuriso ^a^M1.0501^ea^ asappurisa.m jaaneyya -- asappuriso aya.m bhavanti. etampi kho, braahma.na, a.t.thaana.m anavakaaso ya.m asappuriso sappurisa.m jaaneyya -- sappuriso aya.m bhavanti. .thaana.m kho eta.m, braahma.na, vijjati ya.m sappuriso sappurisa.m jaaneyya -- sappuriso aya.m bhavanti. etampi kho, braahma.na, .thaana.m vijjati ya.m sappuriso asappurisa.m jaaneyya -- asappuriso aya.m bhava'nti. handa ca daani maya.m, bho gotama, gacchaama. bahukiccaa maya.m bahukara.niiyaa''ti. ``yassadaani tva.m, braahma.na, kaala.m ma~n~nasii''ti. atha kho vassakaaro braahma.no magadhamahaamatto bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa pakkaamiiti. sattama.m.

[03] 188^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa raajagahe viharati gijjhakuu.te pabbate. atha kho upako ma.n.dikaaputto yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho upako ma.n.dikaaputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``aha~nhi, bhante, eva.mvaadii eva.mdi.t.thi -- `yo koci paruupaarambha.m vatteti, paruupaarambha.m vattento ^a^V1.0210^ea^ sabbo so {sabbaso (sii0 pii0)} na upapaadeti. anupapaadento gaarayho hoti upavajjo'''ti. ``paruupaarambha.m ce, upaka, vatteti paruupaarambha.m vattento na upapaadeti, anupapaadento ^a^P2.0182^ea^ gaarayho hoti upavajjo. tva.m kho, upaka, paruupaarambha.m vattesi, paruupaarambha.m vattento na upapaadesi, anupapaadento gaarayho hosi upavajjo''ti. ``seyyathaapi, bhante ^a^T2.0247^ea^, ummujjamaanaka.myeva mahataa paasena bandheyya; evameva.m kho aha.m, bhante, ummujjamaanakoyeva bhagavataa mahataa vaadapaasena {mahataa paasena (ka0)} baddho''ti.

[03] ``ida.m akusalanti kho, upaka, mayaa pa~n~natta.m. tattha aparimaa.naa padaa aparimaa.naa bya~njanaa aparimaa.naa tathaagatassa dhammadesanaa -- itipida.m akusalanti. ta.m kho panida.m akusala.m pahaatabbanti kho, upaka, mayaa pa~n~natta.m. tattha aparimaa.naa padaa aparimaa.naa bya~njanaa aparimaa.naa tathaagatassa dhammadesanaa -- itipida.m akusala.m pahaatabbanti.

[03] ``ida.m ^a^M1.0502^ea^ kusalanti kho, upaka, mayaa pa~n~natta.m. tattha aparimaa.naa padaa aparimaa.naa bya~njanaa aparimaa.naa tathaagatassa dhammadesanaa -- itipida.m kusalanti. ta.m kho panida.m kusala.m bhaavetabbanti kho, upaka, mayaa pa~n~natta.m. tattha aparimaa.naa padaa aparimaa.naa bya~njanaa aparimaa.naa tathaagatassa dhammadesanaa -- itipida.m kusala.m bhaavetabba''nti.

[03] atha kho upako ma.n.dikaaputto bhagavato bhaasita.m abhinanditvaa anumoditvaa u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa yena raajaa maagadho ajaatasattu vedehiputto tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa yaavatako ahosi bhagavataa saddhi.m kathaasallaapo ta.m sabba.m ra~n~no maagadhassa ajaatasattussa vedehiputtassa aarocesi.

[03] eva.m vutte raajaa maagadho ajaatasattu vedehiputto kupito anattamano upaka.m ma.n.dikaaputta.m etadavoca -- ``yaava dha.msii vataaya.m lo.nakaaradaarako yaava mukharo yaava pagabbo ^a^T2.0248^ea^ yatra hi naama ta.m bhagavanta.m arahanta.m sammaasambuddha.m aasaadetabba.m ma~n~nissati; apehi tva.m, upaka, vinassa, maa ta.m addasa''nti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 189^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome ^a^V1.0211^ea^, bhikkhave, sacchikara.niiyaa dhammaa. katame cattaaro? atthi ^a^P2.0183^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammaa kaayena sacchikara.niiyaa; atthi, bhikkhave, dhammaa satiyaa sacchikara.niiyaa; atthi, bhikkhave, dhammaa cakkhunaa sacchikara.niiyaa; atthi, bhikkhave, dhammaa pa~n~naaya sacchikara.niiyaa. katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammaa kaayena sacchikara.niiyaa? a.t.tha vimokkhaa, bhikkhave, kaayena sacchikara.niiyaa.
[03] ``katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammaa satiyaa sacchikara.niiyaa? pubbenivaaso, bhikkhave, satiyaa sacchikara.niiyo.
[03] ``katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammaa cakkhunaa sacchikara.niiyaa? sattaana.m cutuupapaato, bhikkhave, cakkhunaa sacchikara.niiyo.
[03] ``katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammaa pa~n~naaya sacchikara.niiyaa? aasavaana.m khayo, bhikkhave, pa~n~naaya sacchikara.niiyo. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro sacchikara.niiyaa dhammaa''ti. navama.m.

[03] 190^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^M1.0503^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati pubbaaraame migaaramaatupaasaade. tena kho pana samayena bhagavaa tadahuposathe bhikkhusa"nghaparivuto nisinno hoti. atha kho bhagavaa tu.nhiibhuuta.m tu.nhiibhuuta.m bhikkhusa"ngha.m anuviloketvaa bhikkhuu aamantesi --

[03] ``apalaapaaya.m, bhikkhave, parisaa nippalaapaaya.m, bhikkhave, parisaa suddhaa saare pati.t.thitaa. tathaaruupo aya.m ^a^T2.0249^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhusa"ngho, tathaaruupaaya.m, bhikkhave, parisaa. yathaaruupaa parisaa dullabhaa dassanaayapi lokasmi.m, tathaaruupo aya.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhusa"ngho, tathaaruupaaya.m, bhikkhave, parisaa. yathaaruupaa parisaa aahuneyyaa paahuneyyaa dakkhi.neyyaa a~njalikara.niiyaa anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa, tathaaruupo aya.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhusa"ngho, tathaaruupaaya.m, bhikkhave, parisaa ^a^V1.0212^ea^. yathaaruupaaya parisaaya appa.m dinna.m bahu hoti bahu dinna.m bahutara.m, tathaaruupo aya.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhusa"ngho, tathaaruupaaya.m, bhikkhave, parisaa. yathaaruupa.m parisa.m ala.m yojanaga.nanaanipi dassanaaya gantu.m api pu.tosenaapi, tathaaruupo aya.m, bhikkhave, bhikkhusa"ngho, (tathaaruupaaya.m, bhikkhave, parisaa) {( ) sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 potthakesu natthi}.

[03] ``santi ^a^P2.0184^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu imasmi.m bhikkhusa"nghe devappattaa viharanti; santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu imasmi.m bhikkhusa"nghe brahmappattaa viharanti; santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu imasmi.m bhikkhusa"nghe aane~njappattaa viharanti; santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhuu imasmi.m bhikkhusa"nghe ariyappattaa viharanti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu devappatto hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati; vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa...pe0... dutiya.m jhaana.m...pe0... tatiya.m jhaana.m...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu devappatto hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu brahmappatto hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mettaasahagatena cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati, tathaa ^a^T2.0250^ea^ dutiya.m tathaa tatiya.m tathaa catuttha.m. iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m mettaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena pharitvaa viharati. karu.naa... muditaa... upekkhaasahagatena ^a^M1.0504^ea^ cetasaa eka.m disa.m pharitvaa viharati, tathaa dutiya.m tathaa tatiya.m tathaa catuttha.m. iti uddhamadho tiriya.m sabbadhi sabbattataaya sabbaavanta.m loka.m upekkhaasahagatena cetasaa vipulena mahaggatena appamaa.nena averena abyaapajjena pharitvaa viharati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu brahmappatto hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aane~njappatto hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbaso ruupasa~n~naana.m ^a^V1.0213^ea^ samatikkamaa pa.tighasa~n~naana.m attha"ngamaa naanattasa~n~naana.m amanasikaaraa `ananto aakaaso'ti aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. sabbaso aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `ananta.m vi~n~naa.na'nti vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m upasampajja viharati. sabbaso vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m samatikkamma `natthi ki~ncii'ti aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati. sabbaso aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m samatikkamma nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m upasampajja viharati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aane~njappatto hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyappatto hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu `ida.m dukkha'nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyappatto hotii''ti. dasama.m.
