[03] 241^b^.^eb^ ```idheva, bhikkhave, (pa.thamo) sama.no, idha dutiyo sama.no, idha tatiyo sama.no, idha catuttho sama.no; su~n~naa parappavaadaa sama.nehi a~n~nehii'ti {sama.nehi a~n~neti (sii0 pii0 ka0) ettha a~n~nehiiti sakaaya pa.ti~n~naaya saccaabhi~n~nehiiti attho veditabbo. dii0 ni0 2.214; ma0 ni0 1.140} -- evameta.m, bhikkhave, sammaa siihanaada.m nadatha.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, pa.thamo sama.no? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa sotaapanno hoti avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaaya.no. aya.m, bhikkhave, pa.thamo sama.no.

[03] ``katamo ^a^M1.0561^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, dutiyo sama.no? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa raagadosamohaana.m tanuttaa sakadaagaamii hoti, sakideva ima.m loka.m aagantvaa dukkhassanta.m karoti. aya.m, bhikkhave, dutiyo sama.no.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, tatiyo sama.no? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa opapaatiko hoti tattha parinibbaayii anaavattidhammo tasmaa lokaa. aya.m, bhikkhave, tatiyo sama.no.

[03] ``katamo ca, bhikkhave, catuttho sama.no? idha ^a^T2.0324^ea^, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. aya.m, bhikkhave, catuttho sama.no.

[03] ```idheva, bhikkhave, pa.thamo sama.no, idha dutiyo sama.no, idha tatiyo sama.no, idha catuttho ^a^V1.0274^ea^ sama.no; su~n~naa parappavaadaa sama.nebhi a~n~nehii'ti -- evameta.m, bhikkhave, sammaa siihanaada.m nadathaa''ti. dasama.m.

[03] 242^b^.^eb^ ``sappurisa.m ^a^P2.0239^ea^, bhikkhave, nissaaya cattaaro aanisa.msaa paa.tika"nkhaa. katame cattaaro? ariyena siilena va.d.dhati, ariyena samaadhinaa va.d.dhati, ariyaaya pa~n~naaya va.d.dhati, ariyaaya vimuttiyaa va.d.dhati -- sappurisa.m, bhikkhave, nissaaya ime cattaaro aanisa.msaa paa.tika"nkhaa''ti. ekaadasama.m.
[06] kammavaggo catuttho.
[01] tassuddaana.m --
[21] sa.mkhitta vitthaara so.nakaayana,
[27] sikkhaapada.m ariyamaggo bojjha"nga.m.
[26] saavajja~nceva abyaabajjha.m,
[22] sama.no ca sappurisaanisa.msoti..

[03] 243^b^.^eb^ eka.m ^a^M1.0562^ea^ ^a^V1.0275^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa kosambiya.m viharati ghositaaraame. atha kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m aananda.m bhagavaa etadavoca -- ``api nu ta.m, aananda, adhikara.na.m vuupasanta''nti? ``kuto ta.m, bhante, adhikara.na.m vuupasamissati {vuupasammissati (?)}! aayasmato ^a^T2.0325^ea^, bhante, anuruddhassa baahiyo naama saddhivihaariko kevalakappa.m sa"nghabhedaaya .thito. tatraayasmaa anuruddho na ekavaacikampi bha.nitabba.m ma~n~natii''ti.

[03] ``kadaa panaananda, anuruddho sa"nghamajjhe adhikara.nesu {adhikara.nesu tesu (ka0)} voyu~njati! nanu, aananda, yaani kaanici adhikara.naani uppajjanti, sabbaani taani tumhe ceva vuupasametha saariputtamoggallaanaa ca.

[03] ``cattaarome, aananda, atthavase sampassamaano paapabhikkhu sa"nghabhedena nandati. katame cattaaro? idhaananda, paapabhikkhu dussiilo hoti paapadhammo asuci sa"nkassarasamaacaaro pa.ticchannakammanto assama.no sama.napa.ti~n~no abrahmacaarii brahmacaaripa.ti~n~no antopuuti ^a^P2.0240^ea^ avassuto kasambujaato. tassa eva.m hoti -- `sace kho ma.m bhikkhuu jaanissanti -- dussiilo paapadhammo asuci sa"nkassarasamaacaaro pa.ticchannakammanto assama.no sama.napa.ti~n~no abrahmacaarii brahmacaaripa.ti~n~no antopuuti avassuto kasambujaatoti, samaggaa ma.m santaa naasessanti; vaggaa pana ma.m na naasessantii'ti. ida.m, aananda, pa.thama.m atthavasa.m sampassamaano paapabhikkhu sa"nghabhedena nandati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aananda, paapabhikkhu micchaadi.t.thiko hoti, antaggaahikaaya di.t.thiyaa samannaagato. tassa eva.m hoti -- `sace kho ma.m bhikkhuu jaanissanti -- micchaadi.t.thiko antaggaahikaaya ^a^V1.0276^ea^ di.t.thiyaa samannaagatoti, samaggaa ma.m santaa naasessanti; vaggaa pana ma.m na naasessantii'ti. ida.m, aananda, dutiya.m atthavasa.m sampassamaano paapabhikkhu sa"nghabhedena nandati.

[03] ``puna ^a^M1.0563^ea^ capara.m, aananda, paapabhikkhu micchaaaajiivo hoti, micchaaaajiivena ^a^T2.0326^ea^ jiivika.m {jiivita.m (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} kappeti. tassa eva.m hoti -- `sace kho ma.m bhikkhuu jaanissanti -- micchaaaajiivo micchaaaajiivena jiivika.m kappetiiti, samaggaa ma.m santaa naasessanti; vaggaa pana ma.m na naasessantii'ti. ida.m, aananda, tatiya.m atthavasa.m sampassamaano paapabhikkhu sa"nghabhedena nandati.

[03] ``puna capara.m, aananda, paapabhikkhu laabhakaamo hoti sakkaarakaamo anava~n~nattikaamo. tassa eva.m hoti -- `sace kho ma.m bhikkhuu jaanissanti -- laabhakaamo sakkaarakaamo anava~n~nattikaamoti, samaggaa ma.m santaa na sakkarissanti na garu.m karissanti na maanessanti na puujessanti; vaggaa pana ma.m sakkarissanti garu.m karissanti maanessanti puujessantii'ti. ida.m, aananda, catuttha.m atthavasa.m sampassamaano paapabhikkhu sa"nghabhedena nandati. ime kho, aananda, cattaaro atthavase sampassamaano paapabhikkhu sa"nghabhedena nandatii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 244^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarimaani, bhikkhave, aapattibhayaani. katamaani cattaari? seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, cora.m aagucaari.m gahetvaa ra~n~no dasseyyu.m -- `aya.m te, deva, coro aagucaarii. imassa devo da.n.da.m pa.netuu'ti. tamena.m raajaa eva.m vadeyya -- `gacchatha ^a^P2.0241^ea^, bho, ima.m purisa.m da.lhaaya rajjuyaa pacchaabaaha.m gaa.lhabandhana.m bandhitvaa khuramu.n.da.m karitvaa kharassarena pa.navena rathikaaya rathika.m si"nghaa.takena si"nghaa.taka.m parinetvaa dakkhi.nena dvaarena nikkhaametvaa dakkhi.nato nagarassa siisa.m chindathaa'ti. tamena.m ra~n~no purisaa da.lhaaya rajjuyaa ^a^T2.0327^ea^ pacchaabaaha.m gaa.lhabandhana.m bandhitvaa khuramu.n.da.m karitvaa kharassarena pa.navena rathikaaya rathika.m si"nghaa.takena si"nghaa.taka.m parinetvaa dakkhi.nena dvaarena nikkhaametvaa dakkhi.nato nagarassa siisa.m chindeyyu.m. tatra~n~natarassa thala.t.thassa purisassa evamassa -- `paapaka.m vata, bho, aya.m puriso kamma.m akaasi gaarayha.m siisacchejja.m. yatra hi naama ra~n~no purisaa da.lhaaya rajjuyaa pacchaabaaha.m gaa.lhabandhana.m bandhitvaa khuramu.n.da.m karitvaa kharassarena pa.navena rathikaaya rathika.m si"nghaa.takena si"nghaa.taka.m parinetvaa dakkhi.nena ^a^V1.0277^ea^ dvaarena nikkhaametvaa dakkhi.nato nagarassa siisa.m chindissanti ^a^M1.0564^ea^! so vatassaaha.m {so vatassaaya.m (sii0)} evaruupa.m paapakamma.m {paapa.m kamma.m (sii0 pii0)} na kareyya.m {na kareyya (sii0) dii0 ni0 1.183 paa.liyaa tada.t.thakathaaya ca sa.msandetabba.m} gaarayha.m siisacchejja'nti. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci bhikkhussa vaa bhikkhuniyaa vaa eva.m tibbaa bhayasa~n~naa paccupa.t.thitaa hoti paaraajikesu dhammesu. tasseta.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- anaapanno vaa paaraajika.m dhamma.m na aapajjissati, aapanno vaa paaraajika.m dhamma.m yathaadhamma.m pa.tikarissati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso kaa.lavattha.m {kaa.laka.m vattha.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} paridhaaya kese pakiritvaa musala.m khandhe aaropetvaa mahaajanakaaya.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadeyya -- `aha.m, bhante, paapakamma.m akaasi.m gaarayha.m mosalla.m, yena me aayasmanto attamanaa honti ta.m karomii'ti. tatra~n~natarassa thala.t.thassa purisassa evamassa -- `paapaka.m vata, bho, aya.m puriso kamma.m akaasi gaarayha.m mosalla.m. yatra hi naama kaa.lavattha.m paridhaaya kese pakiritvaa musala.m khandhe aaropetvaa mahaajanakaaya.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vakkhati -- `aha.m, bhante, paapakamma.m akaasi.m gaarayha.m mosalla.m, yena me aayasmanto ^a^T2.0328^ea^ attamanaa honti ta.m karomiiti. so ^a^P2.0242^ea^ vatassaaha.m evaruupa.m paapakamma.m na kareyya.m gaarayha.m mosalla'nti. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci bhikkhussa vaa bhikkhuniyaa vaa eva.m tibbaa bhayasa~n~naa paccupa.t.thitaa hoti sa"nghaadisesesu dhammesu, tasseta.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- anaapanno vaa sa"nghaadisesa.m dhamma.m na aapajjissati, aapanno vaa sa"nghaadisesa.m dhamma.m yathaadhamma.m pa.tikarissati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso kaa.lavattha.m paridhaaya kese pakiritvaa bhasmapu.ta.m {assapu.ta.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} khandhe aaropetvaa mahaajanakaaya.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadeyya -- `aha.m, bhante, paapakamma.m akaasi.m gaarayha.m bhasmapu.ta.m. yena me aayasmanto attamanaa honti ta.m karomii'ti. tatra~n~natarassa thala.t.thassa purisassa evamassa -- `paapaka.m vata, bho, aya.m puriso kamma.m akaasi gaarayha.m bhasmapu.ta.m. yatra hi naama kaa.lavattha.m paridhaaya kese pakiritvaa bhasmapu.ta.m khandhe aaropetvaa mahaajanakaaya.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vakkhati -- aha.m, bhante, paapakamma.m akaasi.m gaarayha.m bhasmapu.ta.m; yena me aayasmanto attamanaa honti ta.m karomiiti. so vatassaaha.m evaruupa.m paapakamma.m na kareyya.m gaarayha.m ^a^M1.0565^ea^ bhasmapu.ta'nti. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci bhikkhussa vaa bhikkhuniyaa vaa eva.m tibbaa bhayasa~n~naa paccupa.t.thitaa hoti paacittiyesu dhammesu ^a^V1.0278^ea^, tasseta.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- anaapanno vaa paacittiya.m dhamma.m na aapajjissati, aapanno vaa paacittiya.m dhamma.m yathaadhamma.m pa.tikarissati.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, puriso ^a^T2.0329^ea^ kaa.lavattha.m paridhaaya kese pakiritvaa mahaajanakaaya.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m vadeyya -- `aha.m, bhante, paapakamma.m akaasi.m gaarayha.m upavajja.m. yena me aayasmanto attamanaa honti ta.m karomii'ti. tatra~n~natarassa thala.t.thassa purisassa evamassa -- `paapaka.m vata, bho, aya.m puriso kamma.m akaasi gaarayha.m upavajja.m. yatra hi naama kaa.lavattha.m paridhaaya kese pakiritvaa mahaajanakaaya.m upasa"nkamitvaa eva.m ^a^P2.0243^ea^ vakkhati -- aha.m, bhante, paapakamma.m akaasi.m gaarayha.m upavajja.m; yena me aayasmanto attamanaa honti ta.m karomiiti. so vatassaaha.m evaruupa.m paapakamma.m na kareyya.m gaarayha.m upavajja'nti. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci bhikkhussa vaa bhikkhuniyaa vaa eva.m tibbaa bhayasa~n~naa paccupa.t.thitaa hoti paa.tidesaniiyesu dhammesu, tasseta.m paa.tika"nkha.m -- anaapanno vaa paa.tidesaniiya.m dhamma.m na aapajjissati, aapanno vaa paa.tidesaniiya.m dhamma.m yathaadhamma.m pa.tikarissati. imaani kho, bhikkhave, cattaari aapattibhayaanii''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 245^b^.^eb^ ``sikkhaanisa.msamida.m, bhikkhave, brahmacariya.m vussati pa~n~nuttara.m vimuttisaara.m sataadhipateyya.m. katha~nca, bhikkhave, sikkhaanisa.msa.m hoti? idha, bhikkhave, mayaa saavakaana.m aabhisamaacaarikaa sikkhaa pa~n~nattaa appasannaana.m pasaadaaya pasannaana.m bhiyyobhaavaaya. yathaa yathaa, bhikkhave, mayaa saavakaana.m aabhisamaacaarikaa sikkhaa pa~n~nattaa appasannaana.m pasaadaaya pasannaana.m bhiyyobhaavaaya tathaa tathaa so tassaa sikkhaaya akha.n.dakaarii hoti acchiddakaarii ^a^T2.0330^ea^ asabalakaarii akammaasakaarii, samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu.

[03] ``puna capara.m, bhikkhave, mayaa saavakaana.m aadibrahmacariyikaa sikkhaa pa~n~nattaa sabbaso sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya. yathaa yathaa, bhikkhave, mayaa saavakaana.m aadibrahmacariyikaa sikkhaa pa~n~nattaa sabbaso sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya tathaa tathaa so tassaa sikkhaaya akha.n.dakaarii hoti ^a^M1.0566^ea^ acchiddakaarii ^a^V1.0279^ea^ asabalakaarii akammaasakaarii, samaadaaya sikkhati sikkhaapadesu. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, sikkhaanisa.msa.m hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, pa~n~nuttara.m hoti? idha, bhikkhave, mayaa saavakaana.m dhammaa desitaa sabbaso sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya. yathaa yathaa, bhikkhave, mayaa saavakaana.m dhammaa desitaa sabbaso sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya tathaa tathaassa te dhammaa pa~n~naaya samavekkhitaa honti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, pa~n~nuttara.m hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^P2.0244^ea^, bhikkhave, vimuttisaara.m hoti? idha, bhikkhave, mayaa saavakaana.m dhammaa desitaa sabbaso sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya. yathaa yathaa, bhikkhave, mayaa saavakaana.m dhammaa desitaa sabbaso sammaa dukkhakkhayaaya tathaa tathaassa te dhammaa vimuttiyaa phusitaa honti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, vimuttisaara.m hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, sataadhipateyya.m hoti? `iti aparipuura.m vaa aabhisamaacaarika.m sikkha.m paripuuressaami, paripuura.m vaa aabhisamaacaarika.m sikkha.m tattha tattha pa~n~naaya anuggahessaamii'ti -- ajjhatta.myeva sati suupa.t.thitaa hoti. `iti aparipuura.m vaa aadibrahmacariyika.m sikkha.m paripuuressaami, paripuura.m vaa aadibrahmacariyika.m sikkha.m tattha tattha pa~n~naaya anuggahessaamii'ti -- ajjhatta.myeva sati suupa.t.thitaa hoti. `iti asamavekkhita.m vaa ^a^T2.0331^ea^ dhamma.m pa~n~naaya samavekkhissaami, samavekkhita.m vaa dhamma.m tattha tattha pa~n~naaya anuggahessaamii'ti -- ajjhatta.myeva sati suupa.t.thitaa hoti. `iti aphusita.m vaa dhamma.m vimuttiyaa phusissaami, phusita.m vaa dhamma.m tattha tattha pa~n~naaya anuggahessaamii'ti -- ajjhatta.myeva sati suupa.t.thitaa hoti. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, sataadhipateyya.m hoti. `sikkhaanisa.msamida.m, bhikkhave, brahmacariya.m vussati pa~n~nuttara.m vimuttisaara.m sataadhipateyya'nti, iti ya.m ta.m vutta.m idameta.m pa.ticca vutta''nti. tatiya.m.

[03] 246^b^.^eb^ ``catasso imaa, bhikkhave, seyyaa. katamaa catasso? petaseyyaa, kaamabhogiseyyaa ^a^V1.0280^ea^, siihaseyyaa, tathaagataseyyaa. katamaa ^a^M1.0567^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, petaseyyaa? yebhuyyena, bhikkhave, petaa uttaanaa senti; aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, petaseyyaa.
[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, kaamabhogiseyyaa? yebhuyyena, bhikkhave, kaamabhogii vaamena passena senti; aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, kaamabhogiseyyaa.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, siihaseyyaa? siiho ^a^P2.0245^ea^, bhikkhave, migaraajaa dakkhi.nena passena seyya.m kappeti, paade paada.m accaadhaaya, antarasatthimhi na"ngu.t.tha.m anupakkhipitvaa. so pa.tibujjhitvaa purima.m kaaya.m abbhunnaametvaa pacchima.m kaaya.m anuviloketi. sace, bhikkhave, siiho migaraajaa ki~nci passati kaayassa vikkhitta.m vaa visa.ta.m vaa, tena, bhikkhave, siiho migaraajaa anattamano hoti. sace pana, bhikkhave, siiho migaraajaa na ki~nci passati kaayassa vikkhitta.m vaa visa.ta.m vaa, tena ^a^T2.0332^ea^, bhikkhave, siiho migaraajaa attamano hoti. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, siihaseyyaa.

[03] ``katamaa ca, bhikkhave, tathaagataseyyaa? idha, bhikkhave, tathaagato vivicceva kaamehi...pe0... catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati, bhikkhave, tathaagataseyyaa. imaa kho, bhikkhave, catasso seyyaa''ti. catuttha.m.

[03] 247^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, thuupaarahaa. katame cattaaro? tathaagato araha.m sammaasambuddho thuupaaraho, paccekabuddho thuupaaraho, tathaagatasaavako thuupaaraho, raajaa cakkavattii thuupaaraho -- ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro thuupaarahaa''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 248^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome ^a^V1.0281^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammaa pa~n~naavuddhiyaa sa.mvattanti. katame cattaaro? sappurisasa.msevo, saddhammasavana.m, yonisomanasikaaro, dhammaanudhammappa.tipatti -- ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro dhammaa pa~n~naavuddhiyaa sa.mvattantii''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 249^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome ^a^M1.0568^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammaa manussabhuutassa bahukaaraa honti. katame cattaaro? sappurisasa.msevo, saddhammasavana.m, yonisomanasikaaro, dhammaanudhammappa.tipatti -- ime ^a^P2.0246^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro dhammaa manussabhuutassa bahukaaraa hontii''ti. sattama.m.

[03] 250^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, anariyavohaaraa. katame cattaaro? adi.t.the di.t.thavaaditaa, asute sutavaaditaa, amute mutavaaditaa, avi~n~naate vi~n~naatavaaditaa -- ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro anariyavohaaraa''ti. a.t.thama.m.

[03] 251^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome ^a^T2.0333^ea^, bhikkhave, ariyavohaaraa. katame cattaaro? adi.t.the adi.t.thavaaditaa, asute asutavaaditaa, amute amutavaaditaa, avi~n~naate avi~n~naatavaaditaa -- ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro ariyavohaaraa''ti. navama.m.

[03] 252^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, anariyavohaaraa. katame cattaaro? di.t.the adi.t.thavaaditaa, sute ^a^V1.0282^ea^ asutavaaditaa, mute amutavaaditaa, vi~n~naate avi~n~naatavaaditaa -- ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro anariyavohaaraa''ti. dasama.m.

[03] 253^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome, bhikkhave, ariyavohaaraa. katame cattaaro? di.t.the di.t.thavaaditaa, sute sutavaaditaa, mute mutavaaditaa, vi~n~naate vi~n~naatavaaditaa -- ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro ariyavohaaraa''ti. ekaadasama.m.

[03] 254^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarome ^a^V1.0283^ea^ ^a^M1.0570^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammaa. katame cattaaro? atthi, bhikkhave, dhammaa abhi~n~naa pari~n~neyyaa; atthi, bhikkhave ^a^P2.0247^ea^, dhammaa abhi~n~naa pahaatabbaa; atthi, bhikkhave, dhammaa abhi~n~naa bhaavetabbaa; atthi, bhikkhave, dhammaa abhi~n~naa sacchikaatabbaa.

[03] ``katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammaa abhi~n~naa pari~n~neyyaa? pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaa {pa~ncupaadaanakkhandhaatissa vacaniiya.m (ka0)} -- ime vuccanti, bhikkhave ^a^T2.0334^ea^, dhammaa abhi~n~naa pari~n~neyyaa.
[03] ``katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammaa abhi~n~naa pahaatabbaa? avijjaa ca bhavata.nhaa ca -- ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, dhammaa abhi~n~naa pahaatabbaa.
[03] ``katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammaa abhi~n~naa bhaavetabbaa? samatho ca vipassanaa ca -- ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, dhammaa abhi~n~naa bhaavetabbaa.

[03] ``katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammaa abhi~n~naa sacchikaatabbaa? vijjaa ca vimutti ca -- ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, dhammaa abhi~n~naa sacchikaatabbaa. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro dhammaa''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 255^b^.^eb^ ``catasso imaa, bhikkhave, anariyapariyesanaa. katamaa catasso? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco attanaa jaraadhammo samaano jaraadhamma.myeva pariyesati; attanaa byaadhidhammo samaano byaadhidhamma.myeva pariyesati; attanaa mara.nadhammo samaano mara.nadhamma.myeva pariyesati; attanaa ^a^V1.0284^ea^ sa.mkilesadhammo samaano sa.mkilesadhamma.myeva pariyesati. imaa kho, bhikkhave, catasso anariyapariyesanaa.

[03] ``catasso imaa, bhikkhave, ariyapariyesanaa. katamaa catasso? idha, bhikkhave, ekacco attanaa jaraadhammo samaano jaraadhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa ajara.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m pariyesati; attanaa byaadhidhammo samaano byaadhidhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa abyaadhi.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m ^a^M1.0571^ea^ nibbaana.m pariyesati; attanaa mara.nadhammo samaano mara.nadhamme aadiinava.m viditvaa amata.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m pariyesati; attanaa sa.mkilesadhammo samaano sa.mkilesadhamme aadiinava.m ^a^P2.0248^ea^ viditvaa asa.mkili.t.tha.m anuttara.m yogakkhema.m nibbaana.m pariyesati. imaa kho, bhikkhave ^a^T2.0335^ea^, catasso ariyapariyesanaa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 256^b^.^eb^ ``cattaarimaani, bhikkhave, sa"ngahavatthuuni. katamaani cattaari? daana.m, peyyavajja.m {piyavaacaa (ka0) a0 ni0 4.32 passitabba.m}, atthacariyaa, samaanattataa -- imaani kho, bhikkhave, cattaari sa"ngahavatthuunii''ti.

[03] 257^b^.^eb^ atha kho aayasmaa maalukyaputto {maalu"nkyaputto (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa maalukyaputto bhagavanta.m etadavoca --

[03] ``saadhu me, bhante, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena dhamma.m desetu, yamaha.m bhagavato dhamma.m sutvaa eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto vihareyya''nti. ``ettha idaani, maalukyaputta, ki.m dahare bhikkhuu vakkhaama; yatra hi naama tva.m ji.n.no vuddho mahallako tathaagatassa sa.mkhittena ovaada.m yaacasii''ti! ``desetu me, bhante, bhagavaa sa.mkhittena dhamma.m; desetu sugato sa.mkhittena dhamma.m. appeva naamaaha.m bhagavato bhaasitassa attha.m aajaaneyya.m; appeva naamaaha.m bhagavato bhaasitassa daayaado {bhagavato saavako (ka0)} assa''nti.

[03] ``cattaarome ^a^V1.0285^ea^, maalukyaputta, ta.nhuppaadaa yattha bhikkhuno ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati. katame cattaaro? ciivarahetu vaa, maalukyaputta, bhikkhuno ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati. pi.n.dapaatahetu vaa, maalukyaputta, bhikkhuno ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati. senaasanahetu vaa, maalukyaputta, bhikkhuno ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati. itibhavaabhavahetu vaa, maalukyaputta, bhikkhuno ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati. ime ^a^T2.0336^ea^ kho, maalukyaputta, cattaaro ta.nhuppaadaa yattha bhikkhuno ta.nhaa uppajjamaanaa uppajjati. yato ^a^P2.0249^ea^ kho, maalukyaputta ^a^M1.0572^ea^, bhikkhuno ta.nhaa pahiinaa hoti ucchinnamuulaa taalaavatthukataa anabhaava.mkataa aayati.m anuppaadadhammaa, aya.m vuccati, maalukyaputta, `bhikkhu acchecchi ta.nha.m, vivattayi sa.myojana.m, sammaa maanaabhisamayaa antamakaasi dukkhassaa'''ti.

[03] atha kho aayasmaa maalukyaputto bhagavataa iminaa ovaadena ovadito u.t.thaayaasanaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa padakkhi.na.m katvaa pakkaami. atha kho aayasmaa maalukyaputto eko vuupaka.t.tho appamatto aataapii pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva -- yassatthaaya kulaputtaa sammadeva agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajanti, tadanuttara.m -- brahmacariyapariyosaana.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja vihaasi. ``khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa''ti abbha~n~naasi. a~n~nataro ca panaayasmaa maalukyaputto arahata.m ahosiiti. catuttha.m.

[03] 258^b^.^eb^ ``yaani kaanici, bhikkhave, kulaani bhogesu mahatta.m pattaani na cira.t.thitikaani bhavanti, sabbaani taani catuuhi .thaanehi, etesa.m vaa a~n~natarena. katamehi catuuhi? na.t.tha.m na gavesanti, ji.n.na.m na pa.tisa"nkharonti, aparimitapaanabhojanaa honti, dussiila.m itthi.m vaa purisa.m vaa aadhipacce .thapenti. yaani kaanici, bhikkhave, kulaani bhogesu mahatta.m pattaani na cira.t.thitikaani bhavanti, sabbaani taani imehi catuuhi .thaanehi ^a^T2.0337^ea^, etesa.m vaa a~n~natarena.

[03] ``yaani kaanici, bhikkhave, kulaani bhogesu mahatta.m pattaani cira.t.thitikaani bhavanti, sabbaani ^a^V1.0286^ea^ taani catuuhi .thaanehi, etesa.m vaa a~n~natarena. katamehi catuuhi? na.t.tha.m gavesanti, ji.n.na.m pa.tisa"nkharonti, parimitapaanabhojanaa honti, siilavanta.m itthi.m vaa purisa.m vaa aadhipacce .thapenti. yaani kaanici, bhikkhave, kulaani bhogesu mahatta.m pattaani cira.t.thitikaani bhavanti, sabbaani taani imehi catuuhi .thaanehi, etesa.m vaa a~n~natarenaa''ti. pa~ncama.m.

[03] 259^b^.^eb^ ``catuuhi ^a^P2.0250^ea^, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no bhadro assaajaaniiyo raajaaraho hoti raajabhoggo, ra~n~no a"nganteva sa"nkha.m ^a^M1.0573^ea^ gacchati. katamehi catuuhi? idha, bhikkhave, ra~n~no bhadro assaajaaniiyo va.n.nasampanno ca hoti balasampanno ca javasampanno ca aarohapari.naahasampanno ca. imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuuhi a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no bhadro assaajaaniiyo raajaaraho hoti raajabhoggo, ra~n~no a"nganteva sa"nkha.m gacchati.

[03] ``evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, catuuhi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassa. katamehi catuuhi? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu va.n.nasampanno ca hoti balasampanno ca javasampanno ca aarohapari.naahasampanno ca.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu va.n.nasampanno hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu siilavaa hoti...pe0... samaadaaya sikkhati ^a^T2.0338^ea^ sikkhaapadesu. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu va.n.nasampanno hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu balasampanno hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aaraddhaviiriyo viharati akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya, kusalaana.m dhammaana.m upasampadaaya, thaamavaa da.lhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu balasampanno hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu javasampanno hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu `ida.m dukkha'nti ^a^V1.0287^ea^ yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati...pe0... `aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa'ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu javasampanno hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aarohapari.naahasampanno hoti? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu laabhii hoti ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaaraana.m. eva.m kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aarohapari.naahasampanno hoti ^a^P2.0251^ea^.
[03] ``imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuuhi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu aahuneyyo hoti...pe0... anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] 260^b^.^eb^ ``catuuhi, bhikkhave, a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no bhadro assaajaaniiyo raajaaraho hoti raajabhoggo, ra~n~no a"nganteva sa"nkha.m ^a^M1.0574^ea^ gacchati. katamehi catuuhi? idha, bhikkhave, ra~n~no bhadro assaajaaniiyo va.n.nasampanno ca hoti, balasampanno ca, javasampanno ca, aarohapari.naahasampanno ca. imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuuhi a"ngehi samannaagato ra~n~no bhadro assaajaaniiyo raajaaraho hoti raajabhoggo, ra~n~no a"nganteva sa"nkha.m gacchati.

[03] 262^b^.^eb^ ``catuuhi ^a^M1.0575^ea^, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu naala.m ara~n~navanappatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevitu.m. katamehi catuuhi? kaamavitakkena, byaapaadavitakkena, vihi.msaavitakkena, duppa~n~no hoti ja.lo elamuugo -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuuhi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu naala.m ara~n~navanappatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevitu.m.

[03] ``catuuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu ala.m ara~n~navanappatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevitu.m. katamehi catuuhi? nekkhammavitakkena, abyaapaadavitakkena, avihi.msaavitakkena ^a^V1.0289^ea^, pa~n~navaa hoti aja.lo anelamuugo -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuuhi dhammehi samannaagato bhikkhu ala.m ara~n~navanappatthaani pantaani senaasanaani pa.tisevitu''nti. navama.m.

[03] 263^b^.^eb^ ``catuuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato baalo abyatto asappuriso khata.m upahata.m attaana.m pariharati, saavajjo ca hoti saanuvajjo vi~n~nuuna.m, bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavati. katamehi catuuhi? saavajjena kaayakammena, saavajjena vaciikammena, saavajjena manokammena, saavajjaaya di.t.thiyaa -- imehi ^a^P2.0253^ea^ kho, bhikkhave, catuuhi dhammehi samannaagato baalo abyatto asappuriso khata.m upahata.m attaana.m pariharati, saavajjo ca hoti saanuvajjo vi~n~nuuna.m, bahu~nca apu~n~na.m pasavati.

[03] ``catuuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannaagato pa.n.dito viyatto sappuriso akkhata.m anupahata.m attaana.m pariharati, anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo vi~n~nuuna.m, bahu~nca pu~n~na.m pasavati. katamehi catuuhi? anavajjena kaayakammena, anavajjena ^a^T2.0341^ea^ vaciikammena, anavajjena manokammena, anavajjaaya di.t.thiyaa -- imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuuhi dhammehi samannaagato pa.n.dito viyatto sappuriso akkhata.m anupahata.m attaana.m pariharati, anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo vi~n~nuuna.m, bahu~nca pu~n~na.m pasavatii''ti. dasama.m.

[03] 275^b^.^eb^ ``raagassa, bhikkhave, abhi~n~naaya cattaaro dhammaa bhaavetabbaa. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anuppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m anuppaadaaya chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati; uppannaana.m paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya...pe0... anuppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m uppaadaaya...pe0... uppannaana.m kusalaana.m dhammaana.m .thitiyaa asammosaaya bhiyyobhaavaaya vepullaaya bhaavanaaya paaripuuriyaa chanda.m janeti vaayamati viiriya.m aarabhati citta.m pagga.nhaati padahati. raagassa, bhikkhave, abhi~n~naaya ime cattaaro dhammaa bhaavetabbaa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 276^b^.^eb^ ``raagassa, bhikkhave, abhi~n~naaya cattaaro dhammaa bhaavetabbaa. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m bhaaveti; viiriyasamaadhi...pe0... cittasamaadhi...pe0... viima.msaasamaadhipadhaanasa"nkhaarasamannaagata.m iddhipaada.m ^a^M1.0580^ea^ bhaaveti. raagassa, bhikkhave, abhi~n~naaya ime cattaaro dhammaa bhaavetabbaa''ti. tatiya.m.
